1.Name: Union EXP
1.Desc: Union Level EXP. Obtained from exploration.
1.Bg: Rich experience helps to adapt to the survival rules of this world.

2.Name: Shell Credit
2.Desc: The universal currency issued by Huanglong, officially recognized across many regions.
2.Bg:
In the ancient past, the ancestors of Huanglong utilized seashells as currency. Though the manufacturing techniques have evolved over time, the shell-like appearance of this currency has endured. 
"As a witness, it preserves the history of our people."

3.Name: Astrite
3.Desc: The precious remnants of the civilization reverberate within... Perhaps they hold infinite possibilities.
3.Bg: Echoes from distant planets have found their way here from the vast expanse of the universe. In the starry night, the symphony of civilizations from untold light-years away resonates.

4.Name: Lunite
4.Desc: Within the changing Lunite lies a treasure known as truth... Perhaps it reveals everything about the past and the future.
4.Bg: The moon has long been shattered by the Waveworn Phenomenon. What we observe is nothing but the past's mirage.

5.Name: Waveplate
5.Desc:
Waveplates gradually restores over time and there is a storage limit.
Astrites can be consumed to exchange for Waveplates.
5.Bg: Data values reflecting the real-time status of the Resonator. When the Resonator is active, the Waveplate gradually depletes. Once it reaches a critical level, the Resonator's mobility becomes restricted.

10800.Name: Crystal Solvent
10800.Bg: A necessary solvent for Resonators. It not only helps stabilize themselves but also enhances the numerical level of Waveplates.

10001102.Name: Sanhua's Waveband
10001102.Desc: Can be used to activate Sanhua's Resonance Chain.
10001102.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001103.Name: Baizhi's Waveband
10001103.Desc: Can be used to activate Baizhi's Resonance Chain.
10001103.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001202.Name: Chixia's Waveband
10001202.Desc: Can be used to activate Chixia's Resonance Chain.
10001202.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001203.Name: Encore's Waveband
10001203.Desc: Can be used to activate Encore's Resonance Chain.
10001203.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001402.Name: Yangyang's Waveband
10001402.Desc: Can be used to activate Yangyang's Resonance Chain.
10001402.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001503.Name: Verina's Waveband
10001503.Desc: Can be used to activate Verina's Resonance Chain.
10001503.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001601.Name: Taoqi's Waveband
10001601.Desc: Can be used to activate Taoqi's Resonance Chain.
10001601.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001602.Name: Danjin's Waveband
10001602.Desc: Can be used to activate Danjin's Resonance Chain.
10001602.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41300005.Name: Mysterious Code
41300005.Bg: The metal scrolls with mysterious symbols seem to be able to create some kind of connection with Rover.

41400014.Name: Strife Tacet Core
41400014.Desc: The Crownless's drop, a Resonator's Ascension item.
41400014.Bg: The core of Crownless's clone. Only more strife and sacrifice can mend the cracks and voids within this Tacet Core.

41400024.Name: Thundering Tacet Core
41400024.Desc: Thundering Mephis's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400024.Bg: The core of Thundering Mephis. Like a miniature thunderstorm, the core radiates a dazzling light between the flashes.

41400034.Name: Elegy Tacet Core
41400034.Desc: Mourning Aix's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400034.Bg: The Tacet Core of Mourning Aix, singing a never-ending elegy. Those who touch the Tacet Core will be overwhelmed by a great sense of loneliness and loss and will unconsciously shed tears. But this is not empathy, perhaps just a kind of emotional hypersensitivity.

41400044.Name: Rage Tacet Core
41400044.Desc: Inferno Rider's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400044.Bg: The Tacet Core of Inferno Rider, surrounded by the never-ending fire of rage. The raging flames, fueled by the supreme clamor, vow to burn everything to ashes.

41400054.Name: Roaring Rock Fist
41400054.Desc: Feilian Beringal's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400054.Bg: The rock shell covering the arm of Feilian Beringal, named for the thunderous roar of Feilian's heavy punch.

41400064.Name: Gold-Dissolving Feather
41400064.Desc: Impermanence Heron's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400064.Bg: The golden feathers of Impermanence Heron, from which a dirty and rotten smell constantly flows. A researcher once tried to seal the feathers in various metal containers, but the containers would corrode in a moment.

41400074.Name: Sound-Keeping Tacet Core
41400074.Desc: Lampylumen Myriad's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400074.Bg: The Tacet Core of Lampylumen Myriad, freezing the humming whispers. The surrounding sounds will be captured by the Tacet Core and turned into a cold absolute echo.

41400084.Name: Group Abomination Tacet Core
41400084.Desc: Mech Abomination's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400084.Bg: The huge Clamorling hidden in the underground ruins of Court of Savantae, is a huge collection of countless program logics. The heterogeneous Tacet Core is stacked in disorder, just like the complex code of the mechanical puppet.

41100011.Name: LF Whisperin Core
41100011.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100011.Bg: The Tacet Core of a feeble Whisperin. It takes the form of a broken star. Faint and deep frequencies are still lingering within the core, yet the messages they try to convey remain elusive to all.

41100012.Name: MF Whisperin Core
41100012.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100012.Bg: The Tacet Core of a common Whisperin. It takes the form of a clear and complete star. Its Frequency Energy aligns with the hearing range of normal people. Yet, the question remains: what's the intention behind this imitation?

41100013.Name: HF Whisperin Core
41100013.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100013.Bg: The Tacet Core of a powerful Whisperin. It takes the form of a star with sharp ridges along its outline—like an embodiment of its shrill Frequency Energy. Perhaps, its personification has already led to the Uncanny Valley effect.

41100014.Name: FF Whisperin Core
41100014.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100014.Bg: The Tacet Core of a special Whisperin. It takes the form of an intricate star, bearing both recognizable and unfamiliar Frequency Energy. It seems that humans only know the tip of the iceberg of themselves.

41100021.Name: LF Howler Core
41100021.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100021.Bg: The Tacet Core of a feeble Howler. It is the remaining part of a Tacetite Bloom after it withers. Despite its astonishing accuracy in mimicry, it only ends one way—reducing to a mass of twisted Frequency Energy.

41100022.Name: MF Howler Core
41100022.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100022.Bg: The Tacet Core of a common Howler. After the Tacetite Bloom withers, a certain amount of Frequency Energy remains. Similar to the natural cycle of life, this frequency can probably serve as the sustenance for newcomers.

41100023.Name: HF Howler Core
41100023.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100023.Bg: The Tacet Core of a powerful Howler. The fierce and untamed Frequency Energy continues to reverberate within it. Evolution is all about adapting to the environment. Who will emerge victorious from the ordeal of the devastating Waveworm Phenomenon?

41100024.Name: FF Howler Core
41100024.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100024.Bg: The Tacet Core of a special Howler. It takes the form of a seed emerging from a withered Tacetite Bloom. Life is brimming with endless possibilities. This core, akin to the seed of life, also contains infinite possibilities.

41100031.Name: Crude Ring
41100031.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100031.Bg: A crude ring that serves more as an identification than for practical use. It is used to display one's commitment to sever ties with civilized society.

41100032.Name: Basic Ring
41100032.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100032.Bg: A ring with bearable quality. Apart from helping the Exiles to recognize each other's identification, it also provides various functions such as basic communication, location services, and scanning. These features assist the Exiles to better survive in the wilderness.

41100033.Name: Improved Ring
41100033.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100033.Bg: An improved Ring, exclusive to a selected few. This ring stores a large amount of wilderness survival information. Certain entries detailing rare plants and special minerals hold academic significance compared to papers written by the Academy.

41100034.Name: Tailored Ring
41100034.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100034.Bg: A ring made of special material using unique techniques. Its owner must boast a legendary experience. Much of the information stored within it is encrypted and challenging to decipher for details.

41200031.Name: Mask of Constraint
41200031.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41200031.Bg: A mask worn by Fractsidus recruits. It seems to be used to suppress the rejection reaction induced by the integration of Tacet Discords. The side effect that comes with it is the suppression of the wearer's normal human emotions. Perhaps, that's one of the designer's purposes?

41200032.Name: Mask of Erosion
41200032.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41200032.Bg: A mask worn by Fractsidus active members. Due to long-term use, its ability to stabilize frequency has been greatly mitigated. One can clearly feel the torment of being drowning in negative emotions from the mask.

41200033.Name: Mask of Distortion
41200033.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41200033.Bg: A mask worn by Fractsidus veterans. The original owner has now had no turning back on the road of Overclocking. Would they have chosen to wear this mask if they had foreseen all the torment and suffering that lay ahead?

41200034.Name: Mask of Insanity
41200034.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41200034.Bg: A very peculiar Fractsidus mask. It would be nearly impossible for a normal person to imagine the mental state of its owner. Judging from the residual frequency on the mask, one can perceive that the owner's emotions have become severely distorted, generating frequencies that resemble Tacet Discords.

41400094.Name: Monument Bell
41400094.Desc: Bell-Borne Geochelone's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400094.Bg: The ancient bell carried on the back of the Bell-Borne Geochelone. When the bell rings, the awakened past will leave a new mark in this era.

41400104.Name: Wave-Cutting Tooth
41400104.Desc: Cetus the Tidebreaker's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400104.Bg: The blue spiral-shaped heteromorphic sharp tooth of Cetus the Tidebreaker, capable of cutting through waves. Legend has it that the water surface cut through by the Cetus's tooth will leave long-lasting ripples.

41400114.Name: Unending Destruction
41400114.Desc: Scar's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400114.Bg: The card in Scar's hand with the mark of a black sheep. The flame attached to it seems to never extinguish. That flame will burn forever with Scar's never-ending desire for destruction.

41400124.Name: Dreamless Feather
41400124.Desc: Dreamless's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400124.Bg: Emerging from the abyss with aspirations of ruling the land and the beings in Jinzhou, it now lies extinguished in the shadows, leaving behind only this feather.

42100020.Name: Vitality Drink
42100020.Desc: Used to heal 20% of the current Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 160 HP.
42100020.Bg: An energy drink rich in vitamins that helps invigorate the mind.

42100030.Name: Single Revival Agent
42100030.Desc: Instantly revives a selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100030.Bg:
Single Revival Potion
[Effect] Stabilizes the Resonator's condition to a certain extent and aids in their recovery.
[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.
[Warning] Prohibited to use in combination with the same type of potion or any frequency stabilizing potions.

42300010.Name: Lotus Seeds
42300010.Bg: An aquatic plant prized for its ornamental and practical value. Its seeds are renowned for their fragrance in Jinzhou.

42300020.Name: Climbing Fig
42300020.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42300020.Bg:
The fruit of climbing vines that thrive on the exterior walls of buildings, which is often used in desserts.
When Jinzhou people move to a new residence, it's a tradition to take a cutting from the vine growing at their old house and plant it near the new home.

42300030.Name: Iris
42300030.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300030.Bg:
A plant native to Whining Aix's Mire. It symbolizes broken or concealed affection.
Affected by the continuous thundercloud weather of this place, this variant has a significantly shortened flowering period compared to its original species. A true pity, indeed.

42300040.Name: Terraspawn Fungus
42300040.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300040.Bg: A fungus that spreads across dark soil, resembling a black lotus. Once the cap matures and darkens, it begins to liquefy and makes the ground fertile for more mushrooms to grow, hence its name.

42300050.Name: Lanternberry
42300050.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300050.Bg:
A fluorescent berry growing in caves.
Before miners get down the mine in the Tiger's Maw, their family will tuck a lanternberry into their pocket, hoping its glow will lead them safely home in the midst of darkness.

42300060.Name: Pecok Flower
42300060.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300060.Bg:
A vibrant flower, with its sap often processed into dye.
Known for its fragrance and water-resistant properties, the flower is commonly used to produce seal ink paste for official or personalized stamps.

42300070.Name: Belle Poppy
42300070.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300070.Bg:
Once the symbol of the Port City of Guixu, it nearly went extinct when Incinero Petals were rampant.
However, at the outskirts of the city ruins, Belle Poppy was found to bloom still at its home, having endured the disaster.

42300080.Name: Coriolus
42300080.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300080.Bg:
A special fungus associated with ancient trees. Its medicinal and curative properties have been recorded in numerous medical classics of Jinzhou.
An ancient specimen is preserved in the Academy, a living relic tracing back to the era when the towering Central Banyan in the Dim Forest was not so majestic.

42300090.Name: Wintry Bell
42300090.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300090.Bg:
A flower blooming on the high shores.
Legend has it that the Wintry Bell does not really wither. When the ancient bells born by the giant Turtoise in Gorges of Spirits resonate, they will rise again from the ice and snow.

42300100.Name: Violet Coral
42300100.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300100.Bg: Violet Coral, commonly found trapped in the shallow beaches, is always revitalized with the flow and withered with the ebb.

42300110.Name: Bittberry
42300110.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42300110.Bg:
A fruit of bitter taste and a childhood nightmare of many Jinzhou people.
Bittberry is often associated with phrases like "recall past bitterness, savor present sweetness" or "bitter food detoxifies the body".

42300120.Name: Pavo Plum
42300120.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42300120.Bg:
Berries resembling feathers, the people of Hongzhen call them Linglong Hearts.
It is said to be exceedingly nutritious for the brain. But it's never seen as edible because of its extreme bitterness.

42310010.Name: Pearl Leaf
42310010.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310010.Bg:
Common countryside plants.
Mushed Pearl Leaves can quickly stop bleeding when applied to wounds.
Jinzhou pharmacopeia records an instance in which a Green Rabbit gnawed Pearl Leaves to accelerate the healing of wounds.

42310020.Name: Dewvetch
42310020.Bg:
A scarlet Dewvetch. Natural moisture often builds on its buds, thus it is called Dewvetch.
It is a major nectariferous plant within Huanglong. Its honey has a natural, fresh fragrance, and it is refreshing and sweet to taste.

42310030.Name: Noctemint
42310030.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310030.Bg: If applied externally, Noctemint soothes inflammation and relieves itching; if brewed with tea, Noctemint refreshes the user's mind. It is a daily essential, especially for warriors from the Midnight Rangers stationed in the wild. Chewing a few leaves offers a refreshing sensation from tongue to brain, assisting warriors through the enduring night.

42310040.Name: Honeysuckle
42310040.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310040.Bg:
Honeysuckle is named after its characteristic of two flowers blooming from one stem.
Besides its use in tea drinks and medicines, it is also a favorite ornamental pot plant in Jinzhou.

42310050.Name: Perilla
42310050.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310050.Bg:
Perilla is not impressive to the eye, but is known for its unique, rich aroma.
The adding of Perilla to a dish not only removes unpleasant odor, but also enhances the ingredient's freshness.

42310060.Name: Angelica
42310060.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310060.Bg:
A lone and tall herb. It seems that it can confront grave difficulties with a composed demeanor. In Jinzhou, it's affectionately known as the "'Cold Beauty".
This association sometimes sparks an intriguing comparison to a certain researcher from the Academy—yet, neither of them will comment on this.

42310070.Name: Lemongrass
42310070.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310070.Bg:
An aromatic plant native to the New Federation. It exudes a unique citrus fragrance.
The stems and leaves of Lemongrass can be used to extract essential oil, which is an ingredient for perfume, soap, or seasoning to add a flavor twist to foods.

42310080.Name: Erodorchid
42310080.Bg:
A plant that grows on the edges of Tacet Fields. It blooms even in the harsh environment.
As a saprophyte, it cannot support photosynthesis with its pale leaves, and only absorbs nutrition from decayed organisms. As it is often found blooming in areas lacking vitality, it is named "Erodorchid" by Resonators who often travel around dangerous zones.

42310090.Name: Waterlamp
42310090.Bg:
A fluorescent plant that grows by the riverbanks. They look like the lamps at the side of the ships anchoring for the night, hence the name Waterlamp.
The white pith inside Waterlamp's stem is used as wick, while the fibre of the stem skin is used for knit weaving and paper making.

42310100.Name: Bunnywort
42310100.Bg: Common bladderwort in river crevices. An insectivorous plant that is not harmful to human. Its stamens secrete a unique fragrant substance that attracts insects.

42310110.Name: Caltrop
42310110.Bg: The fruit of Caltrop is known as tropfruit. It is produced underwater, beneath the plant's dense leaves. To obtain the fruit, the whole plant must be picked and the leaf must be carefully removed.

42310120.Name: Chromeshell
42310120.Bg:
Chromeshell is a pearl shell. Under illumination, its nacre will glow with a strange polychrome gloss.
When it ebbs, many Chromeshells will be left on beaches.

42310130.Name: Dripsnail
42310130.Bg:
A snail with strange wave-like patterns on its shells. Usually spotted after Retroact Rains.
Dripsnail's shell can store the sound waves of specific frequencies, and once the shell is crushed, nearby creatures will hear a sound similar to the rain sound, hence the name.

42310140.Name: Viola
42310140.Bg:
The Exiles prefer Viola, a plant of great vitality. They cook the young shoots of Viola as a source of vegetable.
Experienced observers can determine the whereabouts of the Exiles by the distribution of Viola.

42310150.Name: Cliffrecluse
42310150.Bg:
A blossom on cliffs, swaying to the blowing of breezes.
When the flowers swing in the currents, their light gestures always leave a strong impression.

42310160.Name: Umbragricus
42310160.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310160.Bg: Legend has it that a traveler, who delighted in exploring mountains and rivers, stumbled upon this mushroom. Its shape, resembling a person sheltering from rain under an umbrella, inspired the traveler to name it "Umbragricus".

42310170.Name: Gemberry
42310170.Bg: A gem-like plant with scarlet, sweet, and juicy fruit, perfect for immediate consumption or sauce making.

42310180.Name: Edodes
42310180.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310180.Bg: Edodes offers a richer and more tender flavor compared to common mushrooms. Simply boiling Edodes in fresh water with a pinch of salt yields a taste akin to Jinzhou Stew.

42310190.Name: Gloom Slough
42310190.Bg:
Gloom Slough is commonly found among the ruins of villages or cities, and is named for the glowing light that resembles a candle flame without the heat.
Gloom Cicada's diet is mainly fluorescent plants, and the sloughs they produce are left with the sedimented fluorescent matters from the insects' skin.

42400010.Name: Fowl Meat
42400010.Bg: Meat obtained from fowls. Freshly cut. Extra tender. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

42400020.Name: Feather
42400020.Bg: Lightweight and soft feathers that are often used in crafting of accessories or toys.

42400030.Name: Raw Meat
42400030.Bg: Meat obtained from animals, featuring a clean cut with distinct fat marbling. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

42400070.Name: Phoenix Butterfly
42400070.Bg:
A large butterfly. They are often active in dense vegetation areas in woodlands or other environments. They often fly in pairs at high altitudes and feed on nectar. Hard to capture.
It is the most commonly seen butterflies because of its high reproductive ability and adaptability to the living environment.

42400080.Name: Red Feather Butterfly
42400080.Bg: Red Feather Butterfly is a variant of the heterochrome Phoenix Butterfly family. Its overly bright coloration renders it less adaptable to various environments compared to the common Phoenix Butterfly, making it more susceptible to predators. It ranks second in terms of both quantity and rarity among the three butterfly species.

42400090.Name: Blue Feather Butterfly
42400090.Bg: Blue Feather Butterfly is a variant of the heterochrome Phoenix Butterfly. Its genetic mutation gives it a dreamy scale color but also reduces its reproduction ability. As a result, the Blue Feather Butterfly is the rarest and most elusive of the three species.

42400100.Name: Chrysopa
42400100.Bg:
Chrysopa possesses two pairs of wings made of transparent membranes with delicate reticulate veins resembling leaves.
It primarily preys on small insects and serves as a natural predator for many pests, making it a valuable resource for biological pest control.

42400110.Name: Golden-ringed Dragonfly
42400110.Bg: Golden-ringed Dragonfly is a wetland and water predator. Its diet includes flying insects and small fish and shrimp. It is known for rapid flying and predating speed.

42400120.Name: Fish
42400120.Bg: Meat obtained from fish, featuring a tender cut with a refreshing taste. With skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

42400130.Name: Silver-Banded Lizard
42400130.Bg: Carnivorous reptiles, mainly living in stone crevices or caves and other dark places. Their skin is covered with leathery scales, and their body has black and white ring-shaped patterns alternately arranged. They most feed on earthworms, snails, and insects.

42400140.Name: Azure Lizard
42400140.Bg: Carnivorous reptiles, mainly living by waters or in wetlands. Their skin is covered with leathery scales. While their whole body is blue, musclar spines are found on their back. They favor wet, warm environments and small shrimp, crabs for diet.

42400150.Name: Green Pit Lizard
42400150.Bg: Carnivorous reptiles, common lizards in grasslands, though occasional sightings in towns exist. They would hide themselves in parterres or plant trellis. However, as they are not poisonous, has a wide diet and a gentle temper, they are sometimes taken as pets by citizens.

42400160.Name: Black-Striped Frog
42400160.Bg: A small frog often found on the banks of the rivers and lakes. Their habitat is often established on lush bushes. When it rains, they often come out to feed on snails and earthworms. Therefore, after rain, Black-Striped Frogs can often be seen crossing the roads in an attempt to return to the waterside.

42400170.Name: Goldenback Frog
42400170.Bg: A small frog often found on the banks of the rivers and lakes. A heterochrome species of Black-Striped Frog. Since it is relatively scarce and more vulnerable to enemies due to the color, some amphibian fans will catch Goldenback Frogs after rain and take them home as pets.

42500010.Name: Scarletthorn
42500010.Bg: A specialty mineral with a shape of needle clusters. Sharp and tough. Mostly used in cutting metals or other crystals or making weapons.

42500020.Name: Lampylumen
42500020.Bg: A translucent specialty mineral found in the Tiger's Maw Mine. Both the crystal produce and raw status of this mineral has a translucent azure shine. As a material, it has excellent toughness and stability.

42500030.Name: Indigoite
42500030.Bg: A widely distributed mineral. Its unique, profound purple distinguishes itself from other minerals. Due to its fragility, it requires careful processing with specialized equipment.

42500040.Name: Floramber
42500040.Bg: Minerals formed over time from the remains of dead plants within Tacet Fields that had sunken into its terrains. Due to the retained woody plant-like structural appearances, these minerals were given the name "Floramber", though they are unrelated to ambers in terms of shape or form.

42600010.Name: Bird Egg
42600010.Bg: A gift from birds, and a regular on dinner tables.

43010001.Name: Basic Resonance Potion
43010001.Bg: A potion that can slightly enhance the user's frequency perception ability. It is especially beneficial for Resonators struggling with mastering their Fortes, as it greatly enhances adaptability. However, when consumed by Resonators who already exhibit excellent control over their Fortes, its effectiveness is somewhat diminished due to its fully diluted nature.

43010002.Name: Medium Resonance Potion
43010002.Bg: A potion that can further enhance the user's frequency perception ability. By adjusting the mixture ratio, this potion is more suitable for Resonators with relatively good control over their Fortes. With a near-perfect cost-effectiveness, it is regarded as flawless except for its "notoriously" bland taste.

43010003.Name: Advanced Resonance Potion
43010003.Bg: A potion that can greatly enhance the user's frequency perception ability. Collaborating with professional nutritionists, this potion is more beneficial to both physical and mental well-being compared to many healthcare products on the market. This potion enjoys high popularity among Resonators, with many voices urging its manufacturer to explore a variety of flavors.

43010004.Name: Premium Resonance Potion
43010004.Bg: A potion that can significantly enhance the user's Frequency perception. Its formula is locked within a vault with the highest security. Rumor has it the inventor of this potion is a powerful Resonator in their own right, and their hope is to groom a successor capable of surpassing their achievements.

43020001.Name: Basic Energy Core
43020001.Bg: Purified liquid energy extracted from Tacetite, its purity increasing with higher ratings. When injected into a weapon, it offers a corresponding bonus.

43020002.Name: Medium Energy Core
43020002.Bg: A supplement storing a small amount of Tacetite Energy. It can be used to recharge the core modules of Tacetite Weapons. Routine preventative maintenance of weapons is advised for all Resonators, or they may find themselves caught off guard in the case of an emergency.

43020003.Name: Advanced Energy Core
43020003.Bg: A supplement storing a small amount of Tacetite Energy. It can be used in the core modules of Tacetite Weapons to increase power output. Weapons are the allies of Resonators and Tacetites serve as their food. Only by nourishing weapons well can they be handier and more powerful in battles.

43020004.Name: Premium Energy Core
43020004.Bg: A supplement storing high-density Tacetite Energy, fully capable of powering most Tacetite Weapons. Experienced Resonators often preassemble and preheat this supplement to prevent weapon malfunctions during intense battles.

43020011.Name: Inert Metallic Drip
43020011.Desc: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
43020011.Bg: A fluid metallic drip whose activity has been greatly diminished. Its surface appears lackluster, covered with a dense layer of passivation film. However, under suitable temperatures, the residual Frequency Energy within it can still be utilized.

43020012.Name: Reactive Metallic Drip
43020012.Desc: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
43020012.Bg: A fluid metallic drip whose activity has been partially retained. Its surface presents a luster similar to that of Tacetites. As it is quite reactive, it needs to be stored properly upon collection to prevent any loss of Frequency Energy.

43020013.Name: Polarized Metallic Drip
43020013.Desc: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
43020013.Bg: A fluid metallic drip with high activity. Its surface presents an amazing luster. This polarized matter only forms under extremely strict conditions, and the scientific world has yet to fully figure out its transformation patter.

43020014.Name: Heterized Metallic Drip
43020014.Desc: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Sword Resonators.
43020014.Bg: A special fluid metallic drip which can barely form naturally. It maintains a perpetual flow on its surface. Microscopic examinations of a few samples have revealed its intricate inner structure, resembling more of a living organism than an inorganic substance.

43020021.Name: Impure Phlogiston
43020021.Desc: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
43020021.Bg: A crystal shaped like a solidified flame. Its unconventional appearance challenges Old Science. Typically, it contains a rather high level of impurities and thus requires specialized purification treatment for practical use.

43020022.Name: Extracted Phlogiston
43020022.Desc: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
43020022.Bg: A crystal shaped like a solidified candle flame. Its impurities are significantly reduced through a rough extraction and recrystallization process. This makes it simple even for those without expertise to distinguish between crystals of varying quality.

43020023.Name: Refined Phlogiston
43020023.Desc: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
43020023.Bg: A crystal shaped like a solidified firework. After repeated purification, it is almost free of impurities. Its eye-catching and magnificent appearance not only holds practical utility but also elevates its collectible value.

43020024.Name: Flawless Phlogiston
43020024.Desc: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Pistols Resonators.
43020024.Bg: A crystal shaped like a raging flame, known for its impeccable purity. As a result, some Resonators don't want to use these crystals solely for enhancement, instead opting to entrust professional craftsmen to process them into unique accessories.

43020031.Name: Lento Helix
43020031.Desc: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
43020031.Bg: A helix with soothing waveforms. Facing this remarkable substance, human beings finally realize what static vibration is about.

43020032.Name: Adagio Helix
43020032.Desc: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
43020032.Bg: A helix with gentle waveforms. Researchers can extract and utilize the sealed Cadence Energy within it. However, it is worth mentioning that researchers cannot effectively analyze the content contained within this helix.

43020033.Name: Andante Helix
43020033.Desc: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
43020033.Bg: A helix with graceful waveforms, like a melodious song composed by nature. Instead of being studied by scientists, it might in essence be a subject best explored by researchers of aesthetics.

43020034.Name: Presto Helix
43020034.Desc: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Rectifier Resonators.
43020034.Bg: A helix with intense waveforms. Researchers are greatly captivated by the perfect harmony of movement and stillness it displays. However, to this day, no one knows how this harmony is formed.

43020041.Name: Waveworn Residue 210
43020041.Desc: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
43020041.Bg: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. However, the inner balance has been disturbed, causing the Remnant within the inner core to reduce to the Reverberation.

43020042.Name: Waveworn Residue 226
43020042.Desc: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
43020042.Bg: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is not in a state of decline. By selecting an appropriate absorber, users may still have the chance to extract Remnant Energy.

43020043.Name: Waveworn Residue 235
43020043.Desc: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
43020043.Bg: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It maintains a delicate balance. When it is highly concentrated in a centrifuge, it produces products that have various applications.

43020044.Name: Waveworn Residue 239
43020044.Desc: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Broadblade Resonators.
43020044.Bg: A Waveworn residue featuring a double-layered spherical shell. It is known for its astonishing balance. Due to its indispensable role in many high-tech fields, it is subject to the most stringent trade restrictions.

43020051.Name: Cadence Seed
43020051.Desc: A basic material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
43020051.Bg: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a plant seed. If you listen carefully, you can feel a pulse-like rhythm. However, in fact, this substance is not alive, and its structure is pretty similar to that of the Tacet Core of a Howler.

43020052.Name: Cadence Bud
43020052.Desc: A medium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
43020052.Bg: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a plant bud. If you listen carefully, you can sense the pleasure of sprouting from the ground. However, it can never grow into a complete plant.

43020053.Name: Cadence Leaf
43020053.Desc: An advanced material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
43020053.Bg: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a new leaf. If you listen carefully, you can hear the faint rustle of it bathing in sunlight and sucking dew. In fact, it is able to absorb the wandering Frequency Energy from the environment.

43020054.Name: Cadence Blossom
43020054.Desc: A premium material used for Weapon Ascension and Skill Upgrade for Gauntlets Resonators.
43020054.Bg: An unusual substance resembling the shape of a blossom. If you listen carefully, you can hear the petals unfolding. At the end of the silent time, a blossom of Cadence finally bursts into bloom.

44010014.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010014.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010014.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

44010015.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010015.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010015.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

44010016.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010016.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010016.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

44010017.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010017.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010017.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

44010018.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010018.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010018.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

44010025.Name: Wood-textured Shard
44010025.Desc: Special drops from the Huanglong region, which can be used to exchange for various items in the Souvenir Store.
44010025.Bg:
"In the Huanglong region, ancient buildings were traditionally built using wood, but it proved to be insufficient in meeting modern strength requirements. Hence, Huanglong began to explore alternative building materials that could replicate the traditional wooden texture while providing sturdiness.
These Wood-textured Shards can be found all throughout the region, with varying shapes and origins – from houses and shops to military camps and academies. Although uncovering the stories behind them is a challenging task, the Pioneer Association relentlessly pursues this endeavor. Each shard holds a piece of history waiting to be discovered.

44010026.Name: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010026.Desc: An error happened. Please contact Customer Service
44010026.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

50001.Name: Lustrous Tide
50001.Desc: Used to Convene one time in Tidal Chorus.
50001.Bg: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Twisting whirls, the response is proud. In chance, you and I shall meet. In shimmering waves, our fate shall greet."

50002.Name: Radiant Tide
50002.Desc: Used to Convene one time in Featured Resonator Convene.
50002.Bg: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Brilliant ripples, answers found. As promised, you will draw near. In radiant waves, our paths appear."

50003.Name: Oscillated Coral
50003.Desc: Used to redeem items in the Store.
50003.Bg:
The ripples of the waves converge into the sprouts of desire.
"That is the echo of your call."

50004.Name: Afterglow Coral
50004.Desc: Used to redeem items in the Store.
50004.Bg:
The ripples of the waves converge into the branches of hope.
"That is the proof of your encounter."

50011.Name: Lunite Subscription
50011.Desc: After purchase, claim daily Astrites for 30 days.
50011.Bg: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

50012.Name: Lunite Subscription
50012.Desc: Used to claim daily Astrites for 30 days.
50012.Bg: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

70000002.Name: Boost Unit
70000002.Desc:
Increases Max STA by 10 points.
Can be obtained from upgrading the Data Bank.
70000002.Bg: A component that requires a large amount of computing power to run. It can stably output power, and when loaded on a Terminal, it can significantly improve the owner's mobility.

40040001.Name: Sonance Casket
40040001.Desc: Exchangeable for resources when delivered to the relic merchant.
40040001.Bg: The Sonance Casket is a product of the natural decay and collapse of the Sonoro Sphere, containing the unlost past. Since the Sonoro Sphere is an important source of information for humans to understand the history of the Lament and the evolution of the civilization, the Sonance Casket, as a "fragment" and "condensation" of the Sonoro Sphere, is considered to have a high archaeological value and is regarded as an "antique" by people.

90000001.Name: Resonator Experience
90000001.Desc: Level up your Resonators by gaining experience through daily explorations and reaching a certain value threshold.
90000001.Bg: This is the proof of the Resonator's practice.

36000001.Name: Basic Sealed Tube
36000001.Desc: Basic Echo EXP item. Provides 500 EXP.
36000001.Bg: A cylindrical storage that contains simplified frequency cluster. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. Resonators can then extract its data using their Terminal, employing it to optimize the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

36000002.Name: Medium Sealed Tube
36000002.Desc: Medium Echo EXP item. Provides 1,000 EXP.
36000002.Bg: A cylindrical storage that contains standard frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. This medium-sized storage holds a greater volume of information compared to the basic version. Consequently, the database available for training is more complete, better optimizing the performance of the absorbed Echoes.

36000003.Name: Advanced Sealed Tube
36000003.Desc: Advanced Echo EXP item. Provides 2,000 EXP.
36000003.Bg: A cylindrical storage that contains advanced frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. This storage not only contains the database needed for routine training, but also incorporates simulation materials tailored to diverse scenarios. Therefore, it can fully exploit the potential of the absorbed Echoes.

36000004.Name: Premium Sealed Tube
36000004.Desc: Premium Echo EXP item. Provides 5,000 EXP.
36000004.Bg: A cylindrical storage that contains special frequencies. To activate it, users must rotate the cipher wheel to the correct position. It contains precious data collected from various extreme environments, facilitating the revolutionary transformation of the absorbed Echoes.

70010001.Name: Dagger with Special Symbols
70010001.Desc: A small knife given by Mr. Zi.
70010001.Bg: A delicate small knife, engraved with patterns like a crocodile.

70010002.Name: "Lingo Collection - Part One"
70010002.Desc: Industry Lingo provided by Mr. Zi.
70010002.Bg: Lingo Collection - Part One Shoulder: buddy, man, friend. Make it Loud: State your name. The Silent: Who can't state the name. The Loud: Who have strong background. Outsiders: Who don't understand Lingo. Mingle: Use Lingo. Movers: Who have reputation. Shakers: Boss, leader. Pour the Water: Gimme the Money. Wipe Your Eyes: Take a good look. To the Far: Eyes. To the Wind: Ears. The Long: Legs. The Green: Weapons. Rod: Guns. ...

70010003.Name: Heat Absorption Device
70010003.Desc: A device that can mitigate the negative effects of the Sea of Flames.
70010003.Bg: The Protection Device comes in two parts, carrying both can significantly reduce the Incineranur's harm to the user. However, if you remain in the Incineranur for too long, damage values will accumulate over time. Please also be aware not to step directly onto the Petals.

70010004.Name: Soundproof Device
70010004.Desc: A device that can mitigate the negative effects of the Sea of Flames.
70010004.Bg: Two sets of devices that can mitigate the toxic pollens greatly. Please note that extended stay in the Sea of Flames can be dangerous even with these devices. Also, please stay away from the petals.

70010005.Name: Photo: Shuyun in the Refinery
70010005.Desc: Digital image recorded by the Terminal.
70010005.Bg: A digital image recorded by the Terminal, showing Shuyun working in the Refinery.

70010006.Name: Photo: Shu Yun in the Mine
70010006.Desc: Digital image recorded by the Terminal.
70010006.Bg: A digital image recorded by the Terminal, showing Shuyun working in the Mine.

70010007.Name: Photo: Shu Yun in the Port
70010007.Desc: Digital image recorded by the Terminal.
70010007.Bg: A digital image recorded by the Terminal, showing Shuyun working in the Port.

70010008.Name: "Instruction Manual For Left-handers"
70010008.Desc: An Instruction Manual given by Shuyun.
70010008.Bg: An Instruction Manual. Its writer, Shuyun details the steps to operate machines in the Refinery for Uncle Xie, who has injured his right hand.

70010009.Name: Water Quality Sample
70010009.Desc: Squeaky Express new site preparation environmental sampling.
70010009.Bg: A sample of potential new site locations. It is used to test whether the environment meets the standards for site construction.

70010010.Name: Soil Sample
70010010.Desc: Squeaky Express new site preparation environmental sampling.
70010010.Bg: A sample of potential new site locations. It is used to test whether the environment meets the standards for site construction.

70010011.Name: Biological Sample
70010011.Desc: Squeaky Express new site preparation environmental sampling.
70010011.Bg: A sample of potential new site locations. It is used to test whether the environment meets the standards for site construction.

70010012.Name: Locked Box
70010012.Desc: A box left by Jiaping, with an electronic lock on it.
70010012.Bg: During her days in the Exiles camp, she carefully preserved the things inside, but now they lay casually discarded in the corner.

70010013.Name: Jiaping's Diary
70010013.Bg: It contains a record of what happened during Jiaping's stay in the Exile camp, as well as some nonsensical feelings and expectations.

70010014.Name: Qingru's Reward
70010014.Bg: In order to give Pinwen an inexpensive, precious, and inviting gift, Qingru has decided to ask for your help at a hefty price.

70010015.Name: Metal Key
70010015.Desc: Key obtained from the Hoochief group.
70010015.Bg: An old-fashioned key, obtained from a group of Hoochiefs.

70050001.Name: Tacet Field Geological Data
70050001.Desc: Geological data collected from the Tacet Field.
70050001.Bg: After the Lament, Tacet Fields have spread across the land, serving as one of the breeding grounds for Tacet Discords. Its geological data is a valuable research sample for researchers.

70050002.Name: Active Tacetite Sample
70050002.Desc: Active Tacetite sample collected from the Tacet Field.
70050002.Bg: Tacetite is both a new source of energy and a dangerous mineral. Please keep the active Tacetite samples collected from Tacet Fields in a safe place to avoid causing secondary disasters or affecting the health of others.

70050003.Name: Delivery Box
70050003.Desc: Delivery box from Squeaky Quick Delivery.
70050003.Bg: Delivery boxes printed with the Squeaky Express logo are durable and sturdy. If you meet similar boxes in the field, please help pick them up and recover them.

70050004.Name: Delivery Box
70050004.Desc: Delivery box from Squeaky Quick Delivery.
70050004.Bg: Delivery boxes printed with the Squeaky Express logo are durable and sturdy. If you meet similar boxes in the field, please help pick them up and recover them.

70050005.Name: Delivery Box
70050005.Desc: Delivery box from Squeaky Quick Delivery.
70050005.Bg: Delivery boxes printed with the Squeaky Express logo are durable and sturdy. If you meet similar boxes in the field, please help pick them up and recover them.

71010001.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey 1
71010001.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010001.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

71010002.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey 2
71010002.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010002.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

71010003.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey 3
71010003.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010003.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

71010004.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey 4
71010004.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010004.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

71010005.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey 5
71010005.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010005.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

71010006.Name: Dim Forest Ecological Survey Summary
71010006.Desc: A data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71010006.Bg: A chip found in the Dim Forest. Seems to be the survey record of a botanist.

80000000.Name: Jinzhou Skewers
80000000.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 100, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000000.Bg: Skewers that have become a favorite for everyone in Jinzhou and must-have on the menu of every restaurant in Jinzhou. But each restaurant has its own secret recipe. "Come to my place, my skewers are the real deal!"

80000001.Name: Stuffed Flatbread
80000001.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 200, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000001.Bg: An ordinary plain flatbread. Carries the memory of the difficult times of the residents of Huanglong.

80000002.Name: Perilla Salad
80000002.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 10%, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000002.Bg: A dish used to stave off hunger when supplies are scarce, it has now become a refreshing side dish on the dinner table.

80000003.Name: Spicy Pulled Chicken
80000003.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000003.Bg: A simple cold dish of pulled chicken with an appetizing splash of hot chili oil. Although simple to make, it always reminds people of their childhood.

80010000.Name: Jinzhou Skewers Recipe
80010000.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Jinzhou Skewers.
80010000.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Jinzhou Skewers.

80010001.Name: Stuffed Flatbread Recipe
80010001.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Stuffed Flatbread
80010001.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Stuffed Flatbread.

80010002.Name: Perilla Salad Recipe
80010002.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Perilla Salad.
80010002.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Perilla Salad.

80010003.Name: Spicy Pulled Chicken Recipe
80010003.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Spicy Pulled Chicken.
80010003.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Spicy Pulled Chicken.

80020000.Name: Hot Pot Base
80020000.Bg: A universal seasoning made from chili, spices, and fats. It can bring unexpected flavors to almost all ingredients.

80020001.Name: Clear Soup
80020001.Bg: A common thickening ingredient often used as a substitute for water in cooking to enrich the texture.

80020002.Name: Braising Sauce
80020002.Bg: Wonderfully thickened broth with natural fragrances that can bring out the hidden flavors of meat dishes.

80020003.Name: Sweet and Sour Sauce
80020003.Bg: A sweet and sour, bright red sauce that can provide a sweet and sour, rich taste to food.

80030000.Name: Intimacy
80030000.Bg: A wonderful testament to the solid friendship between the Rover and their companions. Increases intimacy with some (possible) pleasant surprises.

80030001.Name: Intimacy
80030001.Bg: A wonderful testament to the solid friendship between the Rover and their companions. Increases intimacy with some (possible) pleasant surprises.

80030002.Name: Intimacy
80030002.Bg: A wonderful testament to the solid friendship between the Rover and their companions. Increases intimacy with some (possible) pleasant surprises.

80000004.Name: Loong Whiskers Crisp
80000004.Bg: A popular dessert in Huanglong, it is considered a symbol of good luck and blessings because of its association with loong.

80000005.Name: Food Ration Bar
80000005.Desc: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 25% for a selected Resonator in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000005.Bg: A staple food of the Jinzhou Garrison. Besides a hearty bite, it is also easy to make and carry around. Each serving comes with a message about guarding the homeland and a reminder to the soldiers that although the night is long and endless, Jinzhou always has their back.

80000006.Name: Refreshment Tea
80000006.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 800, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000006.Bg: A free herbal tea distributed by the Jinzhou government. It is known for its refreshing and detoxifying effects and is popular among the working class. "Thank you to everyone who works hard for Jinzhou."

80000007.Name: Salted Milk Tea
80000007.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 25% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000007.Bg: A sugary, salty beverage inspired by the favorite tea drink of the miners in Huanglong. During the cold winter months, a bowl of Salted Milk Tea can warm the entire body.

80000008.Name: Angelica Tea
80000008.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000008.Bg: During the period of material shortage, Angelica was used by the people of Huanglong as an important medicine to resist the cold. After the production of synthetic drugs was restored, the habit of drinking Angelica tea to resist the cold was retained and gradually developed into the current Angelica Tea.

80000009.Name: Shuyun Herbal Tea
80000009.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000009.Bg: Shuyun's ancestral secret herbal tea, most suitable for summer. But the taste is special, and the taste is polarized. The formula is never disclosed, and it is hard to buy. Usually, you can only ask Shuyun to make it.

80000010.Name: Poached Chicken
80000010.Desc: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 15% for a selected Resonator in the team for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000010.Bg: A must-have dish in the Panhua Restaurant, the poached chicken is added with a special sauce. Some people want to replicate the taste of the Panhua Restaurant's Poached Chicken, but there is always a difference. After all, a restaurant must have some skills.

80000011.Name: Spicy Meat Slices
80000011.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000011.Bg: A famous dish in Huanglong, the spicy taste is mouth-watering. Some people have tried to replace the spices with fruit sauce, but this was strongly protested by the Huanglong chefs.

80000012.Name: Loong Bun
80000012.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000012.Bg: This round bun featuring Loong horns comes in a variety of flavors. Highly cherished by the people of Huanglong, they are a staple on festive tables. Legend has it that consuming a whole bun brings good fortune in the following year.

80000013.Name: Iron Shovel Edodes
80000013.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 16%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000013.Bg: A special dish that originated in the Huanglong army. Huanglong soldiers would use an engineer's shovel as an iron plate, and after heating, they would grill and enjoy the ingredients. This way of eating was later passed back to the home by the retired soldiers and became a famous dish.

80000014.Name: Jinzhou Stew
80000014.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 6% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000014.Bg: A stew comprised of mixed protein and vegetables. The popular Jinzhou family meal allows for the preservation of the ingredients' natural flavors to the maximum owing to its simplicity and versatility. "Jinzhou Stew, Jingzhou brew!"

80000015.Name: Candied Caltrops
80000015.Desc: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 18% and 15% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000015.Bg: One of the famous signature dishes of the Panhua Restaurant. Its sweet and soft taste is very popular among the children of Jinzhou.

80000016.Name: Wuthercake
80000016.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000016.Bg: A kind of pure golden pastry made with a lot of egg yolks. It can maintain its crisp taste even in a humid environment. You can eat it with confidence at any time.

80000017.Name: Aureate Fried Rice
80000017.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 20% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000017.Bg: A fried rice dish that every family in Jinzhou knows how to make. Each grain of rice is coated in a golden layer of egg yolk, symbolizing good fortune. It is often served during festive dinners in the mines, carrying the workers' wishes that their toil and frugality may bring about peace and prosperity.

80000018.Name: Lemon-Braised Pork
80000018.Desc: Increases Echo drop rate by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
80000018.Bg: One of the famous field recipes of the Midnight Rangers, carefully selected Lemongrass and Raw Meat are combined for barbecue. Later adaptations transformed it into a stew, where Lemongrass's fragrance adeptly masks the gamey flavor of the meat, contributing to its widespread popularity.

80000019.Name: Milky Fish Soup
80000019.Bg: A fish soup that warms the body and seems to ward off the cold. Some families in Huanglong often serve it to sick family members.

80000020.Name: Kudzu Congee
80000020.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 22%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000020.Bg: A congee mixed with kudzu powders for high fiber and satiety. In the early years, there were always peddlers with shoulder poles in the streets and alleys of Jinzhou. When the clinkering sounds of their bells come, people would know it was for selling Kudzu Congee. Therefore, the elderly also use tinkering sounds to refer to Kudzu Congee.

80000021.Name: Star Flakes
80000021.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 35%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000021.Bg: A snack popular among the children of Jinzhou, made with deep-fried meat bits of starry shapes and served with a special power dip. It is said that you can make a wish after eating it. "One star, two stars... you can't make a wish without eating it!"

80000022.Name: Caltrop Stir Fry
80000022.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 25% more materials, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000022.Bg: A famous medicinal dish in Huanglong, its ingredients are simple, just need to stir fry the Caltrop with meat after shelling. This dish can calm the mind and invigorate the body, and is popular with the people of Huanglong.

80000023.Name: Caltrop Soup
80000023.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000023.Bg: Also known as "Winter Cloud Soup”. A luxury congee made by slow-cooking Caltrop with poultry broth. The key to make this dish is the control of the heat and the ratio of the ingredients. The slow cooking with a gentle heat preserves the original sweetness of the Caltrop. Paired with Honeysuckle, even a lonely night will feel happy.

80000024.Name: Crispy Squab
80000024.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000024.Bg: The squab, with crispy skin and tender meat, embodies Huanglong's warm hospitality, making it a must-have dish for welcoming guests and a favorite among visitors from all over the world.

80000025.Name: Jinzhou Maocai
80000025.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000025.Bg: Originally a dish invented by Huanglong miners who were too busy to cook, Maocai is prepared simply by mixing and stewing all ingredients with spices in one pot.

80000026.Name: Rising Loong
80000026.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000026.Bg: A golden and crispy fish dish with a complex preparation process. The carp is styled to look up to the sky, as if it wishes to transform into a dragon. It is said that when the Jué descends, the big fishes in the ocean all resurfaced. In order to commemorate this wonderous sight, people serve it on the table during festivals, praying for a good fortune in the coming year.

80000027.Name: Sweet & Sour Pork
80000027.Desc: Increases Echo drop rate by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
80000027.Bg: One of the must-have dishes at the Huanglong New Year's feast. Because of its sour, sweet, and crispy taste, it is popular with children and is also known as "Kid's Delight" by the people. Perhaps the heartfelt smile of happiness on the children’s faces when they taste the sweetness of this dish is more satisfactory the dish itself.

80000028.Name: Chili Sauce Tofu
80000028.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 50% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000028.Bg: A dish of tender tofu served in chili sauce. The appetizing spiciness of it makes Chili Sauce Tofu a widely popular dish even among the nobles of the New Federation.

80000029.Name: Morri Pot
80000029.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000029.Bg: Beef hot pots made with mushroom soup base and other ingredients. The taste is delicious, retaining the original flavor of the dish. But the selection of materials and processing must be careful, and careful again. If hallucinations occur during consumption, please seek medical attention immediately.

80000030.Name: Stuffed Tofu
80000030.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 50% more materials, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000030.Bg: A private dish made by digging a hole in the tofu and filling it with special minced meat. The tofu that is dug out should not be wasted and can be made into other tofu snacks.

80010004.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Loong Whiskers Crisp.

10001500.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

71020001.Name: Battlefield Record 6010: Autumn
71020001.Desc: An ancient data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71020001.Bg: A data chip picked up in the Port City of Guixu. Seems to be a battlefield record of a warrior.

71020002.Name: Battlefield Record 6010: 91.7 Highland Contest
71020002.Desc: An ancient data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71020002.Bg: A data chip picked up in the Port City of Guixu. Seems to be a battlefield record of a warrior.

71020003.Name: Battlefield Record 6010: Reorganization
71020003.Desc: An ancient data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71020003.Bg: A data chip picked up in the Port City of Guixu. Seems to be a battlefield record of a warrior.

71020004.Name: Battlefield Record 6010: Setting Off Again
71020004.Desc: An ancient data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71020004.Bg: A data chip picked up in the Port City of Guixu. Seems to be a battlefield record of a warrior.

71020005.Name: Battlefield Record 6010: This Might Be the Last
71020005.Desc: An ancient data chip, contents can be accessed through the Terminal.
71020005.Bg: A data chip picked up in the Port City of Guixu. Seems to be a battlefield record of a warrior.

70010019.Name: Crude Voice Material
70010019.Desc: A crude voice material made by the Exiles.
70010019.Bg: A crude sound material made from Gloom Slough, enabling thrill-seekers to experience tense and fearful scenarios. While its effects are modest, it is easy to make.

70010020.Name: Map drawn by Hoochief
70010020.Desc: A map that marks the locations of the cages in the eastern forest and the Hoochief camp.
70010020.Bg: Out of hatred for humans, the Hoochiefs in the Dim Forest will use tree cages to imprison passers-by. They use the hides of other creatures in the forest to crudely imitate humans and draw maps to remind the locations of the tree cages.

70010021.Name: Strangely Shaped Key
70010021.Desc: A key that can open the hidden passage of the Dim Forest.
70010021.Bg: A special-shaped key that can open the secret passage in the Dim Forest. It belongs to the zookeeper before the Lament.

70010022.Name: Rusted Data Card
70010022.Desc: A data card in the Dim Forest camp.
70010022.Bg: A data card obtained from the Dim Forest camp, old and rusty. Perhaps, it can be used to open the nearby iron cage.

70010016.Name: Special Waterlamp
70010016.Desc: Waterlamp that blooms during the day.
70010016.Bg: One of the gifts that Yise asked Rover to collect. A special Waterlamp that can bloom in the daytime by hiding in the darkness.

70010017.Name: Star-shaped Core
70010017.Desc: Core dropped by the Tacet Discord.
70010017.Bg: One of the gifts that Yise asked Rover to collect. An exclusive gift used to please the researcher.

70010018.Name: Mature Cliffrecluse
70010018.Bg: This item can only be obtained when three Cliffrecluses grow into one piece.

70010023.Name: Rescue Team Badge
70010023.Desc: A badge that seems to have been weathered.
70010023.Bg: A badge from fifty years ago. It used to be worn by the Resonators who formed a temporary rescue team to protect Huanglong citizens from Tacet Discords and natural disasters during the great migration.

70010025.Name: Special Dewvetch
70010025.Desc: A Dewvetch flower that represents a woman named "Dewvetch" from the Danjin family.
70010025.Bg: A flower that carries an elder's deep feelings

70010026.Name: Half of a jade pendant
70010026.Desc: A half of a jade pendant held by Dewvetch's sister, it seems to match the jade pendant held by Dewvetch.
70010026.Bg: A jade pendant with secret information. It was of great significance to someone.

70010027.Name: Mechanical box
70010027.Desc: A mechanical box left by Dewvetch to the old man.
70010027.Bg: A puzzle box with unknown secrets.

70010028.Name: Dewvetch's diary
70010028.Desc: A record of Dewvetch's own voice left before her death.
70010028.Bg: Information that records the ill-fated life of a woman.

70010029.Name: Chixia's father's diary
70010029.Bg: A diary left behind by Chixia's father during his lifetime. Seems to record his conversation with a friend.

70010030.Name: Worn-out Box
70010030.Desc: A box given to the Rover by the boss of the Boar Gang.
70010030.Bg: A box that Muzhi secretly entrusted Rover to transport. Seems to contain some Tacetite weapons, with its recipient unknown...

70010031.Name: Exiles' Weapon
70010031.Bg: The weapons targeted by the Boar Gang. The original owner seems to be no longer important.

70010033.Name: Court of Savantae's Data Chip
70010033.Desc: The chip given by the Magistrate Jinhsi.
70010033.Bg: The chip given by Jinhsi, which stores the research records of the Court of Savantae on the Sentinel.

70010036.Name: Suspicious Audio Sound Material
70010036.Desc: The sound material that can reproduce the scene after use.
70010036.Bg: The sound material made from suspicious audio which appeared in the Blazing Prairie.

70010037.Name: Qiongxue's Original Manuscript
70010037.Desc: The original manuscript stored in the information device.
70010037.Bg: A data device left by Qiongxue, recording the creativity of the two siblings in their childhood.

70010038.Name: "Fire in the Wilderness" Excerpt
70010038.Desc: The novel excerpt stored in the information device.
70010038.Bg: Selected chapters from Blazing Prairie, master work of the fantasy novelist "Jing".

70010039.Name: Scenic Photo
70010039.Desc: The scenic photo near the camp of the Ninth Investigation Corps of the Central Plains.
70010039.Bg: Scenery photos taken by Athos. He accidentally left behind his camera, hoping that Rover would find the camera through these landscape photos.

70010040.Name: Athos's Information Touchpad
70010040.Desc: Return the information touchpad to Athos.
70010040.Bg: A touchpad left behind by Athos in the Memento Square.

70010041.Name: Icefield Honor Medal
70010041.Desc: The medal lost by Zhi Zhi.
70010041.Bg: The highest honor bestowed by the Academy to the participants in the Glacier Science Research Initiative. For Zhizhi, these were the last words her father left her.

70010042.Name: Data source to be analyzed
70010042.Bg: The data source that fell from the body of the Mech Abomination. Appears to store information about the Court of Savantae. An old laboratory data source.

70010043.Name: Universal repair box
70010043.Desc: Toolbox that can handle various repair work.
70010043.Bg: A versatile repair kit for all occasions. Whether it's household fixes or professional maintenance, you're sure to find the right tools inside.

70010048.Name: Sound catcher
70010048.Bg: An amazing device created by the Court of Savantae. Able to collect scattered Acoustic Prints.

70010049.Name: Recorder
70010049.Bg: A device created by the Court of Savantae and used with the Sound Capture Device. Able to compile the collected Acoustic Prints and restore the sound that once existed.

80000031.Name: Failed Attempt
80000031.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 50, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000031.Bg: A product of a failed gastronomy experiment. Though its taste could be indescribable, at least it fills the stomach (if taken all in)... “Is this... is this edible?"

80050000.Name: Flour
80050000.Bg: Food made from ground wheat, rich in starch, often used for making staple food.

80050001.Name: Cooking oil
80050001.Bg: Cooking oil made from animal fat or oil-producing plants, an essential Material in cooking.

80050002.Name: Chili
80050002.Bg: A plant that can give a spicy stimulus, popular all over the world.

80050003.Name: Sugar
80050003.Bg: The main source of sweetness, often associated with a sense of happiness.

80050004.Name: Tea
80050004.Bg: The raw material of a beverage that once swept the world, rich in a variety of nutritious substances.

80050005.Name: Milk
80050005.Bg: A natural dairy product, not only suitable for direct drinking, but also can provide a unique milk flavor for the dish.

80050006.Name: Rice
80050006.Bg: The product of processed rice, rich in carbohydrates, is one of the most important staple food sources in the world.

80050007.Name: Kudzu Root
80050007.Bg: The dried root of a legume plant, with unique food and medicinal value.

80050008.Name: Salt
80050008.Bg: A condiment dubbed as the king of all condiments that brings the taste that's indispensable for every dish.

80050009.Name: Beans
80050009.Bg: The fruit of a legume plant, rich in protein, is known as plant meat.

80050010.Name: Vinegar
80050010.Bg: Vinegar is a fermented sour liquid condiment, found in every kitchen for as long as the human civilization exists.

100.Name: Influence
100.Bg: A symbol of long-standing mutual trust between Rover and various affiliations. By establishing stable friendships with different affiliations, Rover may gain stronger support in the future.

101.Name: Influence
101.Bg: A symbol of long-standing mutual trust between Rover and various affiliations. By establishing stable friendships with different affiliations, Rover may gain stronger support in the future.

102.Name: Influence
102.Bg: A symbol of long-standing mutual trust between Rover and various affiliations. By establishing stable friendships with different affiliations, Rover may gain stronger support in the future.

103.Name: Influence
103.Bg: A symbol of long-standing mutual trust between Rover and various affiliations. By establishing stable friendships with different affiliations, Rover may gain stronger support in the future.

8.Name: Podcast Experience
8.Desc: Experience obtained from completing Podcast Tasks can be used to upgrade the Podcast level.
8.Bg: Complete Podcast Tasks to build up energy and earn valuable rewards.

50013.Name: Insider Channel
50013.Desc:
Unlocks the Insider Channel of the Pioneer Podcast.

Complete the Podcast Tasks for various rewards.

50014.Name: Connoisseur
50014.Desc:
Unlocks the Insider Channel of the Pioneer Podcast and get additional privilege rewards.

Complete the Podcast Tasks for various rewards.
50014.Bg: Start listening to the Pioneer Podcast now to gain valuable insights for your outdoor adventures!

50015.Name: Purchase Connoisseur Channel
50015.Desc:
Unlocks the Insider Channel of the Pioneer Podcast.

Complete the Podcast Tasks for various rewards.
50015.Bg: Start listening to the Pioneer Podcast now to gain valuable insights for your outdoor adventures!

50016.Name: Insider Channel Key
50016.Desc:
Unlocks the Insider Channel of the Pioneer Podcast.

Complete the Podcast Tasks for various rewards.
50016.Bg:
Standard physical key issued by the Pioneer Association for the Insider Channel.
"Welcome to the Insider Channel! Coming up next is the morning news express..."

70050006.Name: Lost Key
70050006.Desc: A key with a pre-Lament style.
70050006.Bg: Although it is a key from before the Lament, it seems to have been little affected by the seawater due to its special craftsmanship. It seems to be able to open a door of a nearby room.

70050007.Name: Remaining Key
70050007.Desc: A key with a pre-Lament style.
70050007.Bg: A key left in a room turned into a ruin by the seawater, it should be able to open a door in the same floor.

70010050.Name: Records
70010050.Desc: Threnodian "noise" that remains in the target object.
70010050.Bg: Threnodian "noise" that remains in the target object. Able to make any contactor become violent and aggressive.

70010051.Name: Photo of the Snow Crane
70010051.Desc: Deliver the photo to Hanxiang, to fulfill her wish.
70010051.Bg: Hanxiang wants to see the photo of the Snow Crane.

70010052.Name: Wooden training sword
70010052.Desc: Deliver the wooden sword to Hanxiang, to inspire her courage.
70010052.Bg: Help Hanxiang become a member of the Mornguard.

71020006.Desc: Data materials picked up in the Port City of Guixu.
71020006.Bg: A record called Time Footnote, which records the story of a person who calls himself a Measurer.

71020007.Name: Time Footnote: X
71020007.Desc: Data materials picked up in the Port City of Guixu.
71020007.Bg: A record called Time Footnote, which records the story of a person who calls himself a Measurer.
