71020010.Name: Time Footnote: XIII
71020010.Desc: Data materials picked up in the Port City of Guixu.
71020010.Bg: A record called Time Footnote, which records the story of a person who calls himself a Measurer.

70010053.Name: Primitive tide stone
70010053.Desc: Weapon energy of the Exile Leader.
70010053.Bg: The yellow ore obtained after removing the Tacetite shell is shaped like Tacetreite, but is actually still Tacetite, and is usually used by the Exile Leaders.

70060001.Name: Old Booklet
70060001.Desc: A broken old booklet recording the moon nursery rhyme
70060001.Bg: A booklet found by Qiaomu and Whooper on the artificial moon of the Violet Banyan. The nursery rhyme recorded in it seems to be related to the artificial moon.

70010054.Name: Survival code
70010054.Desc: For Exiles to read and acquire wilderness survival skills and experience.
70010054.Bg: The Exile Leader's survival codex, which contains various survival tips and experiences for their fellow Exiles. Varies slightly from camp to camp.

70010055.Name: Cruising Drake's delivery box
70010055.Desc: A delivery box invented by the Cruising Drake.
70010055.Bg: Seven pairs of packed delivery boxes, containing the strange inventions of the Cruising Drake. Strange packing methods were used in order to carry the strange inventions.

10801.Name: Inscription Device
10801.Desc: Leave a Memo using the Memo system.
10801.Bg: Portable Reverberation Marker produced by New Federation. It contains the mixture of high concentration Wutheronphage Cryptococcus (improved type II). With precisely calculated dose, user can mark down Resonating Sounds by injecting small amount of Wutheron.

70010056.Name: Tacetite ore
70010056.Bg: Energy mineral that has been gradually phased out, now mostly used as refining raw materials, somehow fell into the hands of Exiles.

10001104.Name: Lingyang's Waveband
10001104.Desc: Can be used to activate Lingyang's Resonance Chain.
10001104.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

70010057.Name: "Dream Return Song III: Stone Leaf Tears"
70010057.Desc: The tenth anniversary collector's edition of the storybook "Stone Leaf Tear".
70010057.Bg: "He comes back every year, fantasizing her never leaving" Scripts once won the "Audience's Choice Award" in Jinzhou Theater. It tells a story about a couple of childhood sweethearts overcome obstacles to treat strange disease and rescue the whole village. The desolate yet beautiful scene of farewell won over the favor of young boys and girls. Its peripheral product, "Crystalized Vane", was once a heat in Jinzhou.

70010058.Name: Dropped key
70010058.Bg: A key dropped by Blobfly in Kaimi Remnant Site. It got quite the ancient looks and style.

70010059.Name: Crystallized Leaf
70010059.Desc: The leaf with a completely crystallized surface.
70010059.Bg: A vane of the ancient tree "Loong's Gaze". Its surface is covered by hard crystals. Script Tear of Stone Vane compared this vane to tears and used it as a symbol of love for the male and female protagonists.

70010060.Name: Philosophical Notes
70010060.Desc: The information touchpad of Sizhe, returning it may have a reward.
70010060.Bg: Notebook of Sizhe, which records his unconstrained ideas during his investigation missions.

70010061.Name: The lost weapon
70010061.Bg: The Weapon dropped by Yunhe, a relatively old standard in the Midnight Rangers.

80040000.Name: Revival Elixir Combination
80040000.Desc: Used to Instantly revive the selected Resonator. Can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80040000.Bg:
Combination Revival Potion

[Effect] Stabilizes the Resonator's condition to a certain extent and aids in their recovery.

[Precautions] Long intervals between doses are recommended. Excessive use within a short period is not advisable.

[Warning] Prohibited to use in combination with the same type of potion or any frequency stabilizing potions.

70060002.Name: Old Sketch
70060002.Desc: A sketch that appears faded due to age. It constitutes a past memory and a treasure to a child.
70060002.Bg: "I hid the treasure, in the place where the painting is!"

70060003.Name: Dried Flower
70060003.Desc: A dried flower, well preserved in an old storage box.
70060003.Bg: Representing the past of this ruin, it is a precious gift to the future.

70060004.Name: Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
70060004.Desc: Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
70060004.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

70010062.Name: The singing section of the Song of the Empty Dawn
70010062.Desc: The sound material of the Song of the Empty Dawn sung by Qianxin.
70010062.Bg: The singer who performed at the theater turned her singing into sound materials. Due to the singer's own Forte, it can be used to soothe the spirit and enhance the Forte when played. The singing that once gave hope in confusion has now become her last echo in this world.

70060005.Name: Power System Notes
70060005.Desc: Notes related to the power system of the Dim Forest.
70060005.Bg: Notes specifically designed for the Induced Energy Storage Module, which can guide related personnel to complete the maintenance of the power system.

70060010.Name: Sound Emulator Repair Tool
70060010.Bg: A professional repair tool prepared by Qifan. Simple to use, even for a novice.

70060011.Name: Rusty Data Chip
70060011.Bg: A data card obtained from the Dim Forest camp, old and rusty. Perhaps, it can be used to open the nearby iron cage.

41400134.Name: Hidden Thunder Tacet Core
41400134.Desc: Tempest Mephis's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400134.Bg: The core of Tempest Mephis. Like a miniature thundercloud, the rumbling thunder spreads from the Tacet Core, causing the surroundings to quiver in its wake.

70120001.Name: Camellya's group photo 1
70120001.Bg: Stargazing with Camellya at Location A

70120002.Name: Camellya's group photo 2
70120002.Bg: picture with Camellya looking at the moon at location B

70120003.Name: Camellya's group photo 3
70120003.Bg: photo with Camellya at location C looking at the sea

70120004.Name: Modunasha
70120004.Bg: Reader A and Reader B giveaway e-books

70130001.Name: Jiyan copy prop 1
70130001.Bg: props left behind by soldiers seen in replicas

70010063.Name: Auspicious Bell
70010063.Desc: The bell that Lingyang wore during the performance. As a thank you for the journey, Lingyang gave it to you.
70010063.Bg:
A copper spherical bell, a gentle shake can hear a crisp and pleasant sound, it is said to bring good luck and courage to the wearer.
Things themselves have no meaning, uniqueness is often given by people. Perhaps, the moment the boy reached out to you firmly in the crowd, he had already shown you his courage.

70010064.Name: Wood for making a Plum Blossom Pole
70010064.Desc: Wood for making a Plum Blossom Pole, sturdy and hard.

70010065.Name: Lingyang's picture book
70010065.Desc: A picture book made by Lingyang based on her own experiences.

70500001.Name: Key to the Petri Dish
70500001.Desc: A strange-looking key that seems like it can fit into a certain keyhole.

70500002.Name: Key to the Rock Ruins
70500002.Desc: A strange-looking key that seems like it can fit into a certain keyhole.

70500003.Name: A beautiful necklace.
70500003.Desc: A necklace that looks very valuable.
70500003.Bg: A necklace found in the snow.

70500004.Name: The gem on the necklace.
70500004.Desc: The gem on the necklace pendant, which seems to be inlaid somewhere.
70500004.Bg: The gem obtained after the necklace was destroyed.

31000011.Name: Broken Shackles
31000011.Desc: A damaged anklet, with a string of text engraved on the inside. After a long time, only the word "Institute" can be distinguished.
31000011.Bg: "I shall offer my one and only life for these broken shackles. A beast as I am, should also be given the highest acclaim."

44010027.Name: test/Universal Echo
44010027.Desc: test/Universal Echoes can substitute any Echo consumed during Tuning.

9.Name: Activity Points
9.Desc: Item obtained from dailies, can be collected to receive daily rewards.
9.Bg: Following the direction of the pointer, you travel on the land of Solaris-3, these journeys will never be forgotten.

70050011.Name: Level Delivery Test Item - Spear Tip
70050011.Desc: Level Delivery Test Item - Spear Tip Function Description

70050012.Name: Level Delivery Test Item - Spear Breech
70050012.Desc: Level Delivery Test Item - Spear Breech Function Description

70050013.Name: Level Delivery Test Item - Gun Body
70050013.Desc: Level Delivery Test Item - Gun Body Function Description

42500050.Name: Boost Part
42500050.Bg: A boost part disassembled from various weapons, featuring impressive versatility. By collecting enough quantity of these parts, you can apply them to enhance the performance of Tacetite Weapons.

42500060.Name: Echo Frequency Chip
42500060.Bg: A chip with missing content. Therefore, it cannot be directly used to optimize the performance of Echoes. However, by collecting enough quantity of these chips, you can still pick out complete frequencies with similar effects.

70120006.Name: Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
70120006.Desc: A box left by Jiaping, with an electronic lock on it.
70120006.Bg: During her days in the Exiles camp, she carefully preserved the things inside, but now they lay casually discarded in the corner.

44010028.Name: test/Golden Universal Echo
44010028.Desc: test/Golden Universal Echoes can substitute any Echo consumed during Tuning.

70130002.Name: Temporary Team Photo
70130002.Desc: Wenshu gave you this commemorative photo. You can enlarge it for details.
70130002.Bg: You and Jiyan are preparing for the race, and the careful photographer has captured an interesting scene.

70130003.Name: Temporary Team Photo
70130003.Desc: Wenshu gave you this commemorative photo. You can enlarge it for details.
70130003.Bg: You and Jiyan are preparing for the race, and the careful photographer has captured an interesting scene.

70050014.Name: Robot Spare Parts
70050014.Desc: Spare parts for Huanglong military robots, for drivers to repair when the robot breaks down.
70050014.Bg: Parts should always be where they belong. After all, someone will always need them.

70050015.Name: Robot Battery Pack
70050015.Desc: Battery pack for Huanglong military robots, providing power for the entire robot.
70050015.Bg: The power that once carried someone through the mountains will remain in the mountains, remain on someone.

70050016.Name: Robot Engine
70050016.Desc: The engine of the Huanglong military robot, which looks ordinary, but is the most important part of the robot.
70050016.Bg: There is always someone who wants to own it, for money, for friends.

70050017.Name: Driver's Recording Card
70050017.Desc: An ordinary-looking recording card that can be used to play the recorded content.
70050017.Bg: You hear the restless, tired human voice and the emotionless mechanical sound. Until the radio is completely silent, only the wind is howling in the ear.

70140001.Name: Zoom Camera
70140001.Desc: Capture moments with a portable camera.
70140001.Bg: Developed by the Pioneer Association, this camera allows its users to capture samples with detailed data in the wild.

31000015.Name: scavenger hunt note
31000015.Desc: TEXT: At 7:00 a.m., where the shadow of the spire of the lighthouse in Central Plains lies, there is a treasure that only the brave and the strong can open.
31000015.Bg: Treasure note from a mysterious man

50017.Name: Connoisseur Key
50017.Desc:
Unlocks the Insider Channel of the Pioneer Podcast and get additional privilege rewards.

Complete the Podcast Tasks for various rewards.
50017.Bg:
Special Deluxe Keycode for the Pioneer Podcast's Connoisseur Channel.
"Start listening to the Pioneer Podcast now to gain valuable insights for your outdoor adventures!"

31000016.Name: fantastic-tasting rice
31000016.Desc: Aureate Fried Rice turns into rice after sitting in the Backpack for a day.

70050018.Name: Explosive Charge
70050018.Desc: A natural fruit with explosive properties that can be used as a substitute for a bomb.
70050018.Bg: A special fruit that looks like a bomb, which can produce a bomb-like explosion when it encounters a violent impact or temperature change, and is often used as a substitute for explosives. Special means are needed for transportation and storage.

10802.Name: Waypoint
10802.Desc: A temporary Resonance Beacon that can be flexibly placed, it needs to be placed by consuming the core module.
10802.Bg: A temporary Resonance Beacon employed for location marking by utilizing beacon data from its surroundings. While retaining the same functions as Resonance Beacons, it offers enhanced mobility, rendering it indispensable for field workers.

10803.Name: Casket Sonar
10803.Desc: A portable gadget designed for pinpointing undiscovered special collectibles. Re-activating it requires Sonar Circuits.
10803.Bg: Built upon the principles of previous sonar technology, this instrument can detect and pinpoint special collectibles by utilizing specific frequencies.

10804.Name: Lootmapper
10804.Desc: Used to find the undiscovered treasures around the drop point.
10804.Bg: The Lootmapper identifies frequencies to assist users in locating nearby undiscovered Supply Chests and Tidal Heritage. It serves as an indispensable tool to facilitate exploration in the wilderness.

10805.Name: Casket Sonar Use Permit: Jinzhou
10805.Desc: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in given regions.
10805.Bg: The use permit of the Casket Sonar in Jinzhou. To ensure frequency safety in Jinzhou, users are permitted to use the Casket Sonar only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

10806.Name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Jinzhou
10806.Desc: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
10806.Bg: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Jinzhou. To ensure frequency safety in Jinzhou, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

10807.Name: Sonar Circuit
10807.Desc: Can be used to activate the Casket Sonar's search and pinpointing functions for special collectibles.
10807.Bg: The most basic structure to artificially reproduce or store Remnant frequency. It allows the Casket Sonar to match the frequencies around with the Remnant information within its storage to locate special collectibles.

10808.Name: Waypoint Module
10808.Desc: Used to activate the search function of Waypoint.
10808.Bg: The core module of the Waypoint, responsible for collecting, sharing, and updating location information. It connects the Waypoint and the Resonance Beacon, making it essential for initiating and maintaining the functioning of the Waypoint.

36000011.Name: Basic Tuner
36000011.Desc: A device for Tuning 2-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
36000011.Bg: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

36000012.Name: Medium Tuner
36000012.Desc: A device for Tuning 3-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
36000012.Bg: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

36000013.Name: Advanced Tuner
36000013.Desc: A device for Tuning 4-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
36000013.Bg: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

36000014.Name: Premium Tuner
36000014.Desc: A device for Tuning 5-star Echoes. Unlocks one Substat.
36000014.Bg: Adjust Echoes' frequencies, remove any noise, and unleash their true potential.

70010068.Name: Bell Spiriton
70010068.Desc: A special material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone.
70010068.Bg: A rare material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone, which only appears at a specific frequency. It's said that in the hands of a skilled apothecary, it can be refined into a miraculous medicine.

50000031.Name: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
50000031.Desc: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
50000031.Bg: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

50000032.Name: Lord Echo Blind Box
50000032.Desc: can get a lord, boss level Echo that has been unlocked in the artbook

50000033.Name: wind tagEcho blind box
50000033.Desc: can get an Echo that has been unlocked in the iconography, and that Echo is able to spawn wind tags

50000034.Name: fire tagEcho blind box
50000034.Desc: can get an Echo that has been unlocked in the iconography, and that Echo can spawn fire tags

50000035.Name: 拐tagEcho blind box
50000035.Desc: can get an Echo that has been unlocked in the iconography, and that Echo is able to spawn inflection tags

50000036.Name: settlement tagEcho blind box
50000036.Desc: can get an Echo that has been unlocked in the iconography, and that Echo is able to produce the settlement tag

50000037.Name: milk tagEcho blind box
50000037.Desc: can get an Echo that has been unlocked in the iconography, and that Echo is able to spawn a milk tag

70050019.Name: Seaside Arena Access Card
70050019.Desc: A proof of free access to the Exiles camp.
70050019.Bg: A common card, sprayed with the Exiles' favorite color, is an important access card to the Exiles camp.

70050020.Name: Badge of Courage
70050020.Desc: A proof of challenge needed to get a Seaside Arena ticket.
70050020.Bg: A metal bottle cap, sprayed with a pattern of advancing upwards, symbolizing courage, is a symbol of the trial at the Seaside Arena. Due to limited technology, the badge is made from a metal bottle cap.

70050021.Name: Badge of Speed
70050021.Desc: A challenge proof required to get the Seaside Arena ticket.
70050021.Bg: A metal bottle cap, sprayed with a pattern of dashing forward, symbolizing speed, is a symbol of the trial at the Seaside Arena. Due to limited technology, the badge is made from a metal bottle cap.

70050022.Name: Badge of Strength
70050022.Desc: A challenge proof required to get the Seaside Arena ticket.
70050022.Bg: A metal bottle cap, sprayed with a pattern of showing strength, symbolizing power, is a symbol of the trial at the Seaside Arena. Due to limited technology, the badge is made from a metal bottle cap.

80052010.Name: Echo component Synthesis recipe
80052010.Desc: Used to learn how to synthesize Sonar Circuit.
80052010.Bg: The instruction manual for synthesizing a Sonar Circuit. Use to master the synthesis of Sonar Circuit.

80052011.Name: Waypoint Module Synthesis Recipe
80052011.Desc: Used to learn how to synthesize Waypoint Module.
80052011.Bg: The instruction manual for synthesizing a Waypoint Module. Use to master the synthesis of Waypoint Module.

10001405.Name: Jianxin's Waveband
10001405.Desc: Can be used to activate Jianxin's Resonance Chain.
10001405.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

50000038.Name: Lv.10 Supply Pack
50000038.Desc: Reach designated Union Levels to claim this Supply Pack.
50000038.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics.

50000039.Name: Lv.20 Supply Pack
50000039.Desc: Reach designated Union Levels to claim this Supply Pack.
50000039.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics.

50000047.Name: Lv.80 Supply Pack
50000047.Desc: Reach designated Union Levels to claim this Supply Pack.
50000047.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics.

70140002.Name: Ultrasonic Pulse Chip
70140002.Desc: Release a powerful vortex to cleanse muds and the mud shield of Tacet Discords.
70140002.Bg: Developed by Huaxu Academy, this chip can release vortex flow and facilitate researches surrounding the Whining Aix's Mire.

70140011.Name: A player that contains Qianxin's singing voice.
70140011.Desc: After use, it can play the "Dawn Ballad" sung by Qianxin before her voice was damaged.
70140011.Bg: An audio player carefully preserved by Yanzi. It contains only the "Dawn Ballad" sung by Qianxin before she lost her voice. Due to the special nature of Qianxin's Resonance ability, when her voice is played, the residual frequencies of her Resonance can still be activated and provide a slight enhancement to the abilities of others.

10.Name: Data Bank experience
10.Desc: The experience used to upgrade the Data Bank level can be obtained by unlocking new Echo.

31000032.Name: "Suppressor Tower I - Maintenance Log"
31000032.Desc: Maintenance log of Court of Savantae's No. I fog suppressor.
31000032.Bg: Maintenance log for Court of Savantae's No. I suppressor, documenting the research findings of the SR-461 team from the Court of Savantae during their time in Whining Aix's Mire.

31000033.Name: "Suppressor Tower II - Maintenance Log"
31000033.Desc: Maintenance log of Court of Savantae's No. II fog suppressor.
31000033.Bg: Maintenance log for Court of Savantae's No. II suppressor, documenting the research findings of the SR-461 team from the Court of Savantae during their time in Whining Aix's Mire.

31000034.Name: Unsent Electronic Communication
31000034.Desc: An electronic communication from a member of the SR-461 research team.
31000034.Bg: Appears to be the maintenance log for Court of Savantae's No. III suppressor. However, instead of research findings, it contains what seems to be an unsent message.

70050008.Name: Guide Crystal
70050008.Bg: A precise experimental device, storing extremely complex frequency information. It belongs to the long-abandoned Bridge Project of Court of Savantae, and is a key item to activate the detection platform.

50000059.Name: Morphable Echo - Lingering Tunes
50000059.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

70050023.Name: Jinzhou Sunrise Photo
70050023.Bg: A commemorative photo of the sunrise viewed from the top of Mt. Pingting. This ray of morning sun inspires people to firmly run towards the ideal tomorrow.

70060012.Name: A Photograph Stained with Blood
70060012.Desc: A photograph indicating the location of treasures.
70060012.Bg: A photograph with blood stained on its back. Marks are made on the photo, indicating somewhere in the Whining Aix's Mire. Treasures might be found there.

70060013.Name: A Photograph Covered with Scratches
70060013.Desc: A photograph indicating the location of treasures.
70060013.Bg: A photograph with scratches spread on its back. Marks are made on the photo, indicating somewhere in the Tiger's Maw. Treasures might be found there.

70060014.Name: A Brand New Photograph
70060014.Desc: A photograph indicating the location of treasures.
70060014.Bg: A photograph as good as brand new, with marks on it pointing to somewhere in the Dim Forest. Perhaps it's a map to treasures.

50018.Name: Lunite Subscription (7 days)
50018.Desc: Used to claim daily Astrites for 7 days.
50018.Bg: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

50019.Name: Lunite Subscription (15 days)
50019.Desc: Used to claim daily Astrites for 15 days.
50019.Bg: Get unlimited access to the Celestial Observatory for a specified period with this pass.

11.Name: Data Set
11.Desc: The combat data obtained from the Tactical Hologram: Calamity can be exchanged for various rewards in the Simulation Training Store.

50000060.Name: Morphable Overlord Class Echo
50000060.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000061.Name: Morphable Elite Class Echo
50000061.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000062.Name: Morphable Common Class Echo
50000062.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000164.Name: Pioneer Podcast Weapon Chest
50000164.Desc: Provides a Golden Eternal series weapon of your choice.
50000164.Bg: It contains the powerful weapon selected by the Pioneer Association for its explorers.

50000165.Name: Pioneer Association Basic Supply
50000165.Desc:
Open to claim one basic material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare2>Inert Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Impure Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Lento Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Waveworn Residue 210 *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Cadence Seed *1</color>
50000165.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics. Open to claim rich supplies.

50000166.Name: Pioneer Association Medium Supply
50000166.Desc:
Open to claim one medium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare3>Reactive Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Extracted Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Adagio Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Waveworn Residue 226 *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Cadence Bud *1</color>
50000166.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics. Open to claim rich supplies.

50000167.Name: Pioneer Association Advanced Supply
50000167.Desc:
Open to claim one advanced material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Polarized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Refined Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Andante Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Waveworn Residue 235 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Cadence Leaf *1</color>
50000167.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics. Open to claim rich supplies.

50000168.Name: Pioneer Association Premium Supply
50000168.Desc:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Heterized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Flawless Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Presto Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Waveworn Residue 239 *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cadence Blossom*1</color>
50000168.Bg: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics. Open to claim rich supplies.

12.Name: Hazard Record
12.Desc: The precious experimental records brought back from the Tower of Adversity can be exchanged for various rewards in the Adversity Exchange.

70050024.Name: Record Fragment
70050024.Desc: A broken old record, it is unclear what specific use it has
70050024.Bg: A broken old record, it looks like a product from decades ago

70050025.Name: Sheet Music Fragment
70050025.Desc: A broken old sheet music, it is unclear what specific use it has
70050025.Bg: A broken old sheet music, it looks like a product from decades ago

70139300.Name: Grand Library Route Map
70139300.Desc: There is a mark on the top left of the map. This could be where the puzzle is.
70139300.Bg: A small scroll inside the Sundial, mapping the possible routes of the "Grand Library", the central database in City Hall. There is a red circle on the top left corner of the map that possibily indicates the location of a secret contraption, indicating a confusing detour to the destination.

70139301.Name: Wooden Plaque: Left
70139301.Desc: A Wooden Plaque for some kind of ancient rituals.
70139301.Bg: A larger fragment of a wooden plaque with mysterious carvings, possibly used in ancient rituals. The meaning of the patterns is unknown.

70139302.Name: Wooden Plaque: Right
70139302.Desc: A Wooden Plaque for some kind of ancient rituals.
70139302.Bg: A smaller fragment of a wooden plaque with mysterious carvings, possibly used in ancient rituals. The meaning of the patterns is unknown.

70139303.Name: Restored Wooden Plaque
70139303.Bg: A restored wooden plaque with mysterious carvings. You remember seeing a socket where it could fit somewhere before…

70139304.Name: A Diary
70139304.Bg: A strange diary, filled with childish and broken handwriting. It emanates a strange mix of Resonator and Tacet Discords.

70139305.Name: Black Fruit
70139305.Bg: A heavy, dark fruit, just the right size for a hand, emitting a subtle fragrance, it doesn't seem to have anything unusual.

70139306.Name: Mangosteen
70139306.Bg: An ordinary fruit that somehow bears a striking resemblance to the old model of Tacetite Grenade. This is not an indigenous species, as its growth conditions don't agree with the climate of Jinzhou. It's imported by water via the Gunchao Port located in the South.

70139307.Name: Leaf
70139307.Bg: A purple leaf with a faint, peculiar energy.

70139308.Name: Leaf affected by "Waveworn"
70139308.Bg:
A purple leaf with traces of dual Tacet Discord frequencies. The asynchronous fluctuations of the frequencies caused them to cancel each other out and rendered them hard to track.
Could it be that there were actually two separate Tacet Fields surrounding the tree where this leaf originated from?

70139309.Name: Small Device
70139309.Bg:
A finely crafted small device, the surface is engraved with ancient text. The inner ring represents the Four Spirits of Heaven, indicating the location.
"East, the Teal Loong, West, the White Tiger, South, the Vermillion Bird, North, the Black Tortoise".
The outer ring represents the Twelve Earthly Branches, indicating the time.
"Zi, Chou, Yin, Mao, Chen, Si, Wu, Wei, Shen, You, Xu, Hai".

70139310.Name: Sundial
70139310.Bg:
This sundial has a secret compartment. 
Rotate the two disks to the right positions to unlock it and discover its hidden contents.

70139311.Name: The Unlocked Sundial
70139311.Bg: An unlocked Sundial-shaped puzzle box. The direction and time symbols on its disks have been rearranged. However, you have already obtained the key information given by the Jinzhou Magistrate. Now, it appears to be an ordinary small sundial. Only upon closer inspection can you see a faint light source at the top and the shadow of the needle is distorted, almost like a hushed whisper.

70139312.Name: Sugar Pearl
70139312.Bg: A round, pearl-shaped candy ball hidden inside a simple sweet wrapper.

70139313.Name: Sugar Pearl
70139313.Bg: A sweet oral vaccine, reminiscent of candy for children in Jinzhou, symbolizes their triumph over the epidemic.

70139314.Name: Candy
70139314.Desc: A small gift from a child. She hopes you enjoy a sweet time in Jinzhou.
70139314.Bg: A popular treat among the children of Jinzhou, the candy's wrapper bears signs of being eagerly clutched by tiny hands, its folds and creases revealing its cherished history.

70139315.Name: Archive: Tacet Discord
70139315.Desc: Open the information interface after use
70139315.Bg:
The archives stored in the Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus, record the research information related to "Tacet Discord".
"The information energy body composed of Reverberation, has a mimicry of life activities, and its core behavior goal is to devour and absorb the frequency it needs."

70139316.Name: Archive: Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus
70139316.Desc: Open the information interface after use
70139316.Bg: An archive of Huaxu Academy, Jinzhou Campus that contains the event of its founding, branches, and other information.

70139317.Name: Archive: Sugar Pearl Vaccine and Tacet Discord Outbreak
70139317.Desc: Open the information interface after use
70139317.Bg: A research report on "Sugar Pearl" and "Tacet Discord Outbreak", placed on the "Wei" Shelf of Huaxu Academy's archives.

70139318.Name: Archive: "The First Resonator"
70139318.Desc: Open the information interface after use
70139318.Bg: A research report on Jinzhou's first Resonator, placed on the "Wei" Shelf of Huaxu Academy's archives.

10001604.Name: Rover's Waveband
10001604.Desc: Can be used to activate Rover: Havoc's Resonance Chain.
10001604.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless invisible Wavebands. When the Remnant Wavebands are compiled to form a complete Resonance Chain, their Forte receives an upgrade in power.

50000169.Name: Pioneer Association Sigil Supply
50000169.Desc: Provides the Pioneer Podcast's exclusive Sigil.
50000169.Bg: "Would you like a unique Sigil that stands out? Sign up for our Connoisseur Channel today!"

50000170.Name: Ginkgo: Syntonize Supply
50000170.Desc: Provides an exclusive Syntonize Material for the Golden Eternal series weapon.

50005.Name: Forging Tide
50005.Desc: Used to Convene one time in Featured Weapon Convene.
50005.Bg: "Above the waves, I cry out loud. Brilliant ripples, answers found. With you, my blade, I shall ascend. In shimmering waves, our bond won't end."

70139319.Name: Yellowed Sketch
70139319.Desc: Sketch Obtained in the camp of the Séance Society.
70139319.Bg: A sketch drawn with a naive stroke, pressed between faded leaves of a damaged diary. It portrays a family of four and separate image on each one.

70139320.Name: Peculiar Blake Bloom
70139320.Bg: Identity mark used by members of the Black Shores. You can feel the surge of Remnant Energy when carrying it with your hands.

50000201.Name: Originite Weapon Supply Chest
50000201.Desc:
Open to claim one Originite series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Broadblade#41 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sword#18 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Pistols#26 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Gauntlets#21D *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Rectifier#25 *1</color>
50000201.Bg: The special supply chest obtained from Shilang in the Tiger's Maw.

42500070.Name: Standard Weapon Mold
42500070.Bg: A rare crafting material with extremely high plasticity. Can be used for the manufacture of various weapons.

80000032.Name: Happiness Tea
80000032.Desc: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000032.Bg: One of the traditional handmade drinks of Huanglong, implying "double happiness". The method of making it is simple, just dry the fresh Honeysuckle, stir-fry it with Lemongrass, and pour it into boiling water. Add a little Caltrop before drinking to add sweetness. The finished product is sour and sweet, with a slightly bitter aftertaste, which helps digestion, so it is often seen on the festival table.

80010032.Name: Happiness Tea Recipe
80010032.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Happiness Tea.
80010032.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Happiness Tea.

80001000.Name: Liondance Companion
80001000.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 120, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001000.Bg: Snacks Lingyang made for the Liondance audience. The treats were a perfect combination of fatty and lean meats, complemented by fruits and vegetables to balance out the heaviness. Ideal for enjoying while watching the performance.

80001002.Name: Iced Perilla
80001002.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 12%, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001002.Bg: In moments of research block, Baizhi turns to the chilled Perilla she always has on hand for a refreshing pause. The cool, herbal flavor soothes her senses and helps calm her racing thoughts. As she finishes her plate, her mind clears and she's able to refocus on her work with renewed determination.

80001004.Name: Silky Reveries
80001004.Bg: The delicious scent of Loong Whiskers Crisp enveloped Danjin as she bit into the perfectly crisp exterior, her teeth sinking into the dreamy floss coating. Despite her love for this sweet treat, she always wished for more. The kind stall owner suggested adding extra ingredients to enhance the sweetness even further, a tempting offer that Danjin couldn't resist.

80001005.Name: Ration Bar
80001005.Desc: Reduces Cooldown for Grapple by 30% for a selected Resonator in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001005.Bg: Calcharo has a fondness for Huanglong's Food Ration Bar. He believes it efficiently satisfies basic energy needs in the wild and has a unique taste. To cater to some of the younger merc's preferences, Calcharo has enhanced the bar by adding dried fruits, sugar beans, and various seasonings, creating a variety of flavors.

80001008.Name: Sanqing Tea
80001008.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001008.Bg: The Sanqing tea from Yuanwu Boxing Gym has healing properties, aiding the spleen, lungs, and alleviating worries. A cup after a boxing session boosts blood flow and circulation while soothing the mind. The perfect combination of exercise and tea brings a sense of inner peace, momentarily freeing one from mundane concerns and desires.

80001012.Name: Crystal Clear Buns
80001012.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001012.Bg: Sanhua revamped the traditional ingredients used in Loong Buns, creating a refreshing and translucent treat perfect for cooling down during hot summers. This delicacy quickly became a staple on the City Hall's tables, winning over the hearts of all visitors... and the Jinzhou Magistrate herself.

80001014.Name: Yesterday in Jinzhou
80001014.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 8% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001014.Bg: While many may turn up their noses at General Jiyan's cooking, the Midnight Rangers, a group of experienced soldiers, savor each bite. The stew is brimming with hearty vegetables and sparing on meat, a reminder of their past battles on the frontlines. Its familiar flavors evoke a sense of nostalgia for their time as warriors, making it a treasured dish among these old soldiers.

80001016.Name: Fluffy Wuthercake
80001016.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001016.Bg: A Wuthercake made with Yangyang's special formula. It incorporates whipped egg whites instead of the usual yolks. The result? A fluffy and tender treat that is both delicious and nutritious, thanks to the addition of berry jam. This revamped recipe caters to all ages, from seniors to picky kids, making it a satisfying indulgence for everyone.

80001017.Name: Golden Fried Rice
80001017.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming stamina consumption for all Resonators in the team by 24% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001017.Bg: Fried rice is a staple dish for beginner cooks, but only those with a discerning palate can master it to perfection. Yinlin, accustomed to the affluent and refined through her job, has developed a taste for the finest cuisine. This golden fried rice, made with humble ingredients but expert skill, is her favorite. It embodies what she values most in cooking - the ability to turn simplicity into excellence.

80001020.Name: Floral Porridge
80001020.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 24%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001020.Bg: Gently simmer the rice over low heat, adding a few delicate flower petals for flavor. As it begins to lightly boil, this simple yet sweet dish becomes a favorite snack for Taoqi when relaxing at home. With each slow sip, it seems to wash away the accumulated fatigue of the day, leaving a refreshing feeling in its wake.

80001021.Name: Baa Baa Crisp
80001021.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001021.Bg: After multiple attempts, Encore triumphantly created a dish she was pleased with. Golden and crunchy, each bite resembled a miniature lamb. And after indulging, one would surely dream of frolicking among sheep. With this culinary masterpiece, there's no need to fret — it can be savored without hesitation.

80001023.Name: Lotus Seed Soup
80001023.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 33%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001023.Bg: Maintaining a healthy body is crucial. The combination of gold and silver lotus seeds in this recipe provides warmth, nourishment, and a calming effect on both the body and mind. It was the first medicinal meal Jianxin learned during her mountain retreat and remains one of her go-to recipes for overall health and well-being.

80001024.Name: Smoked Pigeon
80001024.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 55%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001024.Bg: Mortefi's signature dish, created during his time wandering in the wilderness. Despite early struggles with controlling his powers, he has now mastered the art of cooking it. A perfect balance of crispy outer layer and tender interior, it boasts a sweet and fragrant flavor while maintaining the freshness of the meat itself.

80001025.Name: Champion Hotpot
80001025.Desc: Increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001025.Bg: A steaming hot pot filled to the brim with Victor Savor, known for its spicy and flavorful taste. Chixia claims it is the best hot pot in the world. However, for those who can't handle the spiciness... caution is advised before trying.

80001029.Name: Green Field Pot
80001029.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 44%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001029.Bg: Verina's prized Morri Pot brims with a delectable blend of freshly grown vegetables and herbs. Her meticulous care and patience in breeding and preparing these ingredients result in a uniquely delicious taste. Through the growth of her plants, she witnesses the beauty of life cycles, and in cooking, she finds joy in the anticipation of harvest.

80001032.Name: Misty Tea
80001032.Desc: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 14% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001032.Bg:
This tea is a favorite of Aalto's. As the water in the pot turns to mist and then back into water in the cup, the aroma of the tea is coupled with the soothing mist.
"Now, let's get down to business."
It seems Aalto's mastery of tea-making is just one of his many skills in the business world.

42100001.Name: Fusion Resistance Spray
42100001.Desc: Increases Fusion DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100001.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100002.Name: Aero Resistance Spray
42100002.Desc: Increases Aero DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100002.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100003.Name: Electro Resistance Spray
42100003.Desc: Increases Electro DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100003.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100004.Name: Glacio Resistance Spray
42100004.Desc: Increases Glacio DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100004.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100005.Name: Spectro Resistance Spray
42100005.Desc: Increases Spectro DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100005.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100006.Name: Havoc Resistance Spray
42100006.Desc: Increases Havoc DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100006.Bg: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.

42100007.Name: Fusion Petrol
42100007.Desc: Increases Fusion DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100007.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100008.Name: Aero Petrol
42100008.Desc: Increases Aero DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100008.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100009.Name: Electro Petrol
42100009.Desc: Increases Electro DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100009.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100010.Name: Glacio Petrol
42100010.Desc: Increases Glacio DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100010.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100011.Name: Spectro Petrol
42100011.Desc: Increases Spectro DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100011.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100012.Name: Havoc Petrol
42100012.Desc: Increases Havoc DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100012.Bg: A compound potion that enhances offensive capabilities. It combines a potion efficacy catalyst with different solution developed for different resonance properties. When not in use, the two compounds separate naturally and need to be shaken well before use and then applied to the weapon.

42100013.Name: Basic Revival Inhaler
42100013.Desc: Used to immediately revive and heal a selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100013.Bg: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

42100014.Name: Medium Revival Inhaler
42100014.Desc: Used to immediately revive and heal 10% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100014.Bg: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

42100015.Name: Advanced Revival Inhaler
42100015.Desc: Used to immediately revive and heal 25% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100015.Bg: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

42100016.Name: Premium Revival Inhaler
42100016.Desc: Used to immediately revive and heal 100% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100016.Bg: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.

42100017.Name: Basic Nutrient Block
42100017.Desc: Used to heal 10% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 500 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100017.Bg:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

42100018.Name: Medium Nutrient Block
42100018.Desc: Used to heal 15% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 1,000 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100018.Bg:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

42100019.Name: Advanced Nutrient Block
42100019.Desc: Used to heal 20% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 1,500 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100019.Bg:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

42100021.Name: Premium Nutrient Block
42100021.Desc: Used to heal 30% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 2,000 HP. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100021.Bg:
A sugar cube supplement made from concentrated precious nutrients. Its active ingredients can be quickly absorbed by the human body.
Sweet and delicious, it's a favorite among children.

42100022.Name: Basic Energy Bag
42100022.Desc: Used to heal a selected Resonator in the team for 100 HP per second over 30s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op.
42100022.Bg:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.
“An energy supply in your pocket. A must-have for adventures."

42100023.Name: Medium Energy Bag
42100023.Desc: Used to heal a selected Resonator in the team for 150 HP per second over 30s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op.
42100023.Bg:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.
“An energy supply in your pocket. A must-have for adventures."

42100024.Name: Advanced Energy Bag
42100024.Desc: Used to heal 2% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 200 HP per second over 30s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100024.Bg:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.
“An energy supply in your pocket. A must-have for adventures."

42100025.Name: Premium Energy Bag
42100025.Desc: Used to heal 3% of a selected Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 300 HP per second over 30s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100025.Bg:
Portable liquid supplements filled using an advanced process that provides a quick and easy way to recharge and rejuvenate.
“An energy supply in your pocket. A must-have for adventures."

42100026.Name: Supersonic Solvent
42100026.Desc: Reduces Echo Skill Cooldown of a selected Resonator in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100026.Bg:
A solid solvent made using a special process allows the user to use Echo Skill more frequently.
“I run faster after taking this, which means I must have gotten lighter, which means I have gotten thinner... So does it mean it's also a weight-loss product?”

42100027.Name: Trainer Solvent
42100027.Desc: Increases Echo Skill DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100027.Bg:
A solid solvent created using a special process that boosts the Echo Skill you cast.
Said to be invented by a self-proclaimed aspiring Echo Training Master.

42100028.Name: String Solvent
42100028.Desc: Grants a selected Resonator in the team 1 Concerto Energy per second for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100028.Bg: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one tablet can put the whole squad in a melodious melody and follow the music to finish the battle gracefully.

42100029.Name: Drummer Solvent
42100029.Desc: Boosts Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100029.Bg: Using a solid solvent made by a special process. Just one table can make the entire squad's ears ring with a thrilling rhythm, as if they were holding drumsticks instead of weapons.

42100031.Name: Potion No. 5
42100031.Desc: Used to heal 20% of the current Resonator's Max HP, plus an extra 160 HP.
42100031.Bg: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

42100032.Name: Morale Tablets
42100032.Desc: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to additionally reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100032.Bg: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

42100033.Name: Harmony Tablets
42100033.Desc: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skill within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100033.Bg: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

42100034.Name: Passion Tablets
42100034.Desc: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 5 Resonance Energy when they successfully Dodge an attack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100034.Bg: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

42100035.Name: Vigor Tablets
42100035.Desc: Grants a selected Resonator in the team immunity to the next fatal damage and heals 25% of the Resonator's Max HP, lasting for 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100035.Bg: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.

50000063.Name: Morphable Echo
50000063.Desc:
Can be used to obtain a random collected Echo.
Upgrade the Data Bank to increase your chance of getting Echoes of higher Rarity.
50000063.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000171.Name: 5-star Weapon Supply Chest
50000171.Desc:
Open to claim one 5-star Winter Brume series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Lustrous Razor *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Emerald of Genesis *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Static Mist *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Abyss Surges *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cosmic Ripples *1</color>

42500080.Name: Gilded Ginkgo
42500080.Desc: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Golden Eternal weapons.
42500080.Bg: A beautiful jade has been carved into the shape of a ginkgo leaf.

70010069.Name: Obscure Recipe
70010069.Desc: A recipe detailing the ingredients and method for Jade Treasure Soup.
70010069.Bg: A recipe found in an old book by Panhua, it is said that following this recipe can recreate the long-lost wartime dish, the Jade Treasure Soup that people describe as “a condensed bowl of Jinzhou". However, through time, the terms written in the recipe have become obscure and difficult to understand. Before cooking, it is necessary to further confirm the specific ingredients.

70010070.Name: Mahe Special Ingredient Pack
70010070.Desc: Special ingredient pack for cooking Jade Treasure Soup.
70010070.Bg: The grocer Mahe, who has traveled far and wide, has identified and prepared an ingredient pack according to the recipe. This pack contains all the ingredients needed to make the Jade Treasure Soup.

70010071.Name: Koko's special "Luohan Clearwater"
70010071.Desc: Special potion used for cooking Jade Treasure Soup.
70010071.Bg: Luohan Clearwater, an unrecognizable term for Mahe, is used among pharmacies years ago, referring to the potion made by boiling Coriolus, Perilla, and Lemongrass. To make the Jade Treasure Soup, Koko gave you a portion.

51001.Name: Traveler's EXP Aid
51001.Bg: These resources come from all over Solaris-3, delivered on time by Lollo Logistics for customers. When traveling in dangerous areas, mutual support is indispensable for safe travel.

51002.Name: Sage's EXP Support
51002.Bg: These resources come from all over Solaris-3, delivered on time by Lollo Logistics for customers. When traveling in dangerous areas, mutual support is indispensable for safe travel.

51003.Name: Gardener's Aid
51003.Desc: Basic Weapon Skill Ascension Material Bundle
51003.Bg: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

51004.Name: Blake Bloom's Aid
51004.Desc: Advanced Weapon Skill Ascension Material Bundle
51004.Bg: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

51005.Name: Blake Bloom's Data Aid
51005.Bg: Among various supply services, some supply providers are particularly mysterious, such as the Black Shores. No one knows how it obtains these supplies, but the quality is indeed excellent.

72010001.Name: Abandoned Data Chip from Norfall Barrens
72010001.Desc: Data chip collected from Norfall Barrens
72010001.Bg: Ages had marked themselves on their surface. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010002.Name: Torn pages from Port City of Guixu
72010002.Desc: Torn pages collected from Port City of Guixu
72010002.Bg: They carry a deserted story and some nostalgic memories. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010003.Name: Torn pages from Gorges of Spirits
72010003.Desc: Torn pages collected from Gorges of Spirits
72010003.Bg: They seem to be anecdotes from some kind of folklore. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010004.Name: Torn pages from Central Plains
72010004.Desc: Torn pages collected in Central Plains.
72010004.Bg: Seems like it is frequently leafed through, as many fingerprints are left on the pages. The storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these.

72010005.Name: Abandoned Data Chip from Whining Aix's Mire
72010005.Desc: Data collected from Whining Aix's Mire.
72010005.Bg: They seem to come from a diary of a courier. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010006.Name: Torn pages from Desorock Highland
72010006.Desc: Torn pages collected from Desorock Highland
72010006.Bg: These letters home are someone's messenger. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010007.Name: Abandoned Data Chip from Tiger's Maw
72010007.Desc: Data chip collected from Tiger's Maw.
72010007.Bg: They are casual daily records by the staff at the Mine. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these.

72010008.Name: Aircraft Accident Report
72010008.Desc: Data Chip collected from Norfall Barrens
72010008.Bg: It's an investigation report without an exact date. You can now read it after the Storyteller has repaired it, though this may take effort.

72010009.Name: As the Express through the Rain
72010009.Desc: Torn pages collected from Port City of Guixu.
72010009.Bg: "All our dreams disappear in the heavy rain, as they evaporate in the aching land."

72010010.Name: Jinzhou Folklore Journal
72010010.Desc: Torn pages collected from Gorges of Spirits.
72010010.Bg: "The culture and spirit of Jinzhou all included in this book, begins with the battle in the Gorges of Spirits."

72010011.Name: Study on Mythical Beasts in Huanglong
72010011.Desc: Torn pages collected from Central Plains.
72010011.Bg: "Here comes a beast, akin to a lion. It exudes might and intellect, embraces a human's act..."

72010012.Name: Lo, Lo, Lollo Logistics!
72010012.Desc: Data Chip collected from Whining Aix's Mire.
72010012.Bg: "Lo, Lo, Lollo Logistics! I want to be a proud courier today!"

72010013.Name: Untitled Family Letters
72010013.Desc: Torn pages collected from around Desorock Highland.
72010013.Bg: "I miss you too, with all my body and soul. I would remember this till the end of life, and carve those names upon an eternal stone."

72010014.Name: Strange Messages
72010014.Desc: Data Chip collected from Tiger's Maw.
72010014.Bg: "I received a message the other day. Why would I receive these messages..."

72010015.Name: Dim Forest Data
72010015.Desc: Data Chip collected from Dim Forest
72010015.Bg: They come from Researchers' journals, with annotations from some acquaintance. The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these fragments.

72010016.Name: Dim Forest Survey Team Diary
72010016.Bg: "Fortunately, we now have more time to ponder."

80021001.Name: Base Fluid
80021001.Bg: It is widely used as a base liquid in various preparations.

80021002.Name: Fluid Catalyst
80021002.Bg: Catalytic fluids that can accelerate the onset of action of all types of potions.

80021003.Name: Strong Fluid Catalyst
80021003.Bg: Powerful catalytic fluids that can significantly accelerate the onset of action of all types of formulations.

80021004.Name: Fluid Stabilizer
80021004.Bg: Stabilizing fluids that improve the reliability of all types of potions.

80021005.Name: Strong Fluid Stabilizer
80021005.Bg: Strong stabilizing fluids that significantly improve the reliability of all types of potions.

80021006.Name: Premium Incense Oil
80021006.Desc: An ingredient used to cook special dishes.
80021006.Bg:
An extremely rare seasoning with an unrivaled aroma that fills your nose once the bottle is uncorked.
It is said this seasoning not only enhances the dish's flavor but also, depending on the ingredients used, changes one's perceptions in a particular way.
 "What do I smell? It smells so good..."
 "Oh, I know... It's the aroma of motor oil! The best I've ever smelled!"
 "Huh?"

80021007.Name: Premium Gold Incense Oil
80021007.Desc: An advanced ingredient used to cook special dishes.
80021007.Bg:
An extremely rare seasoning with an unrivaled aroma that fills your nose once the bottle is uncorked.
It is said this seasoning not only enhances the dish's flavor but also, depending on the ingredients used, changes one's perceptions in a particular way.
 "What do I smell? It smells so good..."
 "Oh, I know... It's the aroma of motor oil! The best I've ever smelled!"
 "Huh?""

50000064.Name: Morphable Echo - Freezing Frost
50000064.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Freezing Frost.
2pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50000064.Bg: Chills are emanating from the crevice...

50000065.Name: Morphable Echo - Molten Rift
50000065.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Molten Rift.
2pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.
50000065.Bg: Flames are flickering and rising in the crevice...

50000066.Name: Morphable Echo - Void Thunder
50000066.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Void Thunder.
2pcs Set: Electro DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Electro DMG + 15% after releasing Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill. This effect stacks up to 2 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50000066.Bg: Thunder is rumbling in the crevice...

50000067.Bg: A gust of wind is howling through the crevice...

50000068.Bg: Dazzling rays of light are emanating from the crevice...

5pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50000069.Bg: The chaos seems to devour everything in the crevice...

50000070.Name: Morphable Echo - Rejuvenating Glow
50000070.Desc:

2pcs Set: Healing Bonus + 10%.

5pcs Set: Increases the ATK of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.
50000070.Bg: The breath from the crevice brings peace and calm...

5pcs Set: After using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.
50000071.Bg: A bright moon seems to hide in the crevice...

5pcs Set: While on the field, ATK increases by 5% every 1.5s. This effect stacks up to 4 times. Outro Skill DMG + 60%.
50000072.Bg: Mysterious melodies echo endless from the crevice...

13.Desc: Obtained from completing Survey Tasks. Survey Points can be exchanged for various rewards in the Wuthering Exploration event.
