42310200.Name: Pavo Plum
42310200.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42310200.Bg:
Berries resembling feathers, the people of Hongzhen call them Linglong Hearts.
They have an incredibly spicy taste and are said to be able to refresh the mind and enhance intelligence when consumed.

42310210.Name: Loong's Pearl
42310210.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42310210.Bg: A tranquil flower, casting its gentle radiance amidst the shadows.

42310220.Name: Silver Lotus
42310220.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42310220.Bg: A resilient lotus blossoming amidst the freezing snow. When cooked with other ingredients, it can offer solace and warmth to those in need of comfort from the cold.

42500090.Name: Fluorite
42500090.Bg: An ore bearing a likeness to the Sentinel's scale. Can be used to repair weapons.

40040002.Name: Windchimer
40040002.Desc: Exchangeable for resources when delivered to Xian'ge.
40040002.Bg: An ingenious gadget that captures sounds and transforms them into energy. It can be used in tuning. It is said to be of great interests to some collectors, who'd provide resources in exchange for them.

70139323.Name: Chrono Sign
70139323.Desc: A key used to open the Woodveil Hall laboratory.
70139323.Bg: The Court of Savantae Committee left many mysteries in Mt. Firmament: its unfinished research buried deep in the mountains and the ending that befell the researchers. Perhaps you'll be able to uncover these dust-sealed secrets with this key.

70139324.Name: Stories of Guqin
70139324.Desc: A book obtained at Mt. Firmament.
70139324.Bg:
"In this vast expanse, every goodbye could be a farewell for life.
Be well. Farewell."

50000084.Name: Morphable Overlord Class Echo
50000084.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000085.Name: Morphable Elite Class Echo
50000085.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000086.Name: Morphable Common Class Echo
50000086.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

70140003.Name: Ultrasonic Pulse Chip
70140003.Desc: Release a powerful vortex to cleanse muds and the mud shield of Tacet Discords.
70140003.Bg: Developed by Huaxu Academy, this chip can release vortex flow and facilitate researches surrounding the Whining Aix's Mire.

70139325.Name: Cipher Key
70139325.Desc: An energy device crafted by the Court of Savantae. Can be used to disable the sealing device of Mianloong Chamber.
70139325.Bg: Those blessed by the deity aspired to raise a gate, however modest it may seem to the divine eyes. Even in its decay, the solitary gate stood sentinel: upholding reverence, for the divine is near.

14.Name: Preparation Credits
14.Desc: A written order for materials with an inventory schedule attached. Used for Wishes. Automatically restored to 100 at 04:00.
14.Bg: The supplies prepared for the Moonlit Fair must be meticulously planned and allocated to ensure they fulfill as many wishes as possible.
Source: Wishing Stall (Complete Wish Upon the Moon IV to unlock)
Automatically restores to the full at 04:00 a.m.

15.Name: Operation Fund
15.Desc: Funds prepared for the Moonlit Fair that are used for construction or Wishes.
15.Bg: You can never have too many funds if you want to hold a grand festival.

16.Name: Wish
16.Desc: The Wish Tag of a fulfilled wish. Used to improve characters' stats.
16.Bg: Completed Wish Tags are stored carefully as invaluable mementos to everyone who has worked hard to make the Moonlit Fair possible.
Source: Xiang-LEE (Complete Wish Upon the Moon IV to unlock)

17.Name: Popularity
17.Desc: Popularity Points are gained by completing Wishes. They indicate how successful the Moonlit Fair is.
17.Bg: An objective overview of the number of visitors at the Moonlit Fair and their feedback, gathered through big data analysis, anonymous questionnaires, community reviews, and random street interviews.

18.Name: Palace Lantern
18.Desc: A common souvenir of the Moon-Chasing Festival that can be exchanged for exclusive rewards.
18.Bg: Perfect for holding in one's hand, this small and exquisite lantern is usually given out as souvenirs during the festival.

71030001.Name: Ashen Dream
71030001.Desc: An item obtained from defeating Scar in Somnoire.
71030001.Bg:
"I don't want to be your enemy, nor do I actually plan to destroy anything.
Let me make it clear for you: destruction is not my end goal. It's not even a matter of anyone's desires, but an inevitable conclusion.
Embrace IT. You will come to realize that resistance is futile."

80000033.Name: Lotus Pastry
80000033.Desc: Increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 32%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000033.Bg:
One of the specialties in Mt. Firmament. It resembles the fruit of the Silver Lotus. In fact, the residents of Mt. Firmament do incorporate Silver Lotus into this pastry.
It is said that the Silver Lotus only grows in thick snow, blooming amidst the cold. The residents on Mt. Firmament believe that this flower blooms in deep snow to show gratitude to the forest and to uphold a belief in eternal blossoming. Thus, they have wrapped this promise within this pastry. As the stars rise and the moon sets, as snow falls and melts, the people of Mt. Firmament will never forget their promises.

80000034.Name: Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums
80000034.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000034.Bg:
This dish features meat stir-fried with a generous amount of Pavo Plums. It's flavorful yet not greasy, aromatic, and spicy. It's an essential, simple dish to help you get through a lengthy winter.
"Want it tasty? Just add more Pavo Plums. It has to be spicy! The spiciness is key to its flavor!"

80001033.Name: Spring Pastry
80001033.Desc: Increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 36%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001033.Bg:
Jinhsi's modified version of Lotus Pastry, a special dessert in Mt. Firmament.
As snow blankets the landscape, wishes drift down with the snowfall, settling quietly in the woods.
Though the snow continues to fall, it will eventually be swept away by the spring breeze, and the wishes buried deep in the snow will bloom like flowers.

80001034.Name: Blazing Feather Spicy Meat
80001034.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 24%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001034.Bg:
Changli's favorite dish, which is made with extra chili.
The vibrant redness hints at its intense flavor, which seems to leap out of the bowl. Served alongside rice and a cup of osmanthus syrup, amidst the bustling ambiance of Capital Mingting, it provides a heavenly culinary experience.
While few in Mingting, apart from Changli, venture to taste this delicacy, it's a cherished household favorite among families in Hongzhen. Accompanied by wine, it adds an extra layer of warmth to the dining experience.

80010033.Name: Recipe: Lotus Pastry
80010033.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Lotus Pastry.
80010033.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Lotus Pastry.

80010034.Name: Recipe: Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums
80010034.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums.
80010034.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Spicy Meat with Pavo Plums.

19.Name: Lollo Stamp
19.Desc: The voucher used to redeem the Lollo Helper special delivery.
19.Bg:
Thank you for being a Lollo Helper!
To express our gratitude, we'd love to present you with a Lollo Stamp. You can use it to exchange for your Lollo Helper special delivery at the designated Lollo Logistics stations.

10001304.Name: Jinhsi's Waveband
10001304.Desc: Can be used to activate Jinhsi's Resonance Chain.
10001304.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001205.Name: Changli's Waveband
10001205.Desc: Can be used to activate Changli's Resonance Chain.
10001205.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400144.Name: Sentinel's Dagger
41400144.Desc: Sentinel Jué's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400144.Bg:
A ritual vessel gifted by Sentinel Jué.
Legend holds that upon the Lament's arrival in Jinzhou, time became entangled, with no more clear line between mornings and nights.
The Magistrate used the Sentinel's dagger as the gnomon of the sundial to determine the date and time.

70139329.Name: Glazed Lamp
70139329.Desc: A key item in the Rite of Offering. Can be used to activate the Altar of Initiation.
70139329.Bg: An ancient lamp crafted from special minerals. Its luminous blue radiance flickers ceaselessly, as if infused with boundless energy that endures through the ages.

70139326.Name: Changli's Letter
70139326.Desc: A letter penned by Changli, containing a message for you.
70139326.Bg:
With a subtle delightful scent, it reads: "Behold Hongzhen in its entirety, next to a ring and hanging eaves. When eternal snow thaws into flowing streams, let us reconvene."
It appears to be an invitation.

70139327.Name: Feather Pendant
70139327.Desc: A feather pendant left behind by Changli.
70139327.Bg:
Warm and weightless, it gently lands in your palm.
Its purpose remains a mystery.

70139328.Name: Flame Feather Pendant
70139328.Desc: A flame feather warm to the touch, bestowed by Changli. It symbolizes a cherished sentiment.
70139328.Bg: Through relentless practice, the most brilliant flames born of Forte are condensed into a flame feather nestled in your palm. Radiating a warmth akin to the touch of its creator, it shields the carrier from the harm of Flame Manipulation. This gift is reserved solely for the most significant individual.

70140004.Name: Trace Scale
70140004.Desc: A unique item that unlocks Scale of Past when equipped.
70140004.Bg: A crystal-clear scale that seems to reveal a different world within. It possesses an ability called Chrono Trace, which records surrounding time and space, allowing them to be revisited in the future. It is said to have intricate connections with Sentinel Jué.

70139330.Name: Pavo Plum Sample
70139330.Desc: A Pavo Plum sample collected near the hot spring. It should come in handy for Bing'ge.
70139330.Bg: Like Pavo Plums found elsewhere, this fruit looks incredibly delicious. However, knowing its taste, you wouldn't be quick to eat it.

70010072.Name: The Second Coming of Solaris in-game redemption code.
70010072.Desc: An in-game item redemption code that can be used to redeem Second Coming of Solaris x Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack.
70010072.Bg:
The collaboration between Jewel Boba and the Pioneer Association's Second Coming of Solaris has begun, bringing exclusive "jewels" to Second Coming of Solaris!
This secret key includes an in-game item redemption code, which can be used to claim the exclusive Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack in the game client.

50000087.Name: Morphable Echo
50000087.Desc:
Can be used to obtain a random collected Echo.
Upgrade the Data Bank to increase your chance of getting Echoes of higher Rarity.
50000087.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

42310230.Name: Nova
42310230.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42310230.Bg: An unstable crystal precipitated out of highly concentrated Remnant Energy. It is so unsteady that it starts to sublimate as soon as it is formed, disappearing into thin air as energy. Its existence reminds one of the transience of the life of a Nova.

42310240.Name: Sea Flytrap
42310240.Bg: A translucent shellfish, known as the "sea flytrap." It has a body composed of a dense gelatinous substance. It uses the luminescent pearl-like objects on its body to lure in and prey on marine organisms.

50000088.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo I
50000088.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Freezing Frost Set: Lumiscale Construct (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Molten Rift Set: Viridblaze Saurian (Fusion DMG Bonus)
Void Thunder Set: Violet-Feathered Heron (Electro DMG Bonus)
Sierra Gale Set: Hoochief (Aero DMG Bonus)
Celestial Light Set: Lightcrusher (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Havoc DMG Bonus)
50000088.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000089.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo II
50000089.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Freezing Frost Set: Glacio Dreadmane (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Molten Rift Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Fusion DMG Bonus)
Void Thunder Set: Lumiscale Construct (Electro DMG Bonus)
Sierra Gale Set: Carapace (Aero DMG Bonus)
Celestial Light Set: Cyan-Feathered Heron (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Tambourinist (Havoc DMG Bonus)
50000089.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

6.Name: Waveplate Crystal
6.Desc:
Refined Waveplate with a higher purity.
Waveplate Crystals start to regenerate once Waveplates are full, at the rate of 1 per 12 minutes. Consume to replenish an equal amount of Waveplates.
6.Bg:
Created using the special technology from the Black Shores. An effective form to store and manage Waveplate resources.
"Always be prepared to avoid wastage."

70139331.Name: Activated Chrono Sign
70139331.Desc: While equipped, this allows you to use the Chronopins left by CSC to temporarily slow down time in the surrounding area.
70139331.Bg: Confirming identity, code name: Rover. Top-level access to the Woodveil Hall laboratory granted. May this item guide you to the answers and enlightenment we seek.

20.Name: Tide Note
20.Desc:
A note containing music scores of Solaris's unique music.
Collect a certain number of these notes to claim rewards on the event page.
20.Bg:
In a world constructed out of energy and syntony, all words and stories can be sung in music.
"I came into this world, bringing naught but paper, rope, and a shadow."

50006.Name: Voucher of Reciprocal Tides
50006.Desc: Use to redeem a free chance of Giveback Custom Convene
50006.Bg: Obtained via in-game mail. Use to redeem a free chance to Convene a 5-Star Standard Resonator of your choice in the Giveback Custom Convene. Thank you for choosing to stay with us on the journey forward.

44010029.Name: Phantom: Impermanence Heron
44010029.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

10001305.Name: Xiangli Yao's Waveband
10001305.Desc: Used to activate Xiangli Yao's Sequences.
10001305.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001105.Name: Zhezhi's Waveband
10001105.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

70140021.Name: Skyshaker
70140021.Desc: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. (Only available during the "By Moon's Grace" Event and will be removed from Backpack after the Event ends.)
70140021.Bg: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.

70140022.Name: The Present
70140022.Desc: A folding fan that Zhezhi painted for you.
70140022.Bg: Zhezhi's painting on this fan captures everything that is beautiful about this moment forever. It is her wish that you will recall this beautiful moment when you see this fan no matter where you are.

51006.Name: Magisterial Radiant Aid
51006.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51007.Name: Magisterial Forging Aid
51007.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

70140025.Name: Skyshaker
70140025.Desc: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. (Only available during the "By Moon's Grace" Event and will be removed from Backpack after the Event ends.)
70140025.Bg: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.

80000035.Name: Huanglong Omelette
80000035.Desc: Increases ATK and Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 6% and 10% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000035.Bg:
A common dish that has become a hallmark of Huanglong cuisine. Golden and exquisite, it is a breakfast plate beloved by people of all ages.
As it is always found on the dining tables of Huanglong, most folks see it as an everyday indulgence. But those who have been away from their homes always find themselves longing for its delicate fragrance.

80000036.Name: Plumpcake
80000036.Bg:
A cake that is baked in every kitchen in Huanglong when the Moon-Chasing Festival is around.
Shared on the reunion dinner among the elder and the young, who exchange good wishes in the moonlight sifting through the lush leaves of the osmanthus trees. Over the moon-chasing tale that's been told a thousand times before, everyone bites down on this sweet, fragrant treat and savors the joy of reunion.

80000037.Name: Moon Pearl
80000037.Desc: Increases Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 1000, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000037.Bg:
A signature dessert of the Moon-Chasing Festival, with chewy rice balls served in rich, mellow sweet soup.
While some people pray to the moon for blessings, others put their prayers and blessings into this dessert.
"Reunion is what these Moon Pearls are all about!"

80000038.Name: Moon Brew
80000038.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000038.Bg:
A mellow and refreshing wine enjoyed during the Moon-Chasing Festival.
In Jinzhou, there is a famous play about a person who drinks a thousand cups of wine so that, as he's awake, he can still walk in a dream, for there are places only reachable in the dreamland. The sweet taste enjoyed with closed eyes is the taste of home.

80001035.Name: Vege Omelette
80001035.Desc: Increases ATK and Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001035.Bg:
This nutritionally balanced, simple dish is a breakfast staple in Huanglong and a regular dish found in every household and the breakfast shops in Jinzhou. For someone who has lived in Jinzhou for many years like Xiangli Yao, it is an easy first choice for breakfast.
A sip of tea after a bite perfectly balances the flavors, satisfying your appetite while awakening your taste buds and mind after a deep sleep.

80001001.Name: Sweet Stuffed Flatbread
80001001.Desc: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 220, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001001.Bg: Zhezhi likes her Stuffed Flatbread sweet. She improved on the original recipe by adding her favorite sweetener. This simple, modest pastry restores energy quickly upon consumption and doesn't go bad for a long time. After learning how to make it, Zhezhi always stores lots of it at home and considers it an essential snack for her sketching trips.

80010035.Name: Huanglong Omelette Recipe
80010035.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Huanglong Omelette.
80010035.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Huanglong Omelette.

80010036.Name: Plumpcake Recipe
80010036.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Plumpcake.
80010036.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Plumpcake.

80010037.Name: Moon Pearl Recipe
80010037.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Moon Pearl.
80010037.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Moon Pearl.

80010038.Name: Moon Brew Recipe
80010038.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Moon Brew.
80010038.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Moon Brew.

70140026.Name: Serenity of Xiehua Village
70140026.Desc: A scroll painting that Zhezhi gave you. This is the first scroll painting she has painted with her Forte in many years. The beautiful scenery depicted in the painting seems to give off a different feeling than before.
70140026.Bg: It is an opportunity for encounters, a testimony of shared experiences, a key that opens hearts, and an unforgettable collaboration.

70010073.Name: The Second Coming of Solaris in-game redemption code.
70010073.Desc: An in-game item redemption code that can be used to redeem Second Coming of Solaris x Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack.
70010073.Bg:
The collaboration between Jewel Boba and the Pioneer Association's Second Coming of Solaris has begun, bringing exclusive "jewels" to Second Coming of Solaris!
This secret key includes an in-game item redemption code, which can be used to claim the exclusive Jewel Boba Collaboration Pack in the game client.

44010030.Name: Phantom: Dreamless
44010030.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

10001106.Name: Youhu's Waveband
10001106.Desc: Can be used to activate Youhu's Resonance Chain.
10001106.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001505.Name: The Shorekeeper's Waveband
10001505.Desc: Can be used to activate Shorekeeper's Resonance Chain.
10001505.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400154.Name: Topological Confinement
41400154.Desc: Fallacy of No Return's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400154.Bg: A dataset with an ever-changing topology that serves to create an infinite, eternal representation of reality. The Tethys System created this prison of causality, where unknown variations, including love and hope, are forever trapped.
Source: Fallacy of No Return - Early Access

70050027.Name: Investigation Report on the Quick-Access Portals on the Black Shores
70050027.Bg: A report with an appendix over 10 pages long of meticulous data analysis. Whoever submitted it was conscientious; that much is clear.

51008.Name: Blake Bloom's Radiant Aid
51008.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51009.Name: Blake Bloom's Forging Aid
51009.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

70050040.Name: Sword of Atrocity
70050040.Desc: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for mercy, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
70050040.Bg: What one calls mercy, another experiences as cruelty.

70050041.Name: Sword of Greed
70050041.Desc: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for generosity, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
70050041.Bg: The greedy souls always complain that the world is not generous enough.

70050042.Name: Sword of Ignorance
70050042.Desc: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for wisdom, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
70050042.Bg: True wisdom is always accompanied by an equal measure of folly.

70050043.Name: Sword of Vanity
70050043.Desc: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for honor, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
70050043.Bg: Those who put ends before means only find empty glory.

70050044.Name: Sword of Cowardice
70050044.Desc: A knight's sword, imbued with an obsession for bravery, must be placed in the right Sword Pedestal to seal its power.
70050044.Bg: A coward's heart seeks refuge in the shell of bravery.

71030002.Name: Dream of Chaos
71030002.Desc: An item obtained from defeating Dreamless in Somnoire.
71030002.Bg:
Sweet dreams, bad dreams, ordinary dreams, heroic dreams, empty dreams...
Dreams that collide and fuse before dissipating like foams. At the point of impact, a hazy shadow appears—a projection of the anticipation and premonitions intertwined within...

71030003.Name: The Unworthy Dreams
71030003.Desc: An item obtained from clearing the Nonexistent Dream.
71030003.Bg:
A young woman dreams of the vibrant garden back in her hometown.
An elderly man envisions pouring tea for his late wife, just as he did in their early days together.
Yet IT claims these dreams are worthless, devoid of meaning.
Do you also agree that they should be erased?

70050028.Name: Data Log of Black Shores Staff Forum
70050028.Bg: An incomplete record of a discussion thread on the Black Shores' Staff Forum about the access doors.

40040003.Name: KU-Cass Cartridge
40040003.Desc: Submit it to KU-Cass to raise the Data Hub level.
40040003.Bg:
Game cartridges gathered and distributed by KU-Cass, a small robot active on the Black Shores. Some of the games are discontinued ones. These cartridges are sometimes given as awards in the Black Shores area.
"Why the cartridges if we can make them digital?"
"It's the tradition!"

50000173.Name: Forgery Basic Supply
50000173.Desc:
Open to claim one basic material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare2>Inert Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Impure Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Lento Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Waveworn Residue 210 *1</color>
<color=Rare2>Cadence Seed *1</color>
50000173.Bg: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

50000174.Name: Forgery Medium Supply
50000174.Desc:
Open to claim one medium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare3>Reactive Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Extracted Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Adagio Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Waveworn Residue 226 *1</color>
<color=Rare3>Cadence Bud *1</color>
50000174.Bg: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

50000175.Name: Forgery Advanced Supply
50000175.Desc:
Open to claim one advanced material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Polarized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Refined Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Andante Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Waveworn Residue 235 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Cadence Leaf *1</color>
50000175.Bg: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

50000176.Name: Forgery Premium Supply
50000176.Desc:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Heterized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Flawless Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Presto Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Waveworn Residue 239 *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cadence Blossom*1</color>
50000176.Bg: A special supply chest. Its exterior is made from high-performance materials designed to withstand extreme heat and pressure.

80000039.Name: Fisher's Chowder
80000039.Desc: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 20% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000039.Bg: A thick soup made with fish and dried Sea Flytraps simmered in milk. People in the coastal areas love this hearty and rich dish. With the cold wind blowing in from the sea, what dish could beat a bowl of hot soup?

80000040.Name: Honeysuckle Cake
80000040.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 8% and 12% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000040.Bg: A cake filled with honeysuckle paste, offering a subtle floral aroma and a distinctly sweet taste.

80001039.Name: Creamy Clouds
80001039.Desc: Increases DEF and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 12% and 22% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001039.Bg:
A thick soup beloved by the Shorekeeper made with nothing fancy but the freshly caught seafood commonly found in coastal households. The secret is to add in heavy milk and reduce the soup slowly.
It's little known that the soup was a result of the Shorekeeper's effort to recreate a soup that used to bring her so much comfort. She tried to replicate it to the best of her recollection, but through numerous attempts, she ended up with a recipe with her personal touch. The sweetness of the seafood blends well with a freshly toasted slice of bread. Its warmth soothes fatigue and soul... Maybe that's what that person meant by a "simple but certain" happiness.

80001040.Name: Frostwork Cake
80001040.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 10% and 16% respectively, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001040.Bg:
Snacks kept by Youhu in her ice cauldron, always cool to the touch. 
It’s difficult for Youhu to find food and accommodations while she travels around Solaris hunting for antiquities. These tasty cakes are what keep her from starving at times like these.
Youhu likes to put fruits in the cauldron too. As a result, the moist crusts of the cakes always gives off the faint fragrance of the seasonal fruits.

80010039.Name: Fisher's Chowder Recipe
80010039.Desc: Use it to learn how to make Fisher's Chowder
80010039.Bg: A detailed recipe for Fisher's Chowder

80010040.Name: Honeysuckle Cake Recipe
80010040.Desc: Use it to learn how to make Honeysuckle Cakes
80010040.Bg: A detailed recipe for Honeysuckle Cakes

70120007.Name: The Forgotten Blake Bloom
70120007.Desc: An abandoned Blake Bloom in a cave.
70120007.Bg: This Blake Bloom once symbolized Lady Flora's role as a Bloom Bearer. However, its owner left it behind on the Black Shores.

70050045.Name: Crushed Candy
70050045.Desc:
Increases Echo drop rate by 50% for 30m.
A gift from Painter: Thank you, my best audience.
70050045.Bg: How could this happen... I had kept it safe for so long, yet now it's crushed—perhaps I should blame that little stumble during the Night Reveries. Still, I hope you'll accept it, as it's a small token of my gratitude.

24.Name: Stardust
24.Desc: A special material. A reward will be granted after you've gathered a certain number of them.
24.Bg:
Tiny shards of stars that long lost their blaze.
Observe and deduce, and in time, you'll find the entire history of Solaris in even the tiniest of fragments.
"For eons, she has been a solitary caretaker of stars, old or new, dead or alive."

50000177.Name: Deep Sky Blazar Weapon Chest
50000177.Desc:
Open to claim one Deep Sky Blazar series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4> Waning Redshift *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Endless Collapse *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Relativistic Jet *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Celestial Spiral *1</color>
<color=Rare4> Fusion Accretion *1</color>
50000177.Bg:
A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This weapon takes its name from an active galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos.

No matter where you are, the starlight of the shores will always guide your way.

70140012.Name: Stellar Matrix's Core
70140012.Desc: The core of a Stellar Matrix, where records of the key indicators of the Lament are compressed into. Upload it at the Modulation Hall to retrieve the data.
70140012.Bg: If the stars ever cry, they must sound like the wrenching wails stilled in this cosmic relic.

70140013.Name: "Starlight"
70140013.Desc: A Blake Bloom that symbolizes the supreme authority of the Black Shores, donned by the leader of the organization.
70140013.Bg: She has seen all the stars, journeying to the end of time and space and back. This gleaming star kept her company, a speck of blooming stardust illuminating the night sky and guiding her way home. Listen closely to hear echoes of her prescence.

70140014.Name: KU-Money's Personal Collection
70140014.Desc: A music player in which the Black Shores merchant KU-Money keeps a playlist of personal favorites.
70140014.Bg: Even a merchant who handles millions every day listens to music to relax. Of course, it's up to you to decide what the value of this music player is.

70140015.Name: Model HL-1
70140015.Desc: A device used by the Black Shores to monitor the status of each of the Sentinels. This model bears the serial HL-1. The meter reads 0.
70140015.Bg: It is the Black Shores' duty to monitor the Sentinels, who are at the forefront of keeping the Lament and Threnodians at bay—yet it seems some have found ways to evade their surveillance.

40040004.Name: Sonance Casket: Ragunna
40040004.Desc: Sonance Caskets in Ragunna are often found in precarious locations. Use Grapple for easier access. Deliver them to the Plushies in the Garden of the Lost in exchange for resources.
40040004.Bg: The product of a collapsed Sonoro Sphere, scattered all over the world. It records the untwisted memories of the past. The Plushies are collecting them—perhaps they'll have something in exchange.

50000090.Name: Molded Elite Class Echo I
50000090.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.
 
List of Echoes:
Rejuvenating Glow Set: Rocksteady Guardian (Energy Regen)
Moonlit Clouds Set: Stonewall Bracer (Energy Regen)
Lingering Tunes Set: Spearback (Energy Regen)
Freezing Frost Set: Lumiscale Construct (Energy Regen)
Molten Rift Set: Viridblaze Saurian (Energy Regen)
Void Thunder Set: Violet-Feathered Heron (Energy Regen)
Sierra Gale Set: Hoochief (Energy Regen)
Celestial Light Set: Lightcrusher (Energy Regen)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
50000090.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

50000091.Name: Molded Elite Class Echo II
50000091.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Rejuvenating Glow Set: Chasm Guardian (Energy Regen)
Moonlit Clouds Set: Spearback (Energy Regen)
Lingering Tunes Set: Flautist (Energy Regen)
Freezing Frost Set: Glacio Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
Molten Rift Set: Havoc Dreadmane (Energy Regen)
Void Thunder Set: Lumiscale Construct (Energy Regen)
Sierra Gale Set: Carapace (Energy Regen)
Celestial Light Set: Cyan-Feathered Heron (Energy Regen)
Havoc Eclipse Set: Tambourinist (Energy Regen)
50000091.Bg: The echoes within the rift are hard to discern.

70050046.Name: Innocent Dreams
70050046.Desc: A toy made from unknown materials, capable of detecting weak but warm frequencies.
70050046.Bg:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in the event "Fairy Tale’s Finale." It’s a fitting gift for a brave soul like you.
A beautiful glass ball that looks somewhat familiar to you.
You can sense weak but warm frequencies pulsating from the miniature landscape inside it. Yet, it's still unclear what it's supposed to be used for.
"I hope you can draw strength from my story and win all battles."

71210001.Name: Treasure Map to Sword of Courage
71210001.Desc: A treasure map bearing the location of the Sword of Courage. With the help of the map, one can find the Sword of Courage.
71210001.Bg:
A map painted on wood, showing where the Sword of Courage can be found.
This is a gift given to Ying by Ying's mother before she passed away, which embodies the unspoken agreement between a mother and a daughter, whether the fabled gateway of wishes is real or not.

71210002.Name: Wreath of Hope
71210002.Desc: A wreath woven from the feelings of the Wooly Adventure Squad. It marks the beginning of a new leg of the journey.
71210002.Bg:
A wreath infused with the myriad feelings and emotions you and your friends have experienced along the way. The sight of this wreath gives you the strength to forge ahead.
You and the girl who suggested making this wreath have made a pact: Stories are an extension of life. You'll never run out of them, if you're adventurous enough. There will always be more adventures to be had, and more stories to be told.

80001003.Name: Spicy Pulled Chicken
80001003.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001003.Bg: A simple cold dish of pulled chicken with an appetizing splash of hot chili oil. Although simple to make, it always reminds people of their childhood.

10001504.Name: Lumi's Waveband
10001504.Desc: Can be used to activate Lumi's Resonance Chain
10001504.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

25.Name: Adventure Log
25.Desc: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
25.Bg: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

80001007.Name: Iced Grape Tea
80001007.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 28% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001007.Bg:
Chilled, diced fruit is put in ice water and sweetened with fresh nectar. The clinking ice cubes produce a clear, melodic sound. 
Camellya made this fruit tea to her liking, with just a hint of milk and grapes as the base, subtly balanced by a splash of gooseberry juice. 
The refreshing sweetness dances on the tongue, leaving a delightful aftertaste as the faint bitterness from the tea fades.

80001011.Name: Yuezhou Spicy Meat Noodles
80001011.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001011.Bg:
Long, silky noodles absorb the rich, spicy broth. Chopped scallions adorn generous slices of meat. One bite can make you sweat, even in winter's chill.
In the remote, rustic village of Yuezhou, this dish is Lumi's fondest memory of home. 
Despite her travels after joining Lollo Logistics, tasting a variety of cuisines, Lumi still believes that the steaming bowl of noodles from her hometown is the true definition of happiness.

70050103.Name: Delivery Box
70050103.Desc: A delivery box from Lollo Logistics
70050103.Bg: A sturdy, heavy-duty delivery box. If you happen to find one of these boxes abandoned by the roadside, please help recycle it.

42600020.Name: Hearty Supper
42600020.Desc: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Somnoire Anchor.
42600020.Bg:
Ever since he turned into a white cat, Ivory Gatekeeper has been dreaming of a grand meal...
It's a shame that he refuses to share any details with anyone.

50000179.Name: Medium Enclosure Tank
50000179.Desc:
Open to claim one medium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare3>Basic Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare3>MF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare3>MF Howler Core*1</color>
50000179.Bg: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

50000180.Name: Advanced Enclosure Tank
50000180.Desc:
Open to claim one advanced material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Improved Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare4>HF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare4>HF Howler Core*1</color>
50000180.Bg: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

50000181.Name: Premium Enclosure Tank
50000181.Desc:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Tailored Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Howler Core*1</color>
50000181.Bg: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

50000178.Name: Basic Enclosure Tank
50000178.Desc:
Open to claim one basic material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare2>Crude Ring*1</color>
<color=Rare2>LF Whisperin Core*1</color>
<color=Rare2>LF Howler Core*1</color>
50000178.Bg: The Bloom Bearers of the Black Shores always return from their field trips with abundant samples, which are inventoried and sealed away by the Gardener after running the necessary tests for future use.

70050047.Name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level I
70050047.Desc: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
70050047.Bg:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

70050048.Name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level II
70050048.Desc: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
70050048.Bg:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

70050049.Name: Montelli Clearance Module - Level III
70050049.Desc: A clearance module specially authorized by Carlotta, granting you full access to every section of Averardo Vault.
70050049.Bg:
"This is the highest level of access I can grant you, though it won't save you from the trouble of obtaining permissions within the Vault. I'm counting on you, Cat's Eye."
 
In other words, your clearance within the Averardo Vault is now on par with hers.

70050050.Name: Ripples of Serene Dreams
70050050.Desc: An energy entity, symbolizing treasured memories, like ripples formed by a single sound.

70050051.Name: Stake of Imbalance
70050051.Desc: An item that can remove the Lifer's buff.
70050051.Bg: Once a pivotal stake at the negotiation table, its intricate patterns seem to capture the tension, strategy, resolve, and compromise that transpired between the Order and the various fractions gathered around the table.

42601010.Name: Bay Leaf
42601010.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42601010.Bg:
An herb with the longest history of use in Rinascita. 
Bay Leaves are used in cooking to give extra flavor to dishes because of their unique aroma, while Cassia Buds are used for their calming properties and to ward off insects. Together, they are revered in Rinascita as the "Sublime Remedy."

42601020.Name: Thief's Talon
42601020.Bg:
Golden Thiefbat's talon.
Golden Thiefbats have dexterous claws and like to steal anything that shines. The Thief's Talon is considered a lucky charm in Rinascita.
It is not unusual for a Ragunnesi businessman to put a Thief's Talon in their pocket in the hope of cutting lucrative deals.

42601030.Name: Animal Fat
42601030.Bg:
Refined animal fat, rich with savory aroma.
In expert hands, it creates a perfectly golden crisp crust, delivering indulgent flavor without a hint of greasiness. 
One bite and your taste buds will be in pure bliss.

42601040.Name: Sea Bunny Meat
42601040.Bg:
Sea Bunny Meat, rich in protein with a tender, succulent texture.
This delicacy requires careful preparation. The Heliobane Fungia, along with other poisonous glands and fluids, must be removed, and the meat cooked to just the right temperature to neutralize any toxins. Whether it becomes a delicious delicacy to die for, or one that costs you your life, depends entirely on the chef's skill.

42601050.Name: Fur
42601050.Bg:
Thick, soft fur, gentle to the touch, and warming to the very core.
Why strip their coats bare, you ask? Well, haven't you heard of the law of conservation of energy? The warmth hasn't disappeared, it's simply been transferred from them to you.

42601060.Name: Goldcrest Scarab
42601060.Bg:
A species of scarab that resembles a coin in appearance, with a reflective golden exoskeleton.
For Golden Thiefbats, Goldcrest Scarabs are both a pleasant sight and a delicious snack.

42601070.Name: Heliobane Fungia
42601070.Bg:
A type of poisonous algae that forms a symbiotic relationship with Sea Bunnies. Heliobane Fungia is rich in gelatine, an important ingredient in many desserts.
Gelatin extracted from Heliobane Fungia has a subtle sweetness and gives desserts a silky, springy texture.

42601080.Name: Bell Crab
42601080.Bg:
A species of crab that makes its home in miniature bells. 
Bell Crabs feed on fish, shrimp, clams, and other small sea creatures. They can scuttle about quickly, emitting a jingling sound as they go. At night, they avoid predators by hiding beneath the decaying hulls of beached boats.

42601090.Name: Mastic Nuvola
42601090.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42601090.Bg:
A creamy resin produced by Nuvola trees, shaped like a cloud and carrying a unique fragrance.
The Nuvola tree is a symbol of healing and renewal. If such a tree is cut, it produces resin to seal the wound until it fully heals. The Ragunnesi call Mastic Nuvola "Healer's Tears."

42601100.Name: Sunflare Everlasting
42601100.Bg: A type of strawflower that grows in clusters. Sunflare Everlasting has pinnate leaves and disk-shaped flowers. Once picked and air-dried, the flowers retain their golden hue, described as "sunlight that never fades."

42601110.Name: Viscum Berry
42601110.Bg:
Legend says the first divine oracle given to Ragunna was carved into a tree trunk, and from the mark, a green branch grew.
The Viscum Berries that sprout from this branch are known as the "Fruit of Wisdom." It is believed that eating them grants spiritual enlightenment.

42601120.Name: Cassia Bud
42601120.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42601120.Bg:
An herb with the longest history of use in Rinascita. 
Bay Leaves are used in cooking to give extra flavor to dishes because of their unique aroma, while Cassia Buds are used for their calming properties and to ward off insects. Together, they are revered in Rinascita as the "Sublime Remedy."

42601130.Name: Felicitous Olives
42601130.Desc: A material used for Cooking and Synthesis.
42601130.Bg:
The delectable fruit of a wild olive shrub that grows in fertile soil. Felicitous Olives are a favored food for certain animals.
Herders often raise herbivores with a keen sense of smell to help track down these prized olives.

42601140.Name: Golden Fleece
42601140.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601140.Bg:
A cluster of golden sulfur crystals, often found in caves rich in geothermal activity. They resemble their mythical namesake—the Golden Fleece guarded by a venomous dragon.
When ground into a fine powder and combined with a hint of molten copper, Golden Fleece transforms into stage-worthy fireworks.

42601150.Name: Sword Acorus
42601150.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601150.Bg:
A tall flower with a firm stem, crowned by delicate flowers.
Sword Acoruses are often used by instructors to teach swordsmanship to young nobles, replacing real swords with these harmless blooms. The children, entranced by the beauty and fragrance, find their attention captured far more easily than by cold, menacing blades.

42601160.Name: Firecracker Jewelweed
42601160.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601160.Bg:
A vividly colored flower shaped like an unfurling firework.
Give a Firecracker Jewelweed a gentle shake, and its swollen capsules will burst open...
The seeds scatter in all directions, resembling the colorful burst of a firecracker.

42601170.Name: Seaside Cendrelis
42601170.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601170.Bg:
A fluorescent flower often found in the crevices of ruins. In the past, Seaside Cendrelis wreaths were used in the rite of initiation for infants and the inaugurations of new Fisalia family heads. As a result, it became a symbol of the power once held by the old nobility.
Ever since the tower's fateful ascent to the sky, the Seaside Cendrelis has been considered extinct, for it has never been seen again.

42601180.Name: Resonant Calcite
42601180.Bg:
A mineral soaked in the waters of Nimbus Sanctum, its surface gleaming with an iridescent sheen. Resonant Calcite is an excellent conductor of Remnant Energy.
The origins of Resonant Calcite are still debated. Some believe its unique properties come from prolonged exposure to the flow of frequencies in Nimbus Sanctum, while others argue that these frequencies seeped into geological fissures, where they influenced the mineral's formation.

42601190.Name: Fool's Gold
42601190.Bg:
A versatile, bronzed iron ore often mistaken for gold, though it's not hard to tell the difference upon closer inspection.
In the past, con artists would craft Fool's Gold into jewelry and sell it as real gold.
Though such tricks are long obsolete, the name "Fool's Gold" endures to this day.

52001.Name: Awakening Bundle (For Pre-Sales)
52001.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52002.Name: Awakening Bundle
52002.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

70120008.Name: Tattered Photos
70120008.Desc: A stack of old, candid photos, most worn beyond recognition.
70120008.Bg: In one, Camellya sits on a chair, seemingly talking to someone nearby.

70120009.Name: Tattered Photos
70120009.Desc: A stack of old, candid photos, most worn beyond recognition.
70120009.Bg: In one, Camellya sits on a chair, seemingly talking to someone nearby. It was a day of celebration on the Black Shores, with golden confetti drifting through the air, and the soft light casting a gentle glow on flowers, stones, and the sea. The expression she wore that day has long since faded from memory.

70120010.Name: Lady Flora's Bracelet
70120010.Desc: A personal belonging stored at the Hall of Foreign Affairs.
70120010.Bg: The lingering frequencies on the bracelet can help trace more of this Bloom Bearer's forgotten belongings.

70120011.Name: Her Bracelet
70120011.Desc: Lady Flora's late personal belonging, and also a gift.
70120011.Bg:
"Okay, okay, I'll wear it... but it's just for peace of mind, huh? If something I can't handle happens, well, you'll find me, won't you? Alive or dead... Hehe, wouldn't that be perfect too?"
"Oh, don't give me that look, Leader. As long as I have you, I'll wear it, I swear. I'll be such a good girl... just for you, hehe..."

70163901.Name: Roccia's Gift: Luceanite
70163901.Desc: A gift from Roccia. A gold-striped black stone that shines with a soft brilliance, much like the gentle sparkle in your eyes.
70163901.Bg: A piece of Luceanite washed ashore by the tide. Despite enduring centuries of wind, rain, and the ravages of time, this special Luceanite has retained its sheen. Roccia discovered it, carefully polished it, and kept it safe. After much hesitation, she finally gathered the courage to give it to you.

70163902.Name: Scattered Petals
70163902.Desc: A few petals likely once part of a wreath. They have since wilted under the harsh sea winds.
70163902.Bg: A few petals found near the Pilgrim's Sail. Likely once part of a wreath, they have since wilted under the harsh sea winds. Their advanced state of decay suggests they've been adrift at sea for a long time.

70163904.Name: "Star"
70163904.Desc: A clear and sparkling star that shines just like the North Star in Pegasus.
70163904.Bg: During their pilgrimage, everyone gathered around this "star" and sang Pegasus in praise of freedom to encourage one another. Wherever they could laugh freely, that was home.

52003.Name: Adventurer's Starter Pack
52003.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52004.Name: Quality Adventurer's Starter Pack
52004.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

10001606.Name: Roccia's Waveband
10001606.Desc: Can be used to activate Roccia's Resonance Chain.
10001606.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001107.Name: Carlotta's Waveband
10001107.Desc: Can be used to activate Carlotta's Resonance Chain.
10001107.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400164.Name: Cleansing Conch
41400164.Desc: Queen of the Night's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400164.Bg: A mystical, star-speckled conch. Hold it to your ear, and you may hear Lorelei's faint whispers. It was once used by the lost faithful to clear their minds and strengthen their belief. Some say a tiny Sonoro hides within, and the whispers are nothing more than echoes of one's true self.

41400174.Name: Platinum Core
41400174.Desc: Sentry Construct's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400174.Bg: A finely crafted armor grants the Echo unstoppable strength, while a restless core hums quietly beneath its protective shell. Is it a mechanical component that powers the Echo, or a spirit trapped within its metal confines?

41400184.Name: Blazing Bone
41400184.Desc: Dragon of Dirge's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400184.Bg:
The bone of the giant dragon, burning with a haunting flame.
The fire blazes from its marrow, bringing both a soul-shaking trial and destruction to those who dare intrude. This is its eternal duty, a rage that never fades, ignited by those who forced it into service.

70140016.Name: Tyrvine
70140016.Desc: A blade sealed with the very powers of Sentinel Imperator, and the artifact used to select Their Resonator.
70140016.Bg:
The Sword of Divinity—"Tyrvine."

A blade sealed with the very powers of Sentinel Imperator, and the artifact used to select Their Resonator.

Approach it, and you might hear the faint howling of the wind.

70140017.Name: Hognis
70140017.Desc: The blade exudes an aura as deep and mysterious as the abyss of the sea.
70140017.Bg:
The Sword of Discord—Hognis.

A blade of unknown origin. According to Cartethyia, it seems to be the key to unraveling the seal in the Inverted Tower.

It exudes an aura as deep and mysterious as the abyss of the sea.

70140018.Name: Haultir
70140018.Desc: A blade that bears no traces of time.
70140018.Bg:
The Sword of Virtue—Haultir.

This sword once belonging to Cartethyia has now become one of the keys to unraveling the seal.

41400194.Name: The Netherworld's Stare
41400194.Desc: Hecate's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400194.Bg: The joyful rhythm of her rondo taps on the gates of the netherworld, and with a single exchange of glances, death takes its first step. A gaze from the other side transforms into a full moon, filling her hollow right eye—thus, the still moon shifts, awakened by her stare.

71210003.Name: Benett's Terminal
71210003.Desc: The Reserved Terminal owned by Benett, a deceased member of the Montelli family. It is severely damaged, with components missing or broken.
71210003.Bg: Once repaired by a technician, it can provide information about the movements of its previous owner. However, further repairs are required to unlock more data. Though the deceased cannot speak, this Terminal serves as his voice. Complete the restoration to uncover the mystery—those covered data may hold the key to the truth you seek.

71210004.Name: Cat's Eye Brooch
71210004.Desc: A Cat's Eye brooch from Carlotta, reflecting your golden eyes—also a personal token from her.
71210004.Bg: In Montelli, each member has an item corresponding to their code name. Carlotta might begin preparing this gift for you from the very moment she was captivated by your golden eyes and offered you the code name "Cat's Eye." Although you don't intend to officially join Montelli, you know that she will forever keep this code name for you—Cat's Eye, the first and only member to receive Opal's personal invitation.

41100041.Name: LF Polygon Core
41100041.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100041.Bg: A fractured polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. Cracks can be found on its frail spiral structure. Seems to be a simple power unit of a Tacet Discord.

41100042.Name: MF Polygon Core
41100042.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100042.Bg: A common polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The spiral structure is fairly complete. Seems to be an analog circuit recording the behavioral patterns of a Tacet Discord.

41100043.Name: HF Polygon Core
41100043.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100043.Bg: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The concentric layers spiral inward in dense steps. It's deduced the density of its pattern correlates with the complexity of the Tacet Discord's behavioral patterns.

41100044.Name: FF Polygon Core
41100044.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100044.Bg: A robust polygonal Tacet Core with an intricate, terraced pattern. The polygonal structure shows a tendency to expand outwards, likely because of the lack of capacity for storing the growingly complex logic in the behaviors of a Tacet Discord.

41100051.Name: LF Tidal Residuum
41100051.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100051.Bg: A friable formation resembling a stranded boat, often found on Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legends say these once covered every shore as the Dark Tide receded.
Source: Tacet Discords influenced by the Dark Tide

41100052.Name: MF Tidal Residuum
41100052.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100052.Bg: A common formation resembling a storm-weathered boat, often found on Tacet Discords in Rinascita, which are said to be born of the Dark Tide and carry this Residuum since their formation.
Source: Tacet Discords influenced by the Dark Tide

41100053.Name: HF Tidal Residuum
41100053.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100053.Bg: A robust formation resembling a sailing ship, occasionally found on certain Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords with this Residuum can hear the distant echoes of the Dark Tide.
Source: Tacet Discords influenced by the Dark Tide

41100054.Name: FF Tidal Residuum
41100054.Desc: A material used for Weapon & Resonator Ascension and Skill Upgrade.
41100054.Bg: A unique formation resembling a tide-breaking vessel, found only on a few powerful Tacet Discords in Rinascita. Legend say Tacet Discords bearing this Residuum can chart the course to the Journeying Paradise.
Source: Tacet Discords influenced by the Dark Tide

80110101.Name: Saving Light
80110101.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110101.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110102.Name: Lifted Clouds of Eons
80110102.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110102.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110103.Name: In Three Days' Time
80110103.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110103.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110104.Name: Pastures Like Old Times
80110104.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110104.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110105.Name: Wilderness Wanderer
80110105.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110105.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110106.Name: Vast Lush Grounds
80110106.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110106.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110107.Name: Prophet's Message
80110107.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110107.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110212.Name: All the Rediscovered Tales
80110212.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110212.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

26.Name: Rinascita Commemorative Stamp
26.Desc: Commemorative stamps issued by the Pioneer Association. Obtain enough number of them to redeem rewards.
26.Bg:
A commemorative stamp issued by the Ragunna branch of the Pioneer Association, themed around the long-awaited return of the Carnevale.
The sea breeze welcomes the return of this grand celebration!
"Some spend their entire lives chasing illusions, only left to seek relief within them.
Now, go forth—time to live in a real life!"

44010031.Name: Monnaie
44010031.Desc: Special drops from the Ragunna region, which can be used to exchange for various items in Averardo Bank.
44010031.Bg:
The old currency issued by Averardo Bank, which is no longer in circulation in Ragunna.
Nowadays, it is good for nothing but commemoration. Averardo Bank is working to recycle these antiques.

70050052.Name: Porto-Veno's Badge
70050052.Desc: A badge that bears the crest of the Fisalia family.
70050052.Bg: There are four special trials taking place around Porto-Veno Castle. Those who conquer these challenges will be granted this badge by the Fisalia family.

70140027.Name: Carlotta's "Gem"
70140027.Desc: Before the battle begins, Carlotta places a handful of crystals in your hands. These are crafted from her Forte, akin to the texture of the bullets she uses in combat. Could there be a hidden message within this gesture?
70140027.Bg:
In the Montelli family, it's common to pass on messages through coded language, gestures, and postures. By handing you her weapon and bullets, Carlotta assures you that you are safe—she has no intention of harming you during the upcoming action. 
Trust her, and follow her lead in this performance.

70140028.Name: Invitation with a Fragrance
70140028.Desc: An invitation with a faint fragrance. The Montelli family crest embossed in the sealing wax.
70140028.Bg:
The letter not only mentions that "the Carnevale will soon return to Rinascita" but also extends an offer to you: as the recipient, you are granted special status as an esteemed guest of the Montelli family, with access to the funds provided at Averardo Bank.
In a world of advanced technology, sending such an invitation via traditional letter speaks to the sincerity of the sender, highlighting their desire to forge a genuine and lasting connection with the invitee.

70140029.Name: The Martyrdom of Blessed Fleurdelys - Act III (Unfinished)
70140029.Desc: A play written by the mysterious playwright Cristoforo, telling the story of Fleurdelys, the Blessed Maiden of the Order of the Deep.
70140029.Bg:
A play written by the mysterious playwright Cristoforo, telling the story of Fleurdelys, the Blessed Maiden of the Order of the Deep.
The script, however, is unfinished, leaving the story hanging just before the Maiden's martyrdom.

70140030.Name: Lycoris with Ominous Aura
70140030.Desc: A withered lycoris, its petals exuding an ominous aura.
70140030.Bg: A withered lycoris, its petals exuding an ominous aura. You feel as if you've encountered a flower like this before...

70140031.Name: Cloudcaster's Handle
70140031.Desc: The Cloudcaster's handle, once used as a fishing reel by the Troupe member.
70140031.Bg:
The Cloudcaster's handle, once used as a fishing reel by the Troupe member.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

70140032.Name: Cloudcaster's Base
70140032.Desc: The Cloudcaster's base, once used as a desk by the Troupe member for composing music.
70140032.Bg:
The Cloudcaster's base, once used as a desk by the Troupe member for composing music.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

70140033.Name: Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit
70140033.Desc: The Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit, once used to calibrate pitch and rhythm by the Troupe member.
70140033.Bg:
The Cloudcaster's Resonance Unit, once used to calibrate pitch and rhythm by the Troupe member.
It can be assembled with other parts of the Cloudcaster. Collect all the components and go find Roccia for the next step.

80000041.Name: Pizza Classica
80000041.Desc: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000041.Bg:
A traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and smoked sausage. When it comes out of the oven, it fills the air with a rich aroma.
There was a man who swore he'd never have olives on his pizza, but the more he resisted, the more olives he got.

80000042.Name: Pizza Tropicale
80000042.Desc: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000042.Bg:
A non-traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and crownapple. When it comes out of the oven, it elicits gasps and cries.
1. NEVER mention Pizza Tropicale to a Ragunnesi.
2. NEVER mention crownapple to a Ragunnesi.
3. NEVER mention apple or crown...

80000043.Name: Triple-Scoop Ice Cream
80000043.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000043.Bg: Three perfectly stacked scoops of ice cream, balanced on a crunchy cone. Each scoop brings a different flavor, and every bite tastes like joy.

80000044.Name: Nuvola Pasta
80000044.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000044.Bg: Pasta made with Mastic Nuvola, known for its strong, inviting fragrance. It is said that the fragrance attracts the singing wraiths from the Nimbus Sanctum. People often venture out at dawn to gather fresh Mastic Nuvola, hoping to catch the melody it holds within.

80000045.Name: Ragunna Espresso
80000045.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 10% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000045.Bg:
A traditional coffee from Ragunna, rich and intense. Finishing a cup of Ragunna Espresso without flinching is a true mark of adulthood.
"You've already had three cups today!"
"But this is only my third task!"

80000046.Name: Steak Margherita
80000046.Desc: Increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000046.Bg: A massive, freshly cooked steak perfect for a family gathering. According to a well-meaning local, the only proper way to enjoy Steak Margherita is medium-rare. Noted. But let's go with medium-well, just to be safe.

80000047.Name: Laurus Salad
80000047.Desc: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000047.Bg:
Freshly mixed with Viscum Berries and Laurus Sprouts, this salad is light, sweet, and healthy.
Acolytes of the Order regard the Viscum Berry as the "holy nourishment of the wise." They chew the fruit alongside sacred texts, believing that doing so imprints the teachings upon the soul.

80000048.Name: Nectarwine
80000048.Desc: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000048.Bg: Brewed from the nectar of Sunflare Everlasting, this mead is gifted by the Montelli family to each of its new members. To drink this mead is to let go of old grudges, and show the truest of hearts.

80000049.Name: Daily Panini
80000049.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000049.Bg:
The perfect morning sandwich—delicious, quick, and wholesome. 
Even the simplest bread holds infinite potential. Like life, a panini may seem the same every day, but it is always a little different.

80000050.Name: Every Flavor Bell Crab
80000050.Desc: Increases ATK and Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 22% and 12% respectively for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000050.Bg: The troupe's favorite seafood, Bell Crab, is the soul of this dish. Each Bell Crab finds its perfect shell, giving it a distinct flavor. Before every meal, the troupe members place a bet: What will the next crab taste like?

80000051.Name: Baton Bread
80000051.Desc: Increases Healing Bonus and Max HP of all Resonators in the team by 5% and 10% respectively for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000051.Bg: A bread that looks like a baton and tastes like one. Rumor has it, someone once tried to use it as the main shaft for an aircraft—fortunately, that idea never took off.

80001045.Name: Orange Espresso
80001045.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001045.Bg: An espresso with a hint of orange, this has become Carlotta's morning ritual since joining the Montelli family. The bold coffee flavor is mellowed by a citrusy sweetness, creating a refreshing balance. It's perfect for those gearing up for a challenge or unwinding after one.

80001043.Name: Multi-Scoop Ice Cream
80001043.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 18% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001043.Bg: With a makeshift mini ice cream maker, Roccia serves up simple ice cream that's both generous in portion and light on the pocket. It's become a beloved treat among the troupe, satisfying their cravings for sweets without straining their budget.

80010041.Name: Pizza Classica Recipe
80010041.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Pizza Classica.
80010041.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Pizza Classica.

80010042.Name: Pizza Tropicale Recipe
80010042.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Pizza Tropicale.
80010042.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Pizza Tropicale.

80010043.Name: Triple-Scoop Recipe
80010043.Desc: Used to learn how to make Triple-Scoop Ice Cream.
80010043.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Triple-Scoop Ice Cream.

80010044.Name: Nuvola Pasta Recipe
80010044.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Nuvola Pasta.
80010044.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Nuvola Pasta.

80010045.Name: Ragunna Espresso Recipe
80010045.Desc: Used to learn how to make Ragunna Espresso.
80010045.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Ragunna Espresso.

80010046.Name: Steak Margherita Recipe
80010046.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Steak Margherita.
80010046.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Steak Margherita.

80010047.Name: Laurus Salad Recipe
80010047.Desc: Used to learn how to make Laurus Salad.
80010047.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Laurus Salad.
