80010048.Desc: Used to learn how to make Nectarwine.
80010048.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Nectarwine.

80010049.Name: Daily Panini Recipe
80010049.Desc: Used to learn how to make Daily Panini.
80010049.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Daily Panini.

80010050.Name: Every Flavor Bell Crab Recipe
80010050.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Every Flavor Bell Crab.
80010050.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Every Flavor Bell Crab.

80010051.Name: Baton Bread Recipe
80010051.Desc: Used to learn how to make Baton Bread.
80010051.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Baton Bread.

27.Name: Riccioli Fishery Coin
27.Desc: The fishery coin circulated within the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to purchase fishing gear and cover daily expenses.
27.Bg: The Riccioli Islands, a territory of Rinascita, uses Shell Credits as well. However, fishermen and sailors there have their own unique currency for sea trade.

28.Name: Abyssal Coral
28.Desc: A precious coral cherished by Riccioli fishermen. Can be used to redeem rewards.
28.Bg: It's a tradition to trade using precious corals in the Riccioli Islands—though, not all corals are conveniently washed ashore by the waves.

29.Name: Coast Flax
29.Desc: A special Coast Flax native to the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
29.Bg: A special Coast Flax native to the Riccioli Islands, often used as a roughing material.

30.Name: Palm Tree Log
30.Desc: A special Palm Tree Log native to the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
30.Bg: A special Palm Tree Log native to the Riccioli Islands, often used as a roughing material.

31.Name: Metal Debris
31.Desc: Metal Debris discovered in the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to enhance Fishing Abilities.
31.Bg: Metal Debris discovered in the Riccioli Islands. Despite erosion from the sea, it is still suitable as a roughing material.

32.Name: "Sweet Puff"
32.Desc: A special species of Gulpuff. Can be used as explosives, thus they are known as "Bampuffs."
32.Bg: It is said that this particular type of Gulpuff releases a sweet fragrance when it explodes, making it a sought-after material for crafting wedding fireworks.

33.Name: Sandworm
33.Desc: The most common bait in Rinascita. Casting it with Baiting creates an ideal Fishing Spot.
33.Bg: The go-to bait for Riccioli fishermen, rich in the shallow seas.

44010041.Name: Meditations on Mercy Crafting Recipe
44010041.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Meditations on Mercy
44010041.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Meditations on Mercy

44010042.Name: Fables of Wisdom Crafting Recipe
44010042.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Fables of Wisdom
44010042.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Fables of Wisdom

44010043.Name: Romance in Farewell Crafting Recipe
44010043.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Romance in Farewell
44010043.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Romance in Farewell

44010044.Name: Legend of Drunken Hero Crafting Recipe
44010044.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Legend of Drunken Hero
44010044.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Legend of Drunken Hero

44010045.Name: Waltz in Masquerade Crafting Recipe
44010045.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Waltz in Masquerade
44010045.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Waltz in Masquerade

70000003.Name: Boost Unit: Flight
70000003.Desc: Increases Max STA for Flight by 10 points. Can be obtained from Exploration Rewards of Ragunna.
70000003.Bg: An expansion unit of Data Bank, steadily increasing the maximum power limit of the Flight function.

34.Name: Trial Coin
34.Desc: A special coin forged by the Fisalia family, obtained by completing Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain. Can be exchanged for a variety of supplies prepared by the Fisalias.

70140034.Name: Codex of the Deep: Preface (137th Edition)
70140034.Desc: A gift from Phoebe. This book introduces the Codex of the Order and explains the basic doctrines and philosophies regarding the Divinites, written in simple terms.
70140034.Bg: A gift from Phoebe. This book introduces the Codex of the Order and explains the basic doctrines and philosophies regarding the Divinites, written in simple terms.

70050053.Name: Tower
70050053.Desc: A painting gifted by the traveling painter Claudia, capturing a scene from the tower ruins.
70050053.Bg:
According to legend, the Thorncrown Rises, located in Thessaleo Fells, holds the lost glory of the Fisalia family. 
Through the painter's delicate brushstrokes, one can sense her upset and confusion.

70050054.Name: "Wishes Under a Clear Sky"
70050054.Desc: A toy made from unknown materials, emanating a faint but warm frequency.
70050054.Bg:
Proof of successful completion of all the challenges in "Although Colors Have No Form."
A talisman from Claudia, rumored to be a fragment of the Genesis Nexus. It emits a faint but warm frequency, though its true purpose remains uncertain.
"...They longed for the sky above, yearning for it more desperately than any soul in this world."

80110301.Name: City Bathed in Sea Breeze
80110301.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110301.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

10809.Name: Casket Sonar Use Permit: Rinascita
10809.Desc: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in given regions.
10809.Bg: The use permit of the Casket Sonar in Rinascita. To ensure frequency safety in Rinascita, users are permitted to use the Casket Sonar only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

10810.Name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Rinascita
10810.Desc: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
10810.Bg: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Rinascita. To ensure frequency safety in Rinascita, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

72010017.Name: Torn pages from Averardo Vault
72010017.Desc: Torn pages found in Averardo Vault.
72010017.Bg: Torn pages found in Averardo Vault. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010018.Name: Torn pages from Egla Town
72010018.Desc: Torn pages found in Egla Town.
72010018.Bg: Torn pages found in Egla Town. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010019.Name: Torn pages from Penitent's End
72010019.Desc: Torn pages found in Penitent's End.
72010019.Bg: Torn pages found in Penitent's End. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010020.Name: Torn pages from Thessaleo Fells
72010020.Desc: Torn pages found in Thessaleo Fells.
72010020.Bg: Torn pages found in Thessaleo Fells. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010021.Name: Torn pages from the Hallowed Reach
72010021.Desc: Torn pages found in the Hallowed Reach.
72010021.Bg: Torn pages found in the Hallowed Reach. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010022.Name: Torn pages from the Fagaceae Peninsula
72010022.Desc: Torn pages found in the Fagaceae Peninsula.
72010022.Bg: Torn pages found in the Fagaceae Peninsula. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010023.Name: Torn pages from Ragunna City
72010023.Desc: Torn pages found in Ragunna City.
72010023.Bg: Torn pages found in Ragunna City. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010024.Name: Torn pages from Nimbus Sanctum
72010024.Desc: Torn pages found in Nimbus Sanctum.
72010024.Bg: Torn pages found in Nimbus Sanctum. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010025.Name: Averardo Vault Brochure
72010025.Desc: A brochure found in Averardo Vault.
72010025.Bg: "Why choose us to manage your wealth?"

72010026.Name: Lonely SOL-3: The Complete Guide to Ragunna
72010026.Desc: A book found in Egla Town.
72010026.Bg: "Your Egla column hasn't been updated since last Carnevale. It's just the same article over and over. You guys can't afford to pay the writer or something?"

72010027.Name: Former Privy Councilor's Notes
72010027.Desc: A book found in Penitent's End.
72010027.Bg: "I look to my side, surprised to find that my former seminary classmate, Lord Fenrico, has his face shrouded in a strange shadow."

72010028.Name: A Transgressor's Transcript
72010028.Desc: A book found in Thessaleo Fells.
72010028.Bg: "O my glorious Fisalia, the shadows of my people are approaching, guiding me to the deep sea."

72010029.Name: Witchcraft, Spies, and Complaints
72010029.Desc: A book found in the Hallowed Reach.
72010029.Bg: "We shall pray for them day and night, that they may be saved by our Sentinel Imperator. Praise be to Imperator."

72010030.Name: The Codex of Holy Rituals
72010030.Desc: A book found in the Fagaceae Peninsula.
72010030.Bg: "After this I looked, and behold, a white horse with only half a body. It commanded me to lift my lantern and pray, that people may come to know one another and be granted victory upon victory."

72010031.Name: Essays on the Ragunnesi Drama
72010031.Desc: A book found in Ragunna City.
72010031.Bg: "Please, don't turn me into a blade of seagrass tomorrow!"

72010032.Name: Voyage Logbook
72010032.Desc: A book found in Nimbus Sanctum.
72010032.Bg: "Mom, when I get back, can I just hug you for a bit?"

70140035.Name: Unfettered Dove through Day and Night
70140035.Desc: A custom-made Carnevale mask ordered by Carlotta for you. It draws inspiration from her impressions on you and Abby.
70140035.Bg:
A custom-made Carnevale mask ordered by Carlotta for you. It draws inspiration from her impressions on you and Abby. 
This mask covers half of the face, creating a perfect balance of personality and enigma. Minimal decorations ensure that it remains functional, offering unobstructed vision and mobility during combat.

70130014.Name: New Year Theater Photo
70130014.Desc: The group photo with your Companions after watching "The Tale of Demon-Banishing Asura" together.
70130014.Bg: The time we spend on stage makes our wishes shine brighter.

70130015.Name: New Year Theater Photo
70130015.Desc: The group photo with your Companions after watching "The Tale of Demon-Banishing Asura" together.
70130015.Bg: The time we spend on stage makes our wishes shine brighter.

70140039.Name: Perfect Curtain Call
70140039.Desc: A photo captured by Fulmine, recording the moment you shared the curtain call with your companions.
70140039.Bg:
A photo captured by Fulmine, recording the moment you shared the curtain call with your companions.
You can zoom in to view the photo.

70140040.Name: Perfect Curtain Call
70140040.Desc: A photo captured by Fulmine, recording the moment you shared the curtain call with your companions.
70140040.Bg:
A photo captured by Fulmine, recording the moment you shared the curtain call with your companions.
You can zoom in to view the photo.

70140041.Name: Beacon of the Past
70140041.Desc: Rover: Spectro's skills have been enhanced. Go to Resonators - Forte for more details.
70140041.Bg: A beacon you once set for yourself, imbued with the strength and faith to keep moving forward.

80110302.Name: Wind-kissed Haven

50000202.Name: Poetry and Paean Weapon Chest
50000202.Desc:
Open to claim one Poetry and Paean series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Meditations on Mercy *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Fables of Wisdom *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Romance in Farewell *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Legend of Drunken Hero *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Waltz in Masquerade *1</color>
50000202.Bg: A standard weapon forged by the Montelli family. Though it may seem like a mere stage prop, in essence, it is a deadly instrument of destruction. It is said that many members of the Montelli family carry this weapon during the Carnevale, prepared for the inevitable...

80000052.Name: Troupe Strength
80000052.Desc: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000052.Bg: The troupe's self-brewed liquor, its name a symbol of ownership, power, and honor. The seafarers used to bicker endlessly over what to call it. After many wagers and a fair bit of their private stock on the line, the drunken Fools finally reached a decision: it would be called "Troupe's Strength."

80000053.Name: Gold Star Pizza
80000053.Desc: Increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 50% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000053.Bg: Now available at Trattoria Margherita in Ragunna City, a new pizza said to come from the distant land of Huanglong. With a unique topping of beef, pineapple, durian, and cheese, this pizza delivers a flavor that surprises and lingers. As fans of this bold combo always say, "It hits like a wave!"

80010052.Name: Troupe Strength Recipe
80010052.Desc: Used to learn how to make Troupe Strength.
80010052.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Troupe Strength.

80010053.Name: Gold Star Pizza Recipe
80010053.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Gold Star Pizza.
80010053.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Gold Star Pizza.

53001.Name: Peach Blossom
53001.Desc: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
53001.Bg:
Dance in the moonlight, sing to the blooms. It is a dance to commemorate your first meeting, the many journeys you'll share, and the companionship forged along the way.
"Now that spring returns, who will share it with me?
The peach blossom's beauty longs for eyes that see."

53002.Name: Exorcistic Adjuration
53002.Desc: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
53002.Bg: Silver hair, piercing red eyes, monochromatic garments... A ferocious mask conceals her face, while a gleaming blade rests in her hand. Her voice rings out in a powerful chant, driving away evil spirits and banishing malicious souls.

50001092.Name: Morphable Echo - Frosty Resolve
50001092.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Frosty Resolve.

2pcs Set: Resonance Skill DMG +12%.

5pcs Set: Casting Resonance Liberation grants 30% Glacio DMG Bonus and 30% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 6s.
50001092.Bg: Between the cracks, crystalline ice blooms...

50001093.Name: Morphable Echo - Eternal Radiance
50001093.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Eternal Radiance.
 
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.
 
5pcs Set: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001093.Bg: Between the cracks, shimmering lights dance and flicker like distant stars...

50001094.Name: Morphable Echo - Midnight Veil
50001094.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Midnight Veil.

2pcs Set: Havoc DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Triggering Outro Skill deals additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies, and grants the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001094.Bg: Between the cracks, obscure shadows merge and coil like a dark veil...

Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Empyrean Anthem.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: Increase the Resonator's Coordinated Attack DMG by 80%. Upon a critical hit of Coordinated Attack, increase the active Resonator's ATK by 20% for 4s.
50001095.Bg: Through the cracks, gentle melodies reverberated...

50001096.Name: Morphable Echo - Tidebreaking Courage
50001096.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Tidebreaking Courage.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: The Resonator's ATK is increased by 15%. When reaching 250% Energy Regen, the Resonator gains 30% all Attribute DMG increase.
50001096.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001097.Name: Morphable Echo - Frosty Resolve
50001097.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Frosty Resolve.

2pcs Set: Resonance Skill DMG +12%.

5pcs Set: Casting Resonance Liberation grants 30% Glacio DMG Bonus and 30% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 6s.
50001097.Bg: Between the cracks, crystalline ice blooms...

50001098.Name: Morphable Echo - Eternal Radiance
50001098.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Eternal Radiance.
 
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.
 
5pcs Set: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001098.Bg: Between the cracks, shimmering lights dance and flicker like distant stars...

50001099.Name: Morphable Echo - Midnight Veil
50001099.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Midnight Veil.

2pcs Set: Havoc DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Triggering Outro Skill deals additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies, and grants the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001099.Bg: Between the cracks, obscure shadows merge and coil like a dark veil...

50001100.Name: Morphable Echo - Empyrean Anthem
50001100.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Empyrean Anthem.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: Increase the Resonator's Coordinated Attack DMG by 80%. Upon a critical hit of Coordinated Attack, increase the active Resonator's ATK by 20% for 4s.
50001100.Bg: Through the cracks, gentle melodies reverberated...

50001101.Name: Morphable Echo - Tidebreaking Courage
50001101.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Tidebreaking Courage.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: Resonators' ATK is increased by 15%. When Energy Regen reaches 250%, the Resonator gains 30% all Attribute DMG increase.
50001101.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001102.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo III
50001102.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Frosty Resolve: Abyssal Patricius (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Eternal Radiance: Diurnus Knight (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Midnight Veil: Questless Knight (Havoc DMG Bonus)

Tidebreaking Courage: Abyssal Gladius (Energy Regen)
50001102.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

List of Echoes:

Tidebreaking Courage: Chop Chop (Energy Regen)
50001103.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

44010046.Name: Call of the Abyss Crafting Recipe
44010046.Desc: Used to learn the crafting of Call of the Abyss
44010046.Bg: A recipe that details how to craft Call of the Abyss

70060015.Name: The Nimbus Chorale: Soil of Abundance
70060015.Desc: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
70060015.Bg: "We thank Rinascita, for she embraced us with her fertile lands, offering a shelter to those of us drifting in the winds on the sea. From this day forward, we shall have a place to call home, where our roots embed deeply."

42100036.Name: Fusion-resistant Spray
42100036.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Fusion DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100036.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

42100037.Name: Aero-resistant Spray
42100037.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Aero DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100037.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

42100038.Name: Electro-resistant Spray
42100038.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Electro DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100038.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

42100039.Name: Glacio-resistant Spray
42100039.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Glacio DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100039.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

42100040.Name: Spectro-resistant Spray
42100040.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Spectro RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100040.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

42100041.Name: Havoc-resistant Spray
42100041.Desc: Within 180s, deal DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses to increase Havoc DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 10s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100041.Bg: A medication stored in aerosol containers, pressurized through an advanced industrial process. When applied, it forms a damage-resistant layer on the skin that absorbs enemy power to increase the user's RES against a specific type of damage.

71220001.Name: Plushie Village Restoration Log: I
71220001.Bg: A proof of the efforts made in restoring the Plushie Village alongside your Plushie friends. Continue collecting Sonance Caskets to further restore the village's power, bringing more plusheis into this warm and lively home.

71220002.Name: Plushies' Photo
71220002.Desc: A group photo of Plushies, accidentally discovered within a morph painting.
71220002.Bg: A group photo from the past, capturing the feeling that never fades.

71220003.Name: Plushie Village Restoration Log: Final
71220003.Desc: The last commemorative item earned from restoring the Plushie Village.
71220003.Bg: A proof of the efforts made in restoring the Plushie Village alongside your Plushie friends. It represents the cherished memories you share with your Plushie companions—"No one needs you, but I do; no one accepts who you are, but I do."

71220004.Name: Bell of Resonance
71220004.Desc: A special item obtained after fully restoring the Plushie Village.
71220004.Bg: A bell said to resonate with others, no matter the distance.

50001104.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo - Ragunna
50001104.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Frosty Resolve: Abyssal Patricius (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Tidebreaking Courage: Abyssal Gladius (Energy Regen)
Eternal Radiance: Abyssal Mercator (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Midnight Veil: Questless Knight (Havoc DMG Bonus)
Eternal Radiance: Diurnus Knight (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Midnight Veil: Nocturnus Knight (Havoc DMG Bonus)
Empyrean Anthem: Chop Chop (Energy Regen)
Frosty Resolve: Cuddle Wuddle (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Empyrean Anthem: Vitreum Dancer (Energy Regen)
50001104.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

35.Name: Fame
35.Desc: Used to increase your Fame Level in the Riccioli Islands.
35.Bg: The rule is simple: the more fish you catch, the more experience you gain as a fisherman, and the more Fame you earn. Just remember, fish are never meant to be worn as medals on your chest.

71220005.Name: Plushie Village Restoration Log: II
71220005.Bg: A proof of the efforts made in restoring the Plushie Village alongside your Plushie friends. Continue collecting Sonance Caskets to further restore the village's power, bringing more plusheis into this warm and lively home.

70060016.Name: The Nimbus Chorale: Crystal Sky
70060016.Desc: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
70060016.Bg: "We thank the towering figure in the skies above, who guided our sails and protected us as we pressed onward."

70060017.Name: The Nimbus Chorale: Order of Nature
70060017.Desc: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
70060017.Bg: "We thank the cycle of day and night, the ever-shifting seasons, for they have kept hope alive in the darkness and have taught us to look forward to the harvest even in the coldest winters."

70060018.Name: The Nimbus Chorale: Glory to Humanity
70060018.Desc: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
70060018.Bg: "We thank each ancestor who boarded the ship of expedition, knowing they will never return. Time would wear their bodies down, yet their unwavering will carried them forward."

71220006.Name: Plushie Village Restoration Log: III
71220006.Bg: A proof of the efforts made in restoring the Plushie Village alongside your Plushie friends. Continue collecting Sonance Caskets to further restore the village's power, bringing more plusheis into this warm and lively home.

50001105.Name: Molded Echo - Crimson Curtain Call I
50001105.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare4>4-Star Calamity Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Freezing Frost: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
Molten Rift: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
Void Thunder: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
Sierra Gale: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
Celestial Light: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
Havoc Eclipse: Hecate (Crit. Rate)
50001105.Bg: Through the cracks, you glimpsed the crimson curtain fell and witness the story's end.

50001106.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare4>4-Star Calamity Class Echo</color> of your choice.

Celestial Light: Hecate (Crit. DMG)
Havoc Eclipse: Hecate (Crit. DMG)
50001108.Bg: Through the cracks, you glimpsed the crimson curtain fell and witness the story's end.

71320001.Name: Loneliness of the Deep Sea
71320001.Desc: A toy made from unknown materials, capable of detecting weak but warm frequencies.
71320001.Bg:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "Dream Patrol: Ragunna," a gift to you, who remains as warm as ever in the depths of the deep sea.
A delicate glass bottle containing a miniature landscape that emits weak but warm frequencies. Yet, its true purpose remains uncertain.
"The warm Rinascita, where the sun shines blazingly and the water ripples tenderly."

36.Name: Nameless Coin
36.Desc: A mysterious coin uncovered while fishing in the Riccioli Islands. Can be used to redeem rewards.
36.Bg: An ancient coin eroded by the sea, its faint carving of a horse barely discernible. Its true value remains deeply hidden in history.

37.Name: Universal Compass
37.Desc: A mysterious compass, used to unlock Key Fishing Ability.
37.Bg: What use is a compass with a malfunctioning pointer? Where is it pointing?

71500001.Name: Glacio Eroded Coin
71500001.Desc:
Increases Glacio DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500001.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.
Source: Obtained in Tutorial Quest "Ocean Is a Soul's Rest."

71500002.Name: Fusion Eroded Coin
71500002.Desc:
Increases Fusion DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500002.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.

71500003.Name: Electro Eroded Coin
71500003.Desc:
Increases Electro DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500003.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.

71500004.Name: Aero Eroded Coin
71500004.Desc:
Increases Aero DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500004.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.

71500005.Name: Spectro Eroded Coin
71500005.Desc:
Increases Spectro DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500005.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.
Source: Obtained in Tutorial Quest "Ocean Is a Soul's Rest."

71500006.Name: Havoc Eroded Coin
71500006.Desc:
Increases Havoc DMG by 20%.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500006.Bg: Relics from the shipwrecks of merchants, pilgrims, and pirates. These eroded coins stand as the last witnesses to their stories.

71500007.Name: Judgment Lost Flag
71500007.Desc:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 15s.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500007.Bg: A flag used by ships transporting prisoners between islands.

71500008.Name: Sermon Lost Flag
71500008.Desc:
Every time a Resonator deals Basic Attack DMG, their next Basic Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500008.Bg: A flag used by ships transporting Acolytes from the Order between islands.

71500009.Name: Merchant Lost Flag
71500009.Bg: A flag used by merchant ships conducting commerce between islands.

71500010.Name: Hunting Lost Flag
71500010.Desc:
Every time a Resonator deals damage, their next Heavy Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500010.Bg: A flag used by pirate ships hiding within the sea mist.

71500011.Name: Assistance: Rare Pact
71500011.Desc:
Summons an Echo to support you in combat. It does not take damage from the Resonators.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
71500011.Bg: A strange pact and its accompanying Echo, offered by an unnamed lady. It recreates fragments of the Sentinel's divine miracles in a mysterious way.

71500012.Name: Development Rare Pact
71500012.Bg: An amazing device paired with its detailed instruction manual brought from distant shores. It vanished without a trace after being auctioned off to a mysterious magnate.

71500013.Name: Pioneer Captain's Seal
71500013.Bg: The seal of a captain whose settler ship foundered within sight of its new homeland. The captain ordered those onboard to save themselves, while he himself gripped the helm and vanished into the deep with his cherished ship.

71500014.Name: Plunderer Captain's Seal
71500014.Desc:
Recovers 3% of the Resonator's HP per second and deals 600% Electro DMG to nearby targets upon the sixth HP recovery.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500014.Bg: A pirate ship wandering in the mist, known for instilling everlasting fear with the simplest tricks.

71500015.Name: Betrayer Captain's Seal
71500015.Bg: A ship, wrecked in the struggle for its seal. Treachery set its sail ablaze, toppled its masts, and left nothing but this seal.

71500016.Name: Absolver Captain's Seal
71500016.Desc:
After casting Resonance Liberation, increases Basic Attack Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 40% for 15s and reduces their Resonance Skill cooldown by 10s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500016.Bg: A ship of the Order Tribunal, often found cruising the sea. It always arrives in time to "mediate" conflicts. They may have "absolved" the guilty, but others never "absolve" them.

71500017.Name: Pilgrim Captain's Seal
71500017.Desc:
Each time casting Resonance Skill reduces Resonance Liberation cooldown by 20% and recovers Resonance Energy by 20%. This effect has a cooldown of 3s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500017.Bg: Everyone celebrates its departure; no one anticipates its return.

38.Name: Old Compass
38.Desc: An old compass, used to unlock and enhance other Fishing Abilities.
38.Bg: This compass is so old that it's impossible to tell if it's malfunctioning or working perfectly. But does it really matter? As long as it points somewhere, who cares where it lead, right?

39.Name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook
39.Desc: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability.
39.Bg: A detailed guidebook compiled by Rinascita's finest fishing experts—but remember, it takes no responsibility for what's caught.

40.Name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture
40.Desc: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability.
40.Bg: A scripture fragment found on the seabed of the Riccioli Islands, documenting what is unrecorded in the Codex of the Order of the Deep. Those fragmentary words seem to respond to the very call of the ocean.

71510101.Name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter One
71510101.Desc: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase the sale price of catch.
71510101.Bg: This chapter explains the proper technique for using groundbait.

71510102.Name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter Two
71510102.Desc: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase Fishery Coins obtained from requests.
71510102.Bg: This chapter explains the proper technique for reeling fish in.

71510103.Name: Rinascita Fishing Guidebook: Chapter Three
71510103.Desc: A guidebook obtained by chance, used to enhance Rover's Fishing Ability, and increase the materials obtained from processing.
71510103.Bg: You've now mastered every fishing technique. Now put your skills to the test. Reel in that whale!

71510201.Name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter One
71510201.Desc: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, add Request slots, and lower Request consumption.
71510201.Bg: "Hooves churn the sea as the fish's tail thrashes the foam."

71510202.Name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter Two
71510202.Desc: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, and increase hull Durability.
71510202.Bg: "...Let it be known—on tranquil waters, no sailor reigns supreme."

71510203.Name: Fragment of a Mysterious Scripture: Chapter Three
71510203.Desc: A scripture fragment obtained by chance, used to enhance Phoebe's Fishing Ability, and increase the probability of obtaining Mutants.
71510203.Bg: "Avenge... for the divine... and for yourself."

71510301.Name: Melody Box
71510301.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
71510301.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

71500018.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500018.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500018.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500019.Name: The Gospel that Receives Harmonized Praise
71500019.Desc:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500019.Bg: "Amidst the panicked Fools, he stood out, kneeling devoutly before the terrifying anomaly. Raising his brooch high, he chanted hymns, surrendering himself to the tide until he became one with it..."

71500020.Name: The Sails that Display Endeavor
71500020.Desc:
Casting Resonance Liberation Amplifies Resonance Skill DMG of the active Resonator by 90% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500020.Bg: Time was too short—he only managed to save a single possession before plunging into the sea. Even as his lungs emptied of air, his grin widened. "Surely, I'm the greatest merchant in the world! Trading my life for my family's future—a bargain like no other!"

71500021.Name: The Ambition that Lies Hidden
71500021.Desc:
Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500021.Bg: In the opening act, an obscure youth boarded the ship with nothing but a dagger. In the final act, a notorious pirate captain met his end, betrayed by his own confidant, sinking with a dagger into the deep.

41.Name: Adventure Log
41.Desc: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
41.Bg: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

70010074.Name: Familiar-looking Large Fish
70010074.Desc: A large fish acquired by chance from fishing. It can be used to replace another fish.
70010074.Bg: This fish leaped into the boat as the net was hauled in, almost as if eager to be caught. It looked strangely familiar...

70010075.Name: Helm Village Lighthouse Key
70010075.Desc: Use this key to activate the lighthouse in Helm Village.
70010075.Bg: "Oh, you mean this? Ahab asked me to keep it for him. I don't know where he got it, but... this thing, it must have something to do with that whale, right?"

70010076.Name: Titanium Mackerel
70010076.Desc: A mysterious mechanical device. It activates the Serene Bay lighthouse.
70010076.Bg: This mysterious fish doesn't seem to be from this world. Perhaps that's why it has the power to activate the lighthouse Imperator built.

70010077.Name: Reyes Treasure Map Fragment
70010077.Desc: A fragment of a treasure map. Collect all pieces to assemble the complete map.
70010077.Bg: Why are treasure maps often fragmented? They should probably conceal the treasure in multiple locations. Easier for the later generations to find.

70010078.Name: Pequod Blueprint: Basic
70010078.Bg: The island's fishermen never actually saw the real "Pequod." Captain Ahab only described it as a ship that sank at sea. This design is based on Ahab's sketches and the Ragunna boat model.

70010079.Name: Pequod Blueprint: Advanced
70010079.Bg: "The world is a vast ship sailing onward, with no single, definitive voyage."

70010080.Name: Ahab's Diary
70010080.Desc: A sea-weathered journal of Ahab's past sailing experiences.
70010080.Bg: He was invincible at sea until he encountered it. The Captain Ahab who once traversed Solaris's vast oceans, is now but an old man, filled with hatred and hope, defiantly awaiting death by the sea.

70010081.Name: Nannerl's Bottle
70010081.Desc: Nannerl's drift bottle that holds her dreams.
70010081.Bg: "Brother, wherever you may be... if you can see this, play a song for me. I will hear it. One day, you will hear my music too."

10811.Name: Wonder Bubble in the Port of Riccioli
10811.Desc: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
10811.Bg: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

10812.Name: Wonder Bubble of Helm Village
10812.Desc: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
10812.Bg: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

10813.Name: Wonder Bubble of the Serene Bay
10813.Desc: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
10813.Bg: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

10814.Name: Wonder Bubble of the Reyes Ruins
10814.Desc: A mysterious floating bubble where fish might be hiding. Upon purchase, a Wonder Bubble will be generated near the current dock to help Rover catch crabs and urchins.
10814.Bg: Legend has it that this bubble forms from the breath of the Cetus the Tidebreaker, serving as a natural shelter for fish... until fishermen burst their bubble of sanctuary.
Source: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita

10815.Name: Sailer's Conviction
10815.Desc: An awning for Rachel. Enhances cruising speed.
10815.Bg: What follows is a long voyage—a relentless pursuit to the every edge of the world.

42600021.Name: Blue-Spotted Giant Fish
42600021.Desc: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Ocean's Gift.
42600021.Bg: The eyes of this mysterious giant fish gleam with an eerie glow, and if you listen closely, you might even catch a faint melody within the flickers. Undoubtedly, it is one of the ocean's gifts.

10816.Name: Faith of Unity
10816.Desc: An awning for Rachel. Boosts the chance of gaining high-quality catches.
10816.Bg: In the heart of the tempest, we gather. The storm may rage, but we were born to prevail.

10817.Name: Valor of Tidebreaker
10817.Desc: An awning for Rachel. Helps evade certain threats while cruising.
10817.Bg: Amidst the furious waves, we press on. It lies just before us.

10818.Name: Passion of Vengeance
10818.Desc: An awning for Rachel. Increases the chance to gain catches of extreme sizes.
10818.Bg: In the end, silence reigns. I am the only one who reports to you.

71500022.Name: The Blood Pact that Corrupts to the Core
71500022.Desc:
Increases the Resonance Liberation DMG dealt by the active Resonator by 120% for 20s after every 10 instances of damage dealt by Resonators in the team. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500022.Bg: "His body grew heavier, the darkness wrapped around him, dragging him steadily toward the abyss. In the silence, only the whisper of the ring echoed, 'You cannot escape; no one can...'"

71500023.Name: The Revelry that Unveils Mysteries
71500023.Desc:
While Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 55% for 15s when Resonators are in mid-air.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500023.Bg: Sing and dance, my friends! Rejoice in our triumph over a thousand reefs and a thousand storms! Sing and dance, my friends! With gratitude to the Sentinel and memories of our fallen comrades, we shall live proudly on this scorching land!

10001506.Name: Phoebe's Waveband
10001506.Desc: Can be used to activate Phoebe's Resonance Chain.
10001506.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001206.Name: Brant's Waveband
10001206.Desc: Can be used to activate Brant's Resonance Chain.
10001206.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

70010082.Name: "Sweet Puff"
70010082.Bg: Intended as fireworks for Starbuck's wedding with a certain fish, this Bampuff is incredibly powerful and can also be used to destroy reefs.

70010085.Name: Special Every Flavor Bell-less Crab
70010085.Desc: Special Every Flavor Bell-less Crab, though it looks like the taste might be a bit weird.
70010085.Bg: Perhaps "delicious" is always subjective, just as Imperator understands that not everyone knows how to ride a horse.

70140050.Name: Phaom Whistle
70140050.Desc: A whistle Cartethyia taught you how to use. When equipped in Utility, it allows you to summon the Gondola Phaom near water. (Usable only in Avinoleum)
70140050.Bg: A whistle Cartethyia taught you how to use.

71550001.Name: Amber Key
71550001.Desc: An amber key that seemingly holds the secret to unlocking a treasure chest.
71550001.Bg: "It looks like a chunk of amber. Its color is quite beautiful. Let's take it and head to the next isle."

71550002.Name: Captain's Chart
71550002.Desc: A chart worth "a whole coin," carrying a hidden story, a big adventure, and... a person's untold life.
71550002.Bg: "If we want something from the sea, we have to offer something in return."

71550003.Name: Half A Lucky Coin
71550003.Desc: A lucky coin discovered while gutting a fish, bearing the mark of Captain Drake. Unfortunately, it's only a half.
71550003.Bg: According to the crew, this coin might point the way to a hidden treasure...

71550004.Name: Lucky Coin
71550004.Desc: A whole coin. The map it reveals points the way to Captain Drake's treasure under the moonlight.
71550004.Bg: With the coin complete, the path to treasure lies ahead. The course is set, ready to sail!

50001501.Name: Morphable Echo - Freezing Frost
50001501.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Freezing Frost.
2pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50001501.Bg: Chills are emanating from the crevice...

50001502.Name: Morphable Echo - Molten Rift
50001502.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Molten Rift.
2pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Fusion DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Resonance Skill.
50001502.Bg: Flames are flickering and rising in the crevice...

50001503.Name: Morphable Echo - Void Thunder
50001503.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Void Thunder.
2pcs Set: Electro DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Electro DMG + 15% after releasing Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill. This effect stacks up to 2 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50001503.Bg: Thunder is rumbling in the crevice...

50001504.Name: Morphable Echo - Sierra Gale
50001504.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Sierra Gale.
2pcs Set: Aero DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Aero DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
50001504.Bg: A gust of wind is howling through the crevice...

50001505.Name: Morphable Echo - Celestial Light
50001505.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Celestial Light.
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Spectro DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
50001505.Bg: Dazzling rays of light are emanating from the crevice...

50001506.Name: Morphable Echo - Havoc Eclipse
50001506.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Havoc Eclipse.
2pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 10%.
5pcs Set: Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.
50001506.Bg: The chaos seems to devour everything in the crevice...

50001507.Name: Morphable Echo - Rejuvenating Glow
50001507.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Rejuvenating Glow.

2pcs Set: Healing Bonus + 10%.

5pcs Set: Increases the ATK of all Resonators in the team by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.
50001507.Bg: The breath from the crevice brings peace and calm...

50001508.Name: Morphable Echo - Moonlit Clouds
50001508.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Moonlit Clouds.
2pcs Set: Energy Regen + 10%.
5pcs Set: After using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.
50001508.Bg: A bright moon seems to hide in the crevice...

50001509.Name: Morphable Echo - Lingering Tunes
50001509.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Lingering Tunes.

2pcs Set: ATK + 10%.

5pcs Set: While on the field, ATK increases by 5% every 1.5s. This effect stacks up to 4 times. Outro Skill DMG + 60%.
50001509.Bg: Mysterious melodies echo endless from the crevice...

50001510.Name: Morphable Echo - Frosty Resolve
50001510.Desc:
Open to claim one premium material for Weapon Ascension or Skill Upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Layered Wing Polarizer *1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Carved Crystal *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Reverb Combustor *1</color>
<color=Rare5>FF Waveworn Shard *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Melodic String *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Heterized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Flawless Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Presto Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Waveworn Residue 239 *1</color>
<color=Rare5>Cadence Blossom*1</color>
50001510.Bg: Between the cracks, crystalline ice blooms...

50001511.Name: Morphable Echo - Eternal Radiance
50001511.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Eternal Radiance.
 
2pcs Set: Spectro DMG +10%.
 
5pcs Set: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001511.Bg: Between the cracks, shimmering lights dance and flicker like distant stars...

50001512.Name: Morphable Echo - Midnight Veil
50001512.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Midnight Veil.

2pcs Set: Havoc DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Triggering Outro Skill deals additional 480% Havoc DMG to surrounding enemies, and grants the incoming Resonator 15% Havoc DMG Bonus for 15s.
50001512.Bg: Between the cracks, obscure shadows merge and coil like a dark veil...

50001513.Name: Morphable Echo - Empyrean Anthem
50001513.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Empyrean Anthem.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: Increase the Resonator's Coordinated Attack DMG by 80%. Upon a critical hit of Coordinated Attack, increase the active Resonator's ATK by 20% for 4s.
50001513.Bg: Through the cracks, gentle melodies reverberated...

50001514.Name: Morphable Echo - Tidebreaking Courage
50001514.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Tidebreaking Courage.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: The Resonator's ATK is increased by 15%. When reaching 250% Energy Regen, the Resonator gains 30% all Attribute DMG increase.
50001514.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001109.Name: Unborn Echoes I
50001109.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo from the Tacet Field of your choice in Jinzhou, Huanglong, or Rinascita.

List of Tacet Fields:
Central Plains: Lingering Tunes & Rejuvenating Glow
Desorock Highland I: Sierra Gale & Freezing Frost
Desorock Highland II: Void Thunder & Molten Rift
Port City of Guixu: Molten Rift & Rejuvenating Glow
Tiger's Maw: Freezing Frost & Void Thunder
Dim Forest: Havoc Eclipse & Moonlit Clouds
Whining Aix's Mire: Celestial Light & Lingering Tunes
Penitent's End: Empyrean Anthem & Midnight Veil
Fagaceae Peninsula: Frosty Resolve & Eternal Radiance
Riccioli Islands: Tidebreaking Courage & Eternal Radiance
Beohr Waters: Midnight Veil & Gusts of Welkin
Mournfell Canyon: Windward Pilgrimage & Flaming Clawprint
50001109.Bg: In the fissure, a Tacet Mark is expanding, pulsing with a thudding rhythm like a heartbeat...

80001041.Name: A Slice of Pizza
80001041.Desc: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 44% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001041.Bg:
A slice cut from an unimaginably large pizza, rich with melted cheese and laden with various toppings. Every child can find a slice they like, making for a rare treat eaten together only once a month.

The nannies used to say, "Love inspires faith, faith fosters sharing, and sharing brings love full circle."

80001052.Name: Purity Strength
80001052.Desc: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 28% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001052.Bg:
Crafted by Brant himself, this exceptional brew offers a refreshing flavor with a lingering aftertaste.

Just as he dedicates his soul to every performance on stage, Brant pours his passion into each bottle.

With his name signed proudly on the bottle, he extends his heartfelt well wishes to those who receive this meticulously prepared gift.

"Life is to celebrate and to embrace freedom."

71500024.Name: The Ambition that Lies Hidden
71500024.Desc:
Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500024.Bg: In the opening act, an obscure youth boarded the ship with nothing but a dagger. In the final act, a notorious pirate captain met his end, betrayed by his own confidant, sinking with a dagger into the deep.

71500025.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500025.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500025.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

70050055.Name: Box of Silence
70050055.Desc: A bomb originally used by the Order to frame the Montelli family. It has been transformed by Phoebe's soul-healing power into a tool for saving lives.
70050055.Bg: A sacred aura lingers, as if a quiet sigh was left behind by someone.

70010086.Name: Mysterious Complete Treasure Map
70010086.Desc: A fully pieced-together treasure map marking hidden treasure.
70010086.Bg: A life at sea entails battling the the ocean and fighting pirates to the death. To the victor goes the spoils. Thus this Treasure Map is a testament to our victory.

80000054.Name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab
80000054.Desc: Increases all team members' ATK by 22% and Crit. DMG by 24% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000054.Bg: Bell Crabs shed their iconic bells during certain times of the year. During this period, these crabs are also known as "Bell-less Crabs," said to have a distinct flavor apart from Bell Crabs.

80000055.Name: Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam
80000055.Desc: Increases all team members' Max HP by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000055.Bg: It is said that a drunken Troupe member once mistook wine for water while cooking seafood, accidentally creating this dish. Fortunately, no fires were involved.

80000056.Name: Riccioli Salt Baked Fish
80000056.Desc: Increases all team members' DEF by 35% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000056.Bg: The finest ingredients often require only the simplest preparation. Fresh fish, lightly cleaned and baked in sea salt, brings out its pure, natural flavors. For seasoned sailors, this dish is a commonplace staple. However, for the sheltered nobles of Ragunna, it represents their most vivid imagination of the sea.

80010054.Name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab Recipe
80010054.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Every Flavor Bell-less Crab.
80010054.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Every Flavor Bell-less Crab.

80010055.Name: Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam Recipe
80010055.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam.
80010055.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Wine-Brewed Octopus Clam.

80010056.Name: Riccioli Salt Baked Fish Recipe
80010056.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Riccioli Salt Baked Fish.
80010056.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Riccioli Salt Baked Fish

50000105.Name: Originite Weapon Supply Chest
50000105.Desc:
Open to claim one Originite series weapon of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Broadblade#41 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sword#18 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Pistols#26 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Gauntlets#21D *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Rectifier#25 *1</color>
50000105.Bg: The special supply chest obtained from Shilang in the Tiger's Maw.

71510204.Name: Rusty Iron Case
71510204.Desc: An iron case discovered in a shipwreck in the waters of the Riccioli Islands. Open it to claim mysterious rewards.
71510204.Bg: Don't just discard rusty iron cases, as they might contain hidden treasures. And if not, they still make a formidable melee weapon!

50001515.Name: Lingering Tunes & Rejuvenating Glow
50001515.Desc:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Lingering Tunes
Rejuvenating Glow
50001515.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001516.Name: Sierra Gale & Freezing Frost
50001516.Desc:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Sierra Gale
Freezing Frost
50001516.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001517.Desc:

Void Thunder
Molten Rift
50001517.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

Rejuvenating Glow
50001518.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001519.Desc:

Celestial Light
Lingering Tunes
50001521.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

Empyrean Anthem
Midnight Veil
50001522.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001523.Name: Frosty Resolve & Eternal Radiance
50001523.Desc:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Frosty Resolve
Eternal Radiance
50001523.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001524.Name: Tidebreaking Courage & Eternal Radiance
50001524.Desc:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Tidebreaking Courage
Eternal Radiance
50001524.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

80110326.Name: Serenade Carried by the Waves
80110326.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110326.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110327.Name: A Journey Concluded in the Tides
80110327.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110327.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110337.Name: Accusation of the Penitent

80110337.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110338.Name: Judgment upon the Guilty
80110338.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110338.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

10001607.Name: Cantarella's Waveband
10001607.Desc: Can be used to activate Cantarella's Resonance Chain.
10001607.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001406.Name: Rover: Aero's Waveband
10001406.Desc: Can be used to activate Rover: Aero's Resonance Chain.
10001406.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400204.Name: When Irises Bloom
41400204.Desc: Fleurdelys' drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400204.Bg:
An item bestowed on her during the Order's Initiation.

Fleurdelys used to be a meticulously crafted "idol" for the public. Only when the divine shell is shed can her true life begin.

Fleurdelys, or Cartethyia... Which name does she truly wish to live by?

71600001.Name: A Manuscript of Golden Anthem
71600001.Desc: A manuscript of Golden Anthem, transcribed by Cristoforo.
71600001.Bg: A manuscript from the Golden Anthem Poets Society preserving their poems and musical compositions, transcribed by Cristoforo.

71600002.Name: A Lithograph With the Sentinel's True Form
71600002.Desc: A lithograph etched with Sentinal Imperator's true form.
71600002.Bg: A lithograph carved with Sentinal Imperator's true form. Members of the Poets Society concealed it in Egla Town, assuming it was a relic left by the ancient Rinascitans.

70050056.Name: "Past"
70050056.Desc: A strange book, aged and worn. It is marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
70050056.Bg:
A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts, one that seemingly records the past, its cover ravaged by seawater, and the waterlogged pages stick together, making it impossible to open. The past cannot be retraced, yet the abyss insists on drawing you back in time.
Past and Present come together, leading to the Future.

70050057.Name: "Present"
70050057.Desc: A strange book with a fluid form. It is marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
70050057.Bg:
A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts, its cover formless, its pages sealed. There is no need to look further, for you are presently writing this book.
Past and Present come together, leading to the Future.

70050058.Name: Fairytale SketchBook
70050058.Desc: A heartwarming fairytale sketchbook. Its pages are slightly yellowed. This book seems to have been made by the maidens.
70050058.Bg: A heartwarming fairytale sketchbook, telling a story of princesses embarking on an adventure. Even though caged, the maidens' hearts were still brimmed with hopeful fantasies.

70050059.Name: A Strange Book
70050059.Desc: A strange book marked with traces of erosion from seawater.
70050059.Bg: A strange book found floating in the Sea of Ghosts... maybe it's the key to a hidden bookcase door. This book cannot be opened, its contents will not be revealed... Perhaps that's for the best.

80001049.Name: Homemade Panini
80001049.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 28% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001049.Bg:
A Panini made by Cantarella herself.

Two pieces of perfectly baked, crispy bread are stuffed with a blend of carefully seasoned seafood.

With each bite, the rich flavors slide down your throat and settle in your stomach, filling it with unparalleled satisfaction.

Unlike potions' mysterious flavors, this is a taste of simple comfort and warmth.

71550005.Name: Potion Vial
71550005.Desc:
A potion vial that Cantarella carries with her all the time. Its body is adorned with a sapphire that represents the family head's authority.

To a Fisalia like her, what's stored inside is more than just potion but her very essence: her trust, her emotions, and her soul...
71550005.Bg:
A token from Cantarella. This vial holds a potion she specially crafted for you. Its delicate, calming fragrance works to soothe your mind. She has noticed your specialty, the burdens you carry, and the efforts you put forth. In her kindness, she hopes this potion brings you a peaceful slumber wherever you are.

This vial also contains her deepest sincerity and affection for you. It grants its owner unrestricted access to Porto-Veno Castle. All of Fisalias' elixirs, secrets, and resources... are yours to claim.

44010032.Name: Phantom: Lorelei
44010032.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

70050060.Name: "Messenger of Deep Dreams"
70050060.Desc:
A seemingly ordinary feather, soft and warm to the touch.

A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams."
70050060.Bg:
This feather doesn't belong to any real bird, yet it looks somewhat familiar to you.

For a brief moment, holding it evokes the sensation of overlooking the entire Somnoire from great heights.

Though its purpose remains unclear for now, it might come in handy one day.

"If you gaze into the abyss of dreams, the abyss of dreams gazes also into you."

70050061.Name: Eerie Sketchbook
70050061.Desc: An eerie Sketchbook scribbled in messy and twisted handwriting.
70050061.Bg: An eerie sketchbook, its pages inscribled with a haunting song, scribbled in twisted handwriting. What once were vivid fantasies have now turned into silent tears, dripping across its surface and leaving behind blurry and heartbreaking stains.

50010001.Name: Morphable Echo - Gusts of Welkin
50010001.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Gusts of Welkin.

2pcs Set: Aero DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
50010001.Bg: Between the cracks, the gentle breeze cleanses impurities like a clear spring...

50020001.Name: Morphable Echo - Gusts of Welkin
50020001.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Gusts of Welkin.

2pcs Set: Aero DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
50020001.Bg: Between the cracks, the gentle breeze cleanses impurities like a clear spring...

80110418.Name: With Glory I Shall Fall
80110418.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110418.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110419.Name: Chains of Oath, Echoes of Promise
80110419.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110419.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110420.Name: Rippling Starlight
80110420.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110420.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110421.Name: Suspended Twilight
80110421.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110421.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110422.Name: Moonlit Solitude
80110422.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110422.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110423.Name: Lost at Sea
80110423.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110423.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

50031515.Name: Morphable Echo - Tidebreaking Courage
50031515.Desc:
Open to obtain a random Echo of the following Sonata Effect: Tidebreaking Courage.

2pcs Set: Energy Regen +10%.

5pcs Set: The Resonator's ATK is increased by 15%. When reaching 250% Energy Regen, the Resonator gains 30% all Attribute DMG increase.
50031515.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001525.Name: Midnight Veil & Gusts of Welkin
50001525.Desc:
Open to obtain an Echo from one of the following Sonata Effects:

Midnight Veil
Gusts of Welkin
50001525.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

42600022.Name: Core of Oath
42600022.Desc: A strange Tacetite Bloom arranged in a spiral pattern. Can be used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Bloodpact's Pledge.
42600022.Bg: This uniquely shaped Tacetitie Bloom encages an ancient yet powerful core from which you sense a familiar power.
Source: Fabricatorium of the Deep Exploration Progress Reward

50001201.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo V
50001201.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Frosty Resolve: Abyssal Patricius (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Eternal Radiance: Diurnus Knight (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Midnight Veil: Questless Knight (Havoc DMG Bonus)
Empyrean Anthem: Chop Chop (Energy Regen)
Tidebreaking Courage: Abyssal Gladius (Energy Regen)
Gusts of Welkin: Hurriclaw (Aero DMG Bonus)
50001201.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

50001202.Name: Malleable Elite Class Echo VI
50001202.Desc:
Open to claim one <color=Rare5>5-Star Elite Class Echo</color> of your choice.

List of Echoes:
Frosty Resolve: Cuddle Wuddle (Glacio DMG Bonus)
Eternal Radiance: Abyssal Mercator (Spectro DMG Bonus)
Midnight Veil: Nocturnus Knight (Havoc DMG Bonus)
Empyrean Anthem: Vitreum Dancer (Energy Regen)
Tidebreaking Courage: Chop Chop (Energy Regen)
Gusts of Welkin: Capitaneus (Aero DMG Bonus)
50001202.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

42.Name: Matrix Crystal
42.Desc: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
42.Bg: The Tethys System faithfully logs every action in the simulated battleground. These data crystallize into tangible forms, fueling the Stellar Matrices' calculations. Though not in reality, every success and failure paves the way to the future.

43.Name: Popularity
43.Desc: A unit of quantified influence used to support your favorite Cube. Only to be used in the Second Coming of Solaris.
43.Bg: Enjoy the attention on you and the competition itself! Feel the rush of wild winds upon the field, and embrace both the victories and defeats that await at the finish line.

71500026.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500026.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500026.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500027.Name: The Gospel that Receives Harmonized Praise
71500027.Desc:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500027.Bg: "Amidst the panicked Fools, he stood out, kneeling devoutly before the terrifying anomaly. Raising his brooch high, he chanted hymns, surrendering himself to the tide until he became one with it..."

71500028.Name: The Gaze that Pierces Through Time
71500028.Desc:
Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500028.Bg: "He bent down and picked up the box, salvaged from the wreckage. Its surface, stained with blood, radiated a strange, captivating glow. This eerie luster seemed to beckon him, drawing him away from the tragic aftermath of the crew's violent fights. Without a glance back, he vanished into the depths of the island."

71500029.Name: The Call that Comes from a Lost Land
71500029.Desc:
Each time the Resonators in the team cast Resonance Liberation, Resonance Skill DMG of all Resonators in the team is increased by 62.5%, stacking up to 2 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500029.Bg: The traveler clung to the belief that the blood flowing through his veins was tied to a lineage from a land long forgotten by Rinascita. The visions of cold and fjords relentlessly plagued his mind. Finally, he poured all his savings into a ship, set sail, and never returned.

71500030.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500030.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500030.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500031.Name: The Wave that Cleanses the World
71500031.Desc:
Casting Resonance Liberation grants 36% Spectro DMG Bonus per second for 15s to the active Resonator, stacking up to 4 times.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500031.Bg: Some Acolytes believed the Dark Tide was not a disaster but a trial to weed out nonbelievers so that only the Righteous remained. This heretical notion quickly faded into obscurity, but not before the heretics created weapons that harnessed the power of the Dark Tide itself, weapons now lost to the depth of the sea.

71500032.Name: The Finale that Fails to Reach
71500032.Desc:
Each time defeating a target increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 9%, stacking up to 10 times.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500032.Bg: "Mary, by the time you read this letter, everything will have already settled. Do not mourn for me. I have given my life willingly, alongside my comrades, to defend the glory of the Sentinel. We will ascend to the heavens and stand beside Them."

71500033.Name: The Resolve that Burns for All or Nothing
71500033.Desc:
Casting Intro Skill gives all Resonators in the team 150% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500033.Bg: He continued to roll the dice, silently praying that he wouldn't be forced to face the fate head-on. Yet, deep down, he understood that by continuing to roll, he had already made his choice. He was prepared to bring it all to an end.

80130000.Name: Pioneer of the Virtual Frontier
80130000.Desc: A special reward obtained in "Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials." It records the highest total Stress Level reached during the challenge.
80130000.Bg: This marks the borderline of simulation, not the end of your potential. The crisis may persist, but the flame of hope burns ever brighter.

Tag: Please contact our Customer Service for assistance
36000015.Name: Modifier
36000015.Desc: Used to modify the Mainstat of an unenhanced 5-Star Echo.
36000015.Bg: Used to adjust Echo frequencies to obtain different characteristics.

44.Name: Magic Dice
44.Desc: A dice for the Warmup. Can be used in the Cubie Derby: Warmup.
44.Bg: A peculiar dice crafted to spice up the match. Its creator believes that luck-based competition is far more thrilling than mere tests of strength, especially when a single lucky roll can help the underdog snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

80130001.Name: Ruler of the Tower
80130001.Desc: An honor Huanglong presents to those who have achieved tremendous feats in the Tower of Adversity. A testament to their courage, wisdom, and strength.
80130001.Bg: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 10 Trial Phases.

80130002.Name: Legend of the Deep
80130002.Desc: In the abyssal dark, you stilled numerous tempests unnamed. Under the beacon you ignited, wandering souls have finally found their way home.
80130002.Bg: Clear 10 phases of Whimpering Wastes: Infinite Torrents with SSS Rank.

71550010.Name: Fortified Flour
71550010.Desc: Material needed for a Lollo Errand.
71550010.Bg: Flour with enriched nutrients sold in the Gondola Market, which fuels the body and satiates hunger.

71550011.Name: Margherita's Gift of Milk
71550011.Bg: A natural dairy product, not only suitable for direct drinking, but also can provide a unique milk flavor for the dish.

71550012.Name: Margherita's Gift of Flour
71550012.Bg: Food made from ground wheat, rich in starch, often used for making staple food.

70050062.Name: Repaired Key
70050062.Desc: A key obtained upon passing the Remnant Trial. It might unlock the answers you seek.
70050062.Bg: A key obtained upon passing the Remnant Trial. It might unlock the answers you seek.

70050063.Name: Above the Stars
70050063.Desc: A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
70050063.Bg:
A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
You can zoom in to view the photo.

80200001.Name: Special Cube Cookie
80200001.Desc: A kind of special cookie that can be found in the Cube World. Used to increase Cube Experience.
80200001.Bg: Theoretically, pastries loaded with sugar and fat aren't great for fitness, but... it's just a game, so go ahead and indulge!

80200002.Name: 1st Anniversary Coin
80200002.Desc: A kind of commemorative coin that can be used to buy supplies and rewards from Abbowser.
80200002.Bg: An event token commemorating the first anniversary of the Second Coming of Solaris's beta test. The tail was intended to feature the Pioneer Association's logo, but somehow, it bears Abbowser's portrait instead. It seems Abbowser has taken a particular interest in this coin.

80200003.Name: Forsaken Key
80200003.Desc: A key appeared from nowhere. Used to unlock the lower levels of Abbowser Castle.

80110501.Name: The Second Departure
80110501.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110501.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110502.Name: Behind Gateway Thirty Three
80110502.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110502.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110503.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110503.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110504.Name: Drowning Five Times Over
80110504.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110504.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.
