80110505.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110505.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110506.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110506.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110507.Name: Beyond Ruin Nighty Nine
80110507.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110507.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110508.Name: Phantoms of Ten Towers
80110508.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110508.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110509.Name: Never-ending Night
80110509.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110509.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110520.Name: Heavy is the Desire
80110520.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110520.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110424.Name: Eversinging Song
80110424.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110424.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110425.Name: When the Bird Glides Across the Sky
80110425.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110425.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80004001.Name: Supermassive Birthday Cake (2025)
80004001.Desc: An item serving as access to the Birthday Celebration. Used to review blessings sent by your companions.
80004001.Bg: An anonymously gifted birthday cake, brimming with warm wishes and blessings. With rich chocolate, colorful fruit jam, and a lifelike marshmallow Abby on top, it's almost too wonderful to eat!

45.Name: Adventure Log
45.Desc: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
45.Bg: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

70050064.Name: "Blazing Claw"
70050064.Desc: The brass knuckles Zani used to wear, as famous as the Blazing Nightwalker's tale itself.
70050064.Bg: For endless nights, these brass knuckles were her only light in the darkness. Now dawn finally breaks. The Blazing Nightwalker may fade into legend and even be lost in history, but the adventures you shared will stay with you forever.

10001507.Name: Zani's Waveband
10001507.Desc: Can be used to activate Zani's Resonance Chain.
10001507.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001407.Name: Ciaccona's Waveband
10001407.Desc: Can be used to activate Ciaccona's Resonance Chain.
10001407.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

46.Name: Nightmarket Token
46.Desc: A black-gold metallic token that the Gilded Nightmarket accepts in exchange for all sorts of items.
46.Bg: A chip found in Black Alley. Some say it is cast from the daggers of the defeated, while others say it is made from violently pried-off bottle caps... In any case, it's worth something to Black Alley merchants.

80004002.Name: The Stars that Shine For You
80004002.Desc: A customized 2025 birthday accessory for Rover. Before you even notice, this crown gently finds its way into your Backpack.
80004002.Bg: Before you even notice, this crown gently finds its way into your Backpack. Our bonds shine like starlight, weaving stories as brilliant as the boundless galaxies.

80004003.Name: Happie Birthdaie!
80004003.Desc: The 2025 birthday song, magnificently performed by the Plushie Squad.
80004003.Bg: A sweet Rinascitan-style birthday song performed by the Plushies of the Plushie Village, infused with their warmest wishes just for you!

80130003.Name: Darkness Repeller
80130003.Desc: The countless overwritten records epitomise your tribulations and the limit you have yet reached.
80130003.Bg: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 5 Trial Phases.

80130004.Name: Adversity Expeditioner
80130004.Desc: You've reached the boarder of the Tower of Adversity. Truth lines beyond a thin wall.
80130004.Bg: Obtain all Crests in the Tower of Adversity: Hazard Zone in 1 Trial Phase.

80130005.Name: Nightkeeper of Oceans
80130005.Desc: You plummeted to the ocean's abyss, where numerous valiant souls lie silently in their eternal vigil.
80130005.Bg: Clear 5 phases of Whimpering Wastes: Infinite Torrents with SSS Rank.

80130006.Name: Overwatcher of Tides
80130006.Desc: The seatides swell to embrace you, in your triumphant return from the beyond.
80130006.Bg: Clear 1 phase of Whimpering Wastes: Infinite Torrents with SSS Rank.

80200004.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module III
80200004.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 3 or Lv. 4 Module.
80200004.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

50000106.Name: Podcast Basic Supply Pack
50000106.Desc:
Open to claim a type of basic resource of your choice:
<color=Rare2>Basic Resonance Potion x10</color>
<color=Rare2>Basic Energy Core x10</color>
<color=Rare2>Basic Sealed Tube x4</color>
<color=Rare2>Shell Credit x10000</color>
50000106.Bg: A Supply Pack filled with essentials for your adventures, courtesy of the Pioneer Podcast for their dedicated audience. Stay curious out there, friend.

50000107.Name: Podcast Medium Supply Pack
50000107.Desc:
Open to claim a type of medium resource of your choice:
<color=Rare3>Medium Resonance Potion x5</color>
<color=Rare3>Medium Energy Core x5</color>
<color=Rare3>Medium Sealed Tube x3</color>
<color=Rare3>Shell Credit x15000</color>
50000107.Bg: A Supply Pack filled with essentials for your adventures, courtesy of the Pioneer Podcast for their dedicated audience. Stay curious out there, friend.

50000108.Name: Podcast Advanced Supply Pack
50000108.Desc:
Open to claim a type of advanced resource of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Advanced Resonance Potion x5</color>
<color=Rare4>Advanced Energy Core x5</color>
<color=Rare4>Advanced Sealed Tube x4</color>
<color=Rare4>Shell Credit x40000</color>
50000108.Bg: A Supply Pack filled with essentials for your adventures, courtesy of the Pioneer Podcast for their dedicated audience. Stay curious out there, friend.

50000109.Name: Podcast Premium Supply Pack
50000109.Desc:
Open to claim a type of premium resource of your choice:
<color=Rare5>Premium Resonance Potion x5</color>
<color=Rare5>Premium Energy Core x5</color>
<color=Rare5>Premium Sealed Tube x4</color>
<color=Rare5>Shell Credit x100000</color>
50000109.Bg: A Supply Pack filled with essentials for your adventures, courtesy of the Pioneer Podcast for their dedicated audience. Stay curious out there, friend.

47.Name: Trial Point
47.Desc: Can be used to increase your Trial Level.
47.Bg: The essence of tribulations endured by warriors, which charges up the Banners of Conquest.

48.Name: Hunt Point
48.Desc: Can be used to increase your Glory Level.
48.Bg: The essence of bravery shown by warriors, which charges up the Banners of Conquest.

71500034.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500034.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500034.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500035.Name: The Sails that Display Endeavor
71500035.Desc:
Casting Resonance Liberation Amplifies Resonance Skill DMG of the active Resonator by 90% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500035.Bg: Time was too short—he only managed to save a single possession before plunging into the sea. Even as his lungs emptied of air, his grin widened. "Surely, I'm the greatest merchant in the world! Trading my life for my family's future—a bargain like no other!"

71500036.Name: The Stigma that Signifies Vainglory
71500036.Desc:
When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500036.Bg: "Return, people, to ways of old, and cast aside the arrogant boasts of progress. For yesterday's light shall ever outshine today's pale imitation, as today dimly outglows tomorrow's coming darkness. Cling to the known, the tried, the true. Only then may we find shelter from the terrors and confusion of the unknown."

71500037.Name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
71500037.Desc:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500037.Bg: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

70140080.Name: Crimson Baton
70140080.Desc: Phrolova's baton, imbued with part of her Forte.
70140080.Bg:
A precarious alliance demands deep trust. She handed you her last hope, just to earn a moment of your faith.
Keep it close. Even from afar, a temporarily allied enemy must remain in your grasp.

50000110.Name: Weekly Challenge Supply Pack
50000110.Desc:
Open to claim a type of advanced skill material of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Monument Bell x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Unending Destruction x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Dreamless Feather x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sentinel's Dagger x1</color>
<color=Rare4>The Netherworld's Stare x1</color>
<color=Rare4>When Irises Bloom x1</color>
50000110.Bg: Upon touching the chest, you hear what sounds like a battle hymn.

72010033.Name: Torn Pages from Avinoleum
72010033.Bg: Torn pages found in Avinoleum. Collect them all and deliver them to Fuling.

72010034.Name: Titular Repository Memoir
72010034.Bg: "The Sentinel teaches us to illuminate the world for others, and never let it dim for those beside us."

49.Name: Matrix Crystal
49.Desc: A data crystal generated by the system's backend, containing challenge-related data. Can be used to redeem event rewards in "Virtual Crisis."
49.Bg: The Tethys System faithfully logs every action in the simulated battleground. These data crystallize into tangible forms, fueling the Stellar Matrices' calculations. Though not in reality, every success and failure paves the way to the future.

51026.Name: Reunion's Tidal Aid
51026.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51027.Name: Reunion's Tidal Collection
51027.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51028.Name: Reunion's EXP Aid
51028.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51029.Name: Reunion's Forgery Aid
51029.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51031.Name: Reunion's Shell Credit Aid
51031.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52005.Name: Returnee's Radiant Aid
52005.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52006.Name: Returnee's Radiant Collection
52006.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52007.Name: Returnee's Solvent Aid
52007.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52008.Name: Returnee's Shell Credit Aid
52008.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

52009.Name: Returnee's Forgery Aid
52009.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

50.Name: Challenge Progress
50.Desc: Your progress in the "Banners Never Fall" event. Unlock bountiful rewards by increasing your progress.
50.Bg: Valiant warriors, go claim the final victory!

80200005.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module IV
80200005.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 4 or Lv. 5 Module.
80200005.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

80200006.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module V
80200006.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 5 or Lv. 6 Module.
80200006.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

80200007.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module VI
80200007.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 6 Module.
80200007.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

72010035.Name: Token of Radiance
72010035.Desc: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige. Can be used to redeem rewards in Radiant Selection.
72010035.Bg: A badge that represents the spirit of the duel. Furius hopes it sparks the fire within challengers during their fights and drives them to seek true glory.

72010036.Name: Prestige Point
72010036.Desc: Frequency data collected from fights in Peaks of Prestige. Used to unlock or enhance special Echoes exclusive to the event.
72010036.Bg: Echoes from Peaks of Prestige can't be enhanced using Sealed Tubes or processed in Data Bank. Instead, players must use Frequency data called "Prestige Points" to unlock or enhance them.

72010037.Name: Duel Resonance
72010037.Desc: A stored memory of your battles in Peaks of Prestige. Used to increase your level in the event.
72010037.Bg: Using the Terminal's built-in recorder, Duelists can review every match they've fought. For those who want to improve, studying past duels is essential.

72010038.Name: Fame Flag
72010038.Desc: A virtual flag that marks your victories in Peaks of Prestige. It stands as a symbol of fame and unmatched skill.
72010038.Bg: While Duelists don't fight like Gladiators, they share the same goal: to claim victory and glory in the heat of battle.

80001051.Name: Pasta Bocadillo
80001051.Desc: Gives 8% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team and increases their Max HP by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001051.Bg:
For a wandering bard like Ciaccona, meals on the road are all about striking a balance between taste and convenience.
One day, as the campfire crackled to life, she had an idea and took the bread she always carried.
As the rich aroma of meat sauce filled the air, seeping into the bread's warm crust, she spread on the final layer of seasoning.
However, there's an unspoken rule. Ragunna's pasta is not to be tampered with. No shortcuts, no twists. Taking a bite of her creation, Ciaccona was lost in her thoughts. "If I ever get banished, this bread might just be one of the reasons."

80001044.Name: One-Pot Pasta
80001044.Desc: Reduces Wall Dash and Swimming STA cost for all Resonators in the team by 35% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001044.Bg:
Zani's pasta is a rich and flavorful dish, made by layering hearty meat sauce with cheese, sausage, and fragrant herbs before cooking it to perfection.
According to what she said, she first stumbled upon the idea while reheating a takeout meal that had gone cold after a long workday. On a whim, she threw in whatever ingredients she had on hand, and to her surprise, the result was unexpectedly delicious. What began as a quick fix soon turned into a carefully refined recipe.

50020.Name: Outift Voucher - 300 Lunites
50020.Desc: A special voucher issued across Solaris, valued at <color=Highlight>300</color> Lunites per voucher for outfit purchases.
50020.Bg: Across human civilizations, many take an interest in collecting vouchers. With unique fonts and designs from each era, these vouchers are like the outfits of history, carrying the memories of the past.

44010033.Name: Phantom: Nimbus Wraith
44010033.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010034.Name: Phantom: Crownless
44010034.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010035.Name: Phantom: Nightmare Crownless
44010035.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010036.Name: Phantom: Chest Mimic
44010036.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

70130016.Name: Picture of the First Cubie Derby
70130016.Desc: A commemorative photo from the Pioneer Association. Can be enlarged to view the details.
70130016.Bg: It was such a heated competition thanks to everyone's endless enthusiasm! As the saying goes, competition comes first… Ahem, I mean, friendship comes first!

80200008.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module I
80200008.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 1 or Lv. 2 Module.
80200008.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

80200009.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module II
80200009.Desc: Open to obtain a random Lv. 2 or Lv. 3 Module.
80200009.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

80200010.Name: Unanalyzed Awakening Module
80200010.Desc: Open to obtain a random Awakening Module.
80200010.Bg:
A collection of raw test objects (cached, unnormalized, with comments still present). Analysis yields non-deterministic results.
"Wait, this is new to me... Hey, what're you doing to my surprise?!"

53003.Name: Laurel Nymph
53003.Desc: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
53003.Bg: In the warm mist of the indoor hot spring, behind the fluttering chiffon veils, the laurel-crowned nymph casts her gentle gaze—a signal of invitation to a long-awaited, carefree holiday.

80130007.Name: Astral Modulator
80130007.Desc: As the sounds in your memory fall into place, their magnificent echo crosses eons to reach your ears. Throughout your journey, your identity and purposes slowly piece themselves back together, and once again, you, the Astral Modulator, return to the center stage.
80130007.Bg: Fully activate Rover: Spectro's Resonance Chain

80130008.Name: Lark Among Clouds
80130008.Desc: Wind, though invisible in form, can be seen through the flowers it blows, the flames it caresses, and the larks it makes soar. Wind carries the birdsong high, echoing, echoing... until it is heard once more.

80130009.Name: Hero Play Hero
80130009.Desc:
"The Flame Ranger still chooses to challenge an opponent who is simply unbeatable..."
The girl behind the curtain waves a hero figurine in her hand. Whether it was the light or something else, the figurine shone brightly in her grasp.

80130010.Name: Bloom in Snow
80130010.Desc: A bloom in snow is cold yet irresistibly tempting to touch. But in the end, it cannot escape the natural order of things, and melts away in your hand.

80130011.Name: Crimson Jadeite
80130011.Desc: A girl who walks among the righteous and the wicked must constantly refine her sense of justice and morality. It is precisely because of this, that the jade pendant hanging from her chest remains so clear and pure.

80130012.Name: Unhindered Perception
80130012.Desc: "Sit, breathe, and find inner peace." She opens her eyes to perceive the gradual stabilization of frequencies, using pupils corroded by Tacet Discords. She had walked away, free from the blizzard.

80130013.Name: Leisurely Observer
80130013.Desc: Being half a step slower also meant that Taoqi had more time to observe the world. She gradually began to notice subtle changes in the marketplace. A brick was missing here. A flower had wilted there. The next season would arrive when she was aware.

80130014.Name: Flaming Intellect
80130014.Desc:
Many people light fires they cannot hope to contain.
But he is the creator of fire, the master of fire, and the smotherer of fire.

80130015.Name: Grand Master
80130015.Desc:
They say Yuanwu can best any challenger in three minutes. It takes him one minute to step into the ring, then another minute to perform a ceremonial bow, and one final minute before the kettle comes to a boil.
"Come now, all martial artists are friends. Do stay for a cup of tea."

80130016.Name: Market Maker
80130016.Desc:
In the market, Aalto floats on the boundary between buying and selling, playing different roles: investor, opportunist, and market mover. He lays chips in every corner.
Every investment made is an avenue of future wealth.

80130017.Name: Whispers Amidst the Blooms
80130017.Desc: Planting seeds, watering and nurturing them till they sprout and bloom... That's how Verina initially imagined what the process of "Healing" meant.

80130018.Name: Wooly Warrior
80130018.Desc: Encore's paradise is in the land of imagination. Brave Wooly Warriors and their wooly companions leap from the pages of books to a "Happily Ever After."

80130019.Name: Fangs in Shadow
80130019.Desc: The "hound" in the shadow stalks his prey. First, he is calm, waiting for his target to move through the crowd. Then, unease sets in as the surroundings grow eerily quiet. Finally, the fangs are bared, and the target can no longer see its own shadow.

80130020.Name: Lion Dancer
80130020.Desc: With every step a dance, he will surely leap to the highest perch.

80130021.Name: Heart of Clear Mirror
80130021.Desc: With a limpid mind and sustained inner peace, she, who has undergone the trials of the world, completes the final piece of the mirror. The heart is a mirror. The mirror reflects her heart.

80130022.Name: Loong with the Wind
80130022.Desc: "The enemies surging in were suddenly met by a streak of blue light. Qingloong swept in with the wind, and after the storm subsided, the Midnight Rangers' flag stood tall on the high ground…"

80130023.Name: Silent Judge
80130023.Desc: Like a puppet with a thousand faces, she walks through the shadows in different facades. But at the end of the day, she's still the one holding the strings.

80130024.Name: Chrono Thawbringer
80130024.Desc:
It was an age when the flow of time was chaotic, with dawn blurring into dusk and the cold proving relentless.
Doubt, weariness, and the weight of duty... such was the life of a Magistrate. Though quite young, she shouldered it all as she ascended the mountain, striving to illuminate the sky with a sliver of candlelight. It was the moment when winter relented. The thaw came, and the slopes awoke, bathed in the first tender hues of spring...

80130025.Name: Eternal Fire
80130025.Desc:
Changli wishes for an era of peace and prosperity.
This is the longest game of Weiqi she's ever played, and with each move, she becomes a part of the game, an eternal fire that lights the way.

80130026.Name: Vision of Truth
80130026.Desc:
Xiangli Yao often describes himself as a greedy person, who is hungry for truth, yet equally starves for the warmth of human bonds.
Though he often gazes at the stars, he occasionally casts glances at the distant mountains and the vast land they anchor. And with each step forward, he measures the distance he has traveled, the life he has lived.
80130026.Bg: Fully activate Xiangli Yao's Resonance Chain

80130027.Name: Ink Dyed Nature
80130027.Desc:
She prefers colors on ink and wash, which, while not the most dazzling, still depict a stunning array of hues.
This is Zhezhi's true colors, that which she hopes will one day burst forth with the power to leave others in awe.
Or at least, during self-introductions...

80130028.Name: Stellar Roamer
80130028.Desc: Starlight falls into the deep sea, filling all of her longing and emptiness. In vastness and loneliness, she stood watch over the shores that exist only because of {Male=him;Female=her}... This is her innate duty, both past and future.

80130029.Name: Keen Conservator
80130029.Desc: Though young, Youhu can already distinguish real antiques from fakes. Valuables weighed down by time can only be cherished and cared for when entrusted to those who understand their value.

80130030.Name: Camellya Rouge
80130030.Desc: Blossom, wither, and bloom again with memories of the past. When red and white converge... What form will Camellya take when she flowers once more in your eyes?

80130031.Name: Courier of Dawn
80130031.Desc:
We Promise, We Deliver!
Bright and cheerful Lumi travels across the vast land of Solaris, delivering messages from distant places to those on her route.

80130032.Name: Overflowing Opal
80130032.Desc:
Before this radiant moment arrived, the "gem" had endured endless nights of rain.
Once, she loathed the downpower, but now she embraces the rhythm... With patient hands, she polished the rough stone that was "herself" until it shimmered with a thousand captured hues, in the name of Montelli, and more so in the name of Carlotta.

80130033.Name: Dancer in the Starlight
80130033.Desc: How should the stage be set for a drama? Spotlights check, curtains check, magnificent costumes? Check. "Pero Pero!" A strange box jumps up and hands her a confetti gun. "Ta-da!" —It's showtime!

80130034.Name: The Merry Fool
80130034.Desc: Set sail! The curtain rises! This maritime stage belongs to Brant. From the bow comes the scent of "Troupe Strength" and wild laughter mocking the outdated doctrines of The Order. On deck, they're rehearsing plays banned by The Order. From the stern, the sea chases after them in pursuit.

80130035.Name: Envoy of Light
80130035.Desc: "As the sand of time flickers through your finger, please remember: in the gentle starlight, among beautiful waves, beneath the lantern... and where the kindness of your heart shines, my unspoken words are waiting for you... Listen! The door is open. It's time to move on."

80130036.Name: Diver of Dreams
80130036.Desc: Where does the dream end and reality begin? The moment your fingers meet the jellyfish, you're falling into a deep sea, descending ever deeper... Only to surface at last into the calm harbor of her gaze.

80130037.Name: Soloist of Fate
80130037.Desc: Listen! The chimes of a starry, starry night, a prelude to the young maid's song. Bright as midsummer sun even in the depth of the night, yet gentle as the breeze on a summer's day. The wind carries her music across the dark, a melodic story that greets the dawn.

80130038.Name: Night Aflame
80130038.Desc:
A fixed routine isn't that bad. Stability has got to count for something. These are words Zani lives by.
Her routine consists of work, meals, sleep, and the occasional bouts of saving the world. Life, after all, is simply a matter of style.

80130039.Name: Havoc Reaper
80130039.Desc: In the face of darkness, shadow, and fear, courage is your sharpest blade.
80130039.Bg: Fully activate Rover: Havoc's Resonance Chain

80130040.Name: The Vanguard Gale
80130040.Desc: The wind that sweeps across mountains and seas knows no hesitation, no retreat. As steadfast as an ancient oath and as faithful as a time-forged pact, I am the blade of justice. I am the vanguard that never falters.
80130040.Bg: Fully activate Rover: Aero's Resonance Chain

52010.Name: Returnee's Forgery Aid
52010.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51.Name: Festivity Point
51.Desc: A token of festival gaiety obtained in Solaris New Voyage Celebration. Can be used to advance reward progress.
51.Bg: A true celebration should be full of life! Bring your friends, dive into the fun, and crank up the excitement!

44010037.Name: Phantom: Fae Ignis
44010037.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010038.Name: Phantom: Cuddle Wuddle
44010038.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

52.Name: Challenge Progress
52.Desc: Your progress in the "Banners Never Fall" event. Unlock bountiful rewards by increasing your progress.
52.Bg: Valiant warriors, go claim the final victory!

50000203.Name: Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack
50000203.Desc: Open to claim one <color=Rare4>Golden Eternal series weapon</color> of your choice or <color=Rare5>Premium Tuner x200</color>.
50000203.Bg: It contains the powerful weapon selected by the Pioneer Association for its explorers.

71600003.Name: Verses and Rhythms
71600003.Desc: A sheet music book gifted by Ciaccona, preserving every melody she recorded on her travels.
71600003.Bg: A sheet music book gifted by Ciaccona, preserving every melody she recorded on her travels. With her Forte, she can bring the stories behind the music back to life.

51030.Name: Reunion's Sealed Tube Aid
51030.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

71250001.Name: "Script"
71250001.Desc: A play script given by Phrolova.
71250001.Bg:
A script telling a story. It updates its contents as the plot progresses.
Every actor has their assigned role, and all stories unfold exactly as written, unless...

71250002.Name: Champion's Medal
71250002.Desc: A medal awarded to the winner of Septimont's Agon of Champions.
71250002.Bg:
A medal split in two. Lupa wears the other half. 
It's a testament to the applause you've earned in the City of Glory and the symbol of the triumph you've achieved side by side.

53004.Name: Splashing Summer
53004.Desc: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
53004.Bg: Soft satin smoothly flows down from her body. The droplets on her glisten like luxurious gems. As they dip into the water, ripples spread across the pool into you and the girl's heart.

54001.Name: "Dawn upon Thorns" Set
54001.Desc: Used to unlock the corresponding Echo Aspect set.
54001.Bg:
Once bound by thorns, these wings now break free, soaring into the boundless sea of clouds.
The old laws no longer hold sway, for they will carry you to the farthest skies of freedom.

10001207.Name: Lupa's Waveband
10001207.Desc: Can be used to activate Lupa's Resonance Chain.
10001207.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001409.Name: Cartethyia's Waveband
10001409.Desc: Can be used to activate Cartethyia's Resonance Chain.
10001409.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400214.Name: Unfading Glory
41400214.Desc: Lioness of Glory's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400214.Bg: When the hero's banner rises, even the mountains of Septimont honor this crown with respect. It's not made to dazzle like gold or gems. It's forged from sheer strength and unshakable will.

42601200.Name: Oaknut
42601200.Bg:
A nut from the tall evergreen trees of Septimont. They drop when ripe, waiting to be gathered by animals preparing for the coming year.
Where there's a Leaftail Fox, you'll usually find these nuts. The foxes wrap their tails in oak leaves and use the nuts as lures for unsuspecting prey.

42601210.Name: Amber Halite
42601210.Bg: These clear, cube-shaped halites, marked by unique swirling patterns, are found along Septimont's coastlines and coastal ravines. Septimontians often grind them into smelling salts or craft them into elegant jewelry.

42601220.Name: Bamboo Iris
42601220.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601220.Bg: A common purple flower from the Septimont plains. Locals use it for spice blends or as home décor.

42601230.Name: Bloodleaf Viburnum
42601230.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601230.Bg: Viburnums that grow in Border Mountains. Its deep red leaves stand out sharply, like blood seeping through the pale mountains.

80000057.Name: Oaknut Honeycake
80000057.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 10% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000057.Bg:
Add more syrup! No, even more! Until this honeycake is as sweet and warm as a hug! And don't forget to top it with some Oaknuts, the forest's blessings and nature's gift.
May you have a sweet day.

80000058.Name: Saltimbocca
80000058.Desc: Grants 40% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000058.Bg:
A traditional Septimont dish made from mashed veal and Bloodleaf Viburnums.
It's said that it leaps into your mouth and gives you courage for battle.
Septimontians drum and feast before the hunt. They defend their home with blood and flesh.

80000059.Name: Glory Roast Platter
80000059.Desc: Grants 50% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000059.Bg:
Skewers, poultry legs, and meat wraps. Now you've got yourself a Glory Roast Platter!
Come, Hero of Gladiators, Star of the Arena, take this "glory" and let's meet at the top!

80000060.Name: Frosted Cream Blizzard
80000060.Desc: Grants 25% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000060.Bg:
A cup of seemingly ordinary shaved ice. Is it really as ordinary as it looks?
...Alright, yes. It is absolutely ordinary. But for Septimontians, this simple treat is one of the few chances to truly cool down.

80000061.Name: Solis
80000061.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000061.Bg:
A popular energy drink among Septimont Gladiators.
Drink this can of Solis, and fight 'til the last breath!

80000062.Name: Bamboo Iris Crisps
80000062.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000062.Bg:
A local Septimontian Snack made from fried petals of Bamboo Iris. Light and crunchy.
Each pack holds just a few Bamboo Iris Crisps... and a whole lot of deliciously fragrant air. You won't stop at just one.

80000063.Name: Seasalt Popcorn
80000063.Desc: Grants 10% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team and increases their Max HP by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000063.Bg: Seasalt Popcorn, your must-have snack for any Agon. Salty, joyful, and healthy! Every bite brings the taste of the sea.

80000064.Name: Bubbly Buddy
80000064.Desc: Grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000064.Bg:
Whether you're watching Agons or catching every clash in the arena, it's there for you.
Zero sugar. Zero calories. Packed with Bloodleaf Viburnums. Let it fire up the arena!

80001061.Name: Heartpour
80001061.Desc: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 34% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001061.Bg:
Endorsed by Gladiator Star Lupa, it's still a hit across Septimont.
Lightly sweet, refreshingly smooth, and coming in a variety of flavors, it is best enjoyed ice cold.
For Lupa, fighting in the arena is an indispensable part of her life. At the breaks of matches, she still takes a sip of this Heartpour, remembering the thrill of the fight and the laughter she shared with her partner during the Agon of Champions.

80001047.Name: Knight-Errant's Essentials
80001047.Desc: Grants 34% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001047.Bg:
Prepared by Cartethyia herself, this Laurus Salad comes packed with extra Viscum Berries, crispy and sweet.
Now a wandering knight, she's hungry to learn, to grow, and to see the world.
Let's start with a salad made just for the wandering knight. This time, extra berries included!

80010057.Name: Oaknut Honeycake Recipe
80010057.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Oaknut Honeycake.
80010057.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Oaknut Honeycake.

80010058.Name: Saltimbocca Recipe
80010058.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Saltimbocca.
80010058.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Saltimbocca.

80010059.Name: Glory Roast Platter Recipe
80010059.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Glory Roast Platter.
80010059.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Glory Roast Platter.

80010060.Name: Frosted Cream Blizzard Recipe
80010060.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Frosted Cream Blizzard.
80010060.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Frosted Cream Blizzard.

80010061.Name: Solis Recipe
80010061.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Solis.
80010061.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Solis.

80010062.Name: Bamboo Iris Crisps Recipe
80010062.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Bamboo Iris Crisps.
80010062.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Bamboo Iris Crisps.

80010063.Name: Seasalt Popcorn Recipe
80010063.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Seasalt Popcorn.
80010063.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Seasalt Popcorn.

80010064.Name: Bubbly Buddy Recipe
80010064.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Bubbly Buddy.
80010064.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Bubbly Buddy.

71250003.Name: Her Oath
71250003.Desc: A fleeting trace in memory, one that belongs to Lupa for your journey in the City of Septimont.
71250003.Bg: The journey has come to an end. Her oath remains steadfast and sincere.

71250004.Name: Her Wishes
71250004.Desc: A fleeting trace in memory, one that belongs to Cartethyia for your journey in the City of Septimont.
71250004.Bg: The journey has come to an end. Her three wishes have now all come true.

53.Name: Dreamland Badge
53.Desc: A memento from the Dreamland, used to redeem rewards.
53.Bg: An exquisite badge once given to guests of Dreamland as a souvenir. The Hocus Pocus on it seems to be ever beckoning guests into a wonderland of boundless surprises.

54.Name: Lost Mirror Piece
54.Desc: A shard of mirror showing the reflection of the White Cat. Used to unlock Dream Boon.
54.Bg: A shard of mirror showing the reflection of the White Cat. But on which side of the mirror does reality lie? Glancing into it feels like delving into a dream.

71500038.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500038.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500038.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500039.Name: Whispers from Dim Abyss
71500039.Desc:
Grants 25% Fusion DMG Bonus. Casting Resonance Liberation recovers 2 points of Energy. Resonators can hold up to 2 points of Energy.
When Resonators deal Resonance Liberation DMG, 1 point of Energy is consumed to cast AoE attack, dealing 1500% Fusion DMG to nearby targets in total. This effect can be triggered up to once every 2s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500039.Bg:
"That unspeakable voice came from beyond the hull. Not even thick timber or thousands of feet of seawater could stop it from drilling into our minds. We tried to resist."
"But to no avail."

71500040.Name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
71500040.Desc:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500040.Bg: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

71500041.Name: The Gaze that Pierces Through Time
71500041.Desc:
Each time dealing Coordinated Attack DMG increases Basic Attack DMG of all Resonators in the team by 12%, stacking up to 10 times for 30s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500041.Bg: "He bent down and picked up the box, salvaged from the wreckage. Its surface, stained with blood, radiated a strange, captivating glow. This eerie luster seemed to beckon him, drawing him away from the tragic aftermath of the crew's violent fights. Without a glance back, he vanished into the depths of the island."

80130041.Name: The Death Defier
80130041.Desc:
The Divinity spoke whispers in her ears, she swung her sword in reply. Fate has written her a script, she tore the pages to shreds.
She has chosen her own path through gale and tide.

80130042.Name: Lupus Firestar
80130042.Desc: Flames ignite the cheers of the arena, as the wolf tears out the throats of every shadow. She is the brightest star on the field.

70050065.Name: The Meditating Blessed Maiden
70050065.Desc: An intact portrait of the Blessed Maiden discovered in the ruins of Avinoleum. You can zoom in to admire it.
70050065.Bg: The painting captures the Blessed Maiden's contemplation in the Seminary. Though it has weathered the passage of time, her sacred aura remains undimmed.

71250005.Name: Copper Mirror of Truth
71250005.Desc: A copper mirror given by Buling.
71250005.Bg:
An old copper mirror, simply crafted, with a fox-shaped tassel at its tail.
In the tales of Huanglong, mirrors are said to reveal hidden truths, and in certain hands, even legends may reflect reality.

55.Name: Badge of Glory
55.Desc: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
55.Bg: The Agon Medals are a mark of honor for the people of Septimont. Over time, they have become one of the symbols of the city itself. Inspired by that, this souvenir badge lets travelers carry home a piece of Septimont's fiery spirit. Even far away from Septimont, they can still hear the echo of battle in their hearts.

40040005.Name: Sonance Casket: Septimont
40040005.Desc: Sonance Caskets in Septimont are often found in precarious locations. Use Grapple for easier access. Deliver them to the Plushies in the Border Mountains in exchange for resources.
40040005.Bg: The product of a collapsed Sonoro Sphere, scattered all over the world. It records the untwisted memories of the past. The Plushies are collecting them—perhaps they'll have something in exchange.

70050070.Name: Samousas' Treasure
70050070.Desc: A heavy chest, stashed away here by Samousas.
70050070.Bg: It gives off a dull metallic clatter when shaken. It seems like it's packed with coins... and some dreams long since forgotten.

50001301.Name: Reminiscence - Glory of Freezing Crown
50001301.Desc: Open to get 1 random Glacio Echo, a material for weapon and skill upgrade, and Shell Credits.
50001301.Bg: Victory crowns the worthy. Frostcrest Gladiator offers her highest salute to your strength and to your unyielding will.

80130043.Name: Virtual Vanquisher
80130043.Desc: A special reward obtained in "Virtual Crisis: Frontier Trials." It records the highest total Stress Level reached during the challenge.
80130043.Bg: The Tethys System's Virtual Crises defy all reason, but you vanquished your limits in response. Now, you stand as a living beacon against the possible calamities, lighting the way forward.

50010002.Name: Morphable Echo - Windward Pilgrimage
50010002.Desc:

2pcs Set: Aero DMG +10%.

5pcs Set: Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.
50010002.Bg: The footprints in the rift will never fade...

Windward Pilgrimage
Flaming Clawprint
50001526.Bg: Through the cracks, deep rumbles of distant waves sound...

80110601.Name: Ode to the Nameless Martyr
80110601.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110601.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.
