70050071.Name: Fisalia Knight's Letter
70050071.Desc: A letter found in the underwater ruins near Ashen Dragon's Crypt of Septimont. It holds the final words of its master.
70050071.Bg: A letter found in the underwater ruins near Ashen Dragon's Crypt of Septimont. It holds the final words of its master.

51032.Name: New Voyage Radiant Lightpack
51032.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

51033.Name: New Voyage Radiant Heavypack
51033.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

71260001.Name: Orchestration Movement I
71260001.Desc: Phrolova composed this melody upon the founding of the Fabricatorium. She blended the music of her past into it, wishing that those dear and near to her might one day play it in the real world.
71260001.Bg: Incomplete sheet music, part of the core melody regulating the Fabricatorium of the Deep.

71260002.Name: Orchestration Movement II
71260002.Desc: Phrolova composed this melody upon the founding of the Fabricatorium. She blended the music of her past into it, wishing that those dear and near to her might one day play it in the real world.
71260002.Bg: Incomplete sheet music, part of the core melody regulating the Fabricatorium of the Deep.

71260003.Name: Orchestration Movement III
71260003.Desc: Phrolova composed this melody upon the founding of the Fabricatorium. She blended the music of her past into it, wishing that those dear and near to her might one day play it in the real world.
71260003.Bg: Incomplete sheet music, part of the core melody regulating the Fabricatorium of the Deep.

71260004.Name: Sacred Salt
71260004.Desc: An item that Butler the Steward of the Order at the Supply Station is collecting and willing to trade for.
71260004.Bg: To the Acolytes, Sacred Salt has the ability to cleanse anything untouched by the Sentinel's grace. With its purifying power, sliced bread turns into the Divinity's nurturing meal, ordinary wine becomes holy blood that grants enlightenment...
Source: Fabricatorium of the Deep Exploration Progress Reward

44010039.Name: Phantom: Nightmare Inferno Rider
44010039.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

70050066.Name: Above the Stars
70050066.Desc: A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
70050066.Bg:
A photo secretly taken by the Plushie Squad. They witnessed your ascending to the top.
You can zoom in to view the photo.

70140081.Name: Wilting Reverberation
70140081.Desc: A residual fragment of Phrolova's Forte. Though not nearly as strong as her baton, it remains just sufficient for Orchestrating.
70140081.Bg: As the blade drove through her chest, everything around her fell silent. Her body was flung away, light as a fallen petal. Tears and the blood bloomed into flowers unnoticed. In their midst, a melody whispered, softly and wistfully, of loss and regrets sunken beneath the sea.

80110426.Name: Husk of Broken Dreams
80110426.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110426.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110427.Name: Sunken Elegy
80110427.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110427.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110428.Name: Radiance Across Sea and Sky
80110428.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110428.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

41400224.Name: Truth in Lies
41400224.Desc: Fenrico's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400224.Bg: He fumbled forward through formless chaos, barely recalling when the shift in his perception took hold—the day he rose as the Primus, an icy conviction settled in his chest, so cold that it burned in his clenching grip.
Source: Fenrico: Deliverance in the Deep - Early Access

42601240.Name: Abyss Luminary
42601240.Bg:
A strange glowing marine life found in the ocean depths.
The Rinascita legend has it that the Sentinel left the Abyss Luminaries beneath the waves to guide the souls of the drowned.

42601250.Name: "Afterlife"
42601250.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601250.Bg:
A pure-white lycoris.
Its petals seem untinted by the vivid scarlet typical of its kind. Or perhaps the colors that were there have long faded. These delicate flowers bloom quietly in darkness. Just like the name they've been given, their unique appearance suggests maybe a whole new world exists beyond the Beyond.
"Things unfinished in this life shall wait for the next."

10001608.Name: Phrolova's Waveband
10001608.Desc: Can be used to activate Phrolova's Resonance Chain.
10001608.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

80001057.Name: Redcurrant Tart
80001057.Desc: Reduces Flight STA consumption for all Resonators in the team by 12% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001057.Bg: A tart drenched in thick, tangy jam that floods every crevice of the pastry, overpowering its sweetness. No one but Phrolova enjoys this zesty flavor, nor does anyone know where the tiny, sour berries even come from.

71500042.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500042.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500042.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500043.Name: Whispers from Dim Abyss
71500043.Desc:
Grants 25% Fusion DMG Bonus. Casting Resonance Liberation recovers 2 points of Energy. Resonators can hold up to 2 points of Energy.
When Resonators deal Resonance Liberation DMG, 1 point of Energy is consumed to cast AoE attack, dealing 1500% Fusion DMG to nearby targets in total. This effect can be triggered up to once every 2s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500043.Bg:
"That unspeakable voice came from beyond the hull. Not even thick timber or thousands of feet of seawater could stop it from drilling into our minds. We tried to resist."
"But to no avail."

71500044.Name: Hymn to the End
71500044.Desc:
Amplifies Heavy Attack DMG and Electro DMG by 50%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500044.Bg: …In the end, only this strange melody echoed across the empty seabed. The first note of a promised world that never came.

71500045.Name: Sail Against the Storm
71500045.Desc:
Casting Echo Skill increases Havoc DMG by 20%, stacking up to 2 times. The same Resonator cannot trigger this effect again with the same Echo Skill. At 2 stacks, the Resonator's next instance of damage dealt triggers an AoE attack, dealing 800% Havoc DMG to nearby targets. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500045.Bg: "Hoist the sail! This won't be the end. Our legend is just beginning!"

71030004.Name: Dream Imprint
71030004.Desc: An old-style detective's hat, often a symbol of the protagonist in classic mysteries.
71030004.Bg:
"No matter how late you show up, you're a detective.
Everything leaves a trace and a detective must pursue it without end."
The story is far from over. Someone deep within the Somnoire has entrusted this to you, awaiting the day the story reaches its end.

42601260.Name: Shrimp Meat
42601260.Bg: Meat obtained from shrimps, tender and springy. In skilled hands, it can be transformed into exquisite dishes.

71260005.Name: Pilgrim's Scriptures
71260005.Desc: A book given to you by the Acolyte of the Sanctuary of Faith.
71260005.Bg: According to Acolyte Confere, this book offers the most comprehensive documentation of rites performed by the most devout of the Order. It may be worth studying.

56.Name: Badge of Glory
56.Desc: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
56.Bg: The Agon Medals are a mark of honor for the people of Septimont. Over time, they have become one of the symbols of the city itself. Inspired by that, this souvenir badge lets travelers carry home a piece of Septimont's fiery spirit. Even far away from Septimont, they can still hear the echo of battle in their hearts.

71270001.Name: Petals for Rosebearer
71270001.Bg:
At the height of the celebration, petals will shower down as everyone rejoices.
Beneath this rain of petals, people who fought side by side will share honey and wine. Such is a true moment of joy for the Septimontians.
To receive petals from the Rosebearer is an honor. And to bestow them? Just as great a privilege.

44010047.Name: Phantom: Fallacy of No Return
44010047.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010048.Name: Phantom: Kerasaur
44010048.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

57.Name: Adventure Log
57.Desc: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
57.Bg: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

80300001.Name: Sim Ingot
80300001.Desc: A simulated material composed of Remnant data, used to level up Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator."
80300001.Bg: A virtual material that imitates standard metal cubes. In real combat scenarios, similar materials can be easily reshaped into various components with a crafting bench.

58.Name: Blighted Fang
58.Desc: A calcified fang-shaped remnant of the Dark Tide creatures. Can be used to advance reward progress in Hunters' Rite.
58.Bg: A calcified fragment left behind by the Dark Tide creatures, shaped like a beast's fang. Though affected by Tidal Blight, it poses no threat and holds no practical purpose. To most, it's just another forsaken shard scattered across the Plateaus. But to Gladiators, Blighted Fangs carry meaning. Hunters who clash with the Dark Tide often claim these fangs from fallen Dark Tide creatures before they dissolve. Each fang is a blood-earned token of valor and a silent yet gleaming badge of honor.

42601270.Name: Titanhorn
42601270.Bg: A hardened horn from a Titanhorn Antelope. These creatures are known to feed on stone in the most unforgiving environments, resulting in horns as tough as the rocks they consume.

42601280.Name: Stone Rose
42601280.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601280.Bg: A strange flower that blooms where the Dark Tide has receded. Though its core has been completely calcified, a faint fragrance still lingers—a proof that life's resilience shall never be underestimated.

42601290.Name: Sliverglow Bloom
42601290.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601290.Bg:
A rare flower found only in the Sanguis Plateaus, said to glow like moonlight in the dark.
"O warriors, should shadow steal the moon, look down, and the Sliverglow Bloom still shines beneath your feet."

42601300.Name: Luminous Calendula
42601300.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601300.Bg:
A rare bloom found only in the Sanguis Plateaus, said to thrive where warriors have shed their blood.
When Gladiators die a glorious death in Septimont's wild hunts, their companions often place a Luminous Calendula at their graves as a solemn tribute to their courage and sacrifice.

10001306.Name: Augusta's Waveband
10001306.Desc: Can be used to activate Augusta's Resonance Chain.
10001306.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001410.Name: Iuno's Waveband
10001410.Desc: Can be used to activate Iuno's Resonance Chain.
10001410.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

59.Name: Waveborn Moonstone
59.Desc: A mineral that holds a glimmer of light. Can be used in the Moonlit Revelation event to decipher the Lunar Phases.
59.Bg: A natural blue mineral, known for its ability to absorb glimmers of light. When night falls, it gleams with a soft glow like moonlight rippling across the sea, hence the name Waveborn Moonstone. In Septimont, its association with the moon has made it a medium for reading the Lunar Phases.

80000065.Name: Marinated Olives
80000065.Desc: Grants 50% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000065.Bg:
The clever folk of Septimont know a thousand ways to prepare olives, but only the marinated kind truly wins their hearts.
A handful of olives and a good bottle of wine, that's all it takes to bring Septimontians the simplest joy and happiness sometimes.

80000066.Name: Blooming Bread
80000066.Desc: Grants 40% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000066.Bg:
A traditional staple of Septimont. Long before its people ever settled these highlands, this crisp-crusted, hearty bread had already become the most enduring flavor on their tongues.
To a Septimontian table, bread is what a sword is to a Gladiator.

80001065.Name: Sweetened Olives
80001065.Desc: Grants 55% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001065.Bg: Did someone pick these olives? Hardly. The branches, heavy with ripened fruit, simply yielded their bounty, dropping them gently into her waiting hands. No elaborate preparation could improve their natural, fresh flavor. A simple roll in honey is all it takes to satisfy her discerning palate: as the verdant aroma still clings to her fingertips, a wave of sweet freshness washes over her mouth.

80001066.Name: Sweetleaf Blooming Bread
80001066.Desc: Grants 44% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001066.Bg:
An ordinary, traditional bread found throughout Septimont, even in the far-off town of Fabianum. Perhaps to set it apart, local bakers in Fabianum would sprinkle crushed herbs over the crisp crust and, with a sense of ceremony, carve the word "Delicious" into the surface, as if this modest declaration could lend it a hint of dignity.
Is it delicious? The young Augusta never thought so. To her, it was just the dry, hard bread waiting at home after a day of running wild, something to fill her belly, the quiet "footnote" to every dinner her mother made. It was plain, unremarkable. Like water. Like sunlight. So ordinary it was easy to overlook. But years later, standing before her own stove in Septimont, Augusta tried to recapture that long-forgotten taste. And as the familiar scent and gentle sweetness returned to her tongue, she finally understood what "Delicious" meant.
Perhaps, she had never truly bid farewell to her hometown.

41400234.Name: Blighted Crown of Puppet King
41400234.Desc: The False Sovereign's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400234.Bg:
The shattered crown of the False Sovereign.
Forged from the collective yearning of the masses, the puppet took the form of their deepest desire. Yet its role as the Sovereign and even its very existence are nothing but a fabrication. When the tide recedes, the crown of power and authority is revealed to be nothing but a mask, tainted by the Dark Tide.

41400244.Name: Abyssal Husk
41400244.Desc: Lady of the Sea - Embers of Glory's drop, used for Resonator Ascension.
41400244.Bg:
The cheers, the applause, the cry for glory from within...
She sinks, as if into the depths of the sea, drifting ever farther from those sounds of her past, unable to respond.
In the stillness below, only the shadows of a sea creature circle her in silence.
Source: Lady of the Sea - Early Access

80300002.Name: "TD Slayer" Coupon
80300002.Desc: A special coupon prepared by KU-Uigon for Black Shores staff participating in "Tidal Defense Simulator." Can be used to redeem rewards during the event.

80010065.Name: Marinated Olives Recipe
80010065.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Marinated Olives.
80010065.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Marinated Olives.

80010066.Name: Blooming Bread Recipe
80010066.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Blooming Bread.
80010066.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Blooming Bread.

80130044.Name: The Nevermore
80130044.Desc: The living dwell upon the dark beyond, stubbornly denying the insurmountable divide between life and death.

80300003.Name: Rating Star
80300003.Desc: After completing a simulation in Tidal Defense Simulator, you receive Rating Stars based on your performance. They can be used to unlock Overwatch Protocols.
80300003.Bg: The Rating Star measures a participant's overall ability in handling threats. Only those who demonstrate exceptional leadership and tactical skills during the simulation are granted higher, more advanced access permissions.

80130046.Name: Eternal Blazing Sun
80130046.Desc: What is the Sun? She is the one who offers warmth and radiance without end. To this ancient land, she devotes her blood, her glory, and her life. And thus, she becomes the Sun, the eternal blaze for all to look upon.

80130048.Name: Defier of Fated End
80130048.Desc:
The Moon has always been herself, long before she knew she was the Moon.
She no longer peers into the future through the scattered light of fate, for she understands that wherever she sets her gaze, the future she seeks awaits. Amid the countless paths of destiny, she chooses to become the one true Anchor for herself.

80131001.Name: Catcher in the Tide
80131001.Desc: A special reward obtained from the "Tidal Defense Simulator" event. It records the highest TD waves you withstood in the "Total Defense Test."
80131001.Bg: Just as you once witnessed in the simulation, that towering tide will one day descend, engulfing all. But this time, you are ready to face it again.

10001208.Name: Galbrena's Waveband
10001208.Desc: Can be used to activate Galbrena's Resonance Chain.
10001208.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001411.Name: Qiuyuan's Waveband
10001411.Desc: Can be used to activate Qiuyuan's Resonance Chain.
10001411.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

41400254.Name: Curse of the Abyss
41400254.Desc: Threnodian Leviathan's drop, used for Skill Upgrade.
41400254.Bg: Once the manifestation of Leviathan's power, its calcified tail stands as a testament to the fall of an ancient divinity—yesterday's shackles long since broken. As the endless night recedes, the curse turns into strength, carried forth until the final waves.

52011.Name: Returnee's Forgery Aid
52011.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

42500100.Name: Skyhunter's Feather
42500100.Desc: Used to increase the Syntonization Rank of Hunter's Growl weapons.
42500100.Bg: A raw material for fine weapons in Septimont, meticulously shaped by Septimont's artisans into the form of a Gryphon's feather. Cold to the touch, yet burning with untempered resolve.

50000204.Name: Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack II
50000204.Desc: Open to claim one <color=Rare4>Golden Eternal</color> or <color=Rare4>Hunter's Growl</color> series weapon of your choice, or <color=Rare5>Premium Tuner x200</color>.
50000204.Bg: It contains the powerful weapon selected by the Pioneer Association for its explorers.

50000205.Name: Pioneer Podcast Syntonization Chest
50000205.Desc:
Open to obtain one exclusive Syntonization material of your choice, from either the Hunter's Growl series or the previous Pioneer Podcast Weapon:
<color=Rare4>Gilded Ginkgo x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Skyhunter's Feather x1</color>
50000205.Bg: Provided by the Pioneer Association, this Supply Chest contains base weapon materials and is updated in sync with Pioneer Podcast Weapon Chest.

80110430.Name: O Sun, Witness My Name
80110430.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110430.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110431.Name: Bury Me in Sunlight
80110431.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110431.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110432.Name: Eternity in a Breath
80110432.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110432.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110433.Name: In Moments Does Moon Persist
80110433.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110433.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110434.Name: Windswept Watch
80110434.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110434.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110435.Name: Funeral of the Fractured Realm
80110435.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110435.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110436.Name: Witherland of the Nameless
80110436.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110436.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110437.Name: If We Could Thread the Fate
80110437.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110437.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110438.Name: Return to Asphodel's Embrace
80110438.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110438.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

71270002.Name: Pure Dark Tide Frequency
71270002.Desc: A pure reverberation from the Dark Tide of the past.
71270002.Bg:
Pure and silent, this frequency has slumbered long enough to leave no ripples. As the firstborn of the Dark Tide, it carries the ancient will of its mother. Undeniably powerful yet defiant, it betrayed its creator in the abyss and now sleeps alone in the dark realm.
Only the sweet Resonance can stir its dreamless sleep… and awaken its long-forgotten hunger.

80400001.Name: Enhancement Module
80400001.Desc: Used to amplify the intensity of the participant's data across various categories during the simulation.
80400001.Bg: The more comprehensive data gathered across different simulation intensities become, the more Resonator allocation for future Waveworn Phenomenon encounters will improve.

80400002.Name: Simulation Data
80400002.Desc: Large quantities of data gathered during the testing of the hologram.
80400002.Bg: The more data is collected from the drills, the more accurate the Waveworn Phenomena simulations become.

80400003.Name: Knowledge Module
80400003.Desc: Used to unlock talents for the participant in the simulation.
80400003.Bg: Using different talents allows the participant to gather varying data, which leads to clearer training objectives for support personnels combating the Waveworn Phenomenon.

71500046.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500046.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500046.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500047.Name: Sail Against the Storm
71500047.Desc:
Casting Echo Skill increases Havoc DMG by 20%, stacking up to 2 times. The same Resonator cannot trigger this effect again with the same Echo Skill. At 2 stacks, the Resonator's next instance of damage dealt triggers an AoE attack, dealing 800% Havoc DMG to nearby targets. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500047.Bg: "Hoist the sail! This won't be the end. Our legend is just beginning!"

71500048.Name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
71500048.Desc:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500048.Bg: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

71500049.Name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
71500049.Desc:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500049.Bg: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

71500050.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500050.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500050.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500051.Name: Haven that Gleams Elegantly
71500051.Desc:
Grants 30% Fusion DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator casts Echo Skill or deals Echo Skill DMG, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 1600% of their ATK in total (considered Echo Skill DMG), triggered up to 1 time every 6s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500051.Bg: Its whisper repeated over and over, offering a tempting promise: Give up yourself. Give up your freedom. Give up your thoughts. Surrender everything, and live on like a bird in a cage. In return, it promises true happiness.

71500052.Name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
71500052.Desc:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500052.Bg: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

71500053.Name: A Breeze from Faraway Shores
71500053.Desc:
When a Resonator inflicts Aero Erosion upon enemies, the active Resonator in the team gains 40% Aero DMG Bonus for 15s, stacking up to 3 times. 

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500053.Bg: He heard from his grandmother that birds could carry wishes from the mortal world to the heavens. From that moment on, he began carving birds day and night, hoping that the Sentinel would allow him to see his departed mother once more. When the chisel in his hand suddenly fell to the ground, he realized that it was the moment the Sentinel answered his wish.

60.Name: Lollo Stamp
60.Desc: The voucher used to participate in the Lollo Genie special lottery.
60.Bg: Each time you complete an order and upload the data, Lollo Stamps will be transferred to your account as smoothly as a warm cup of milk before bed.

71270003.Name: Peso's Challenge Note
71270003.Desc: A note found behind the waterfall near the Three Heroes' Crest. Use to view details.
71270003.Bg: "It's located beside the House of Prophecy, beneath the Hornett."

80300004.Name: Sim Credits
80300004.Desc: Simulated Shell Credits composed of Remnant data, used to craft Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator" or purchase materials from KU-Money's Store.
80300004.Bg: These Shell-Credit-based currencies are used to represent the logistics budget earned during combat, including but not limited to supplies, manpower, Echo data, energy, and any other resources measurable in monetary terms.

71270004.Name: A Debt Note
71270004.Desc: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
71270004.Bg: Fictro owes Nolon his life for scribbling on his shield and needs to keep it safe until the hunt ends.

71270005.Name: A Reply Letter
71270005.Desc: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
71270005.Bg: Why buy such an expensive helmet? And it doesn't even fit! Return it!

71270006.Name: An Unsent Note
71270006.Desc: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
71270006.Bg: Thanks for the gift. Works like a charm. Still not ready to forgive you.

71270007.Name: A Challenge Letter
71270007.Desc: A scrap of paper retrieved from a fallen Gladiator.
71270007.Bg: Round Ten. Let's see who makes it to the Wastelands first, Fictro.

71280001.Name: Cloth of the Unyielding
71280001.Desc: The frequency lingering on the cloth still echoes the battles of old.
71280001.Bg:
A scrap of fabric imbued with the unyielding will of its former owner, a warrior who stood fearless against the Dark Tide.
Bathed in the Dark Tide, the Gladiator faced death without hesitation. Crimson blood long stained the cloth that bound his wounds. He fought. He bled. He rose. He fought again. Until death came, but never conquered.

71280002.Name: "Dawn of Home"
71280002.Desc: A finely crafted toy of unknown material. It emits a faint but warm frequency.
71280002.Bg:
A token of your successful completion of all the challenges in "Dreams of Cindertide: Septimont." A tribute to the long-awaited Hero of the Heroes from their loyal warriors.
It emits a faint but warm frequency, though its true purpose remains uncertain.
"The cherished homeland of mine... I wonder if flowers begin to bloom there once more?"

80500001.Name: Menu Board
80500001.Desc: A menu board made by Namipon for the cafe's opening day, showcasing the new food and drinks to be expected.
80500001.Bg: An embodiment of good wishes to the opening day of Shashou Cafe.

80500002.Name: Cherry Blossom Bonsai
80500002.Desc: A cherry blossom bonsai made by Chisa. She handpicked the branches from Sakura Quarter, where you two roamed together.
80500002.Bg: An embodiment of good wishes to the opening day of Shashou Cafe.

80500003.Name: Mysterious Standee
80500003.Desc: The standee Namipon made to celebrate the opening day according to your suggestions. It shows a mysterious, stylish, and adorable girl.
80500003.Bg: Legend has it that she is the Mysterious Scissorswoman hunting down Tacet Discords in Honami. How long can you meet her gaze?

50000115.Name: Weekly Challenge Supply Pack II
50000115.Desc:
Open to claim a type of advanced skill material of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Monument Bell x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Unending Destruction x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Dreamless Feather x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Sentinel's Dagger x1</color>
<color=Rare4>The Netherworld's Stare x1</color>
<color=Rare4>When Irises Bloom x1</color>
<color=Rare4>Curse of the Abyss x1</color>
50000115.Bg: Upon touching the chest, you hear what sounds like a battle hymn.

51034.Name: Champion's Battlesong Collection
51034.Desc: Obtain to receive the items inside.

71270008.Name: Anchor Stone Fragment
71270008.Desc: A shattered piece of an Anchor Stone.
71270008.Bg:
A shattered piece of an Anchor Stone, still emitting the force field as ever.
"Let this small thing pry open the cracks in fate's door."

71270009.Name: Imperator's Relic
71270009.Desc: A relic that Sentinel Imperator left you.
71270009.Bg: This relic from Sentinel Imperator has been sealed in the Earthrend Wedge, waiting silently for the destined hand. As your fingers lightly tap on its surface, a gentle wind whispers past your ear, carrying with it an unspoken tenderness from realms beyond the farthest horizon.

71270010.Name: Invitation Letter from Ephor's Palace
71270010.Desc: A handwritten invitation from Augusta herself.
71270010.Bg:
You feel lingering warmth on the envelope as you unfold the letter:

To Our Distinguished Guest from Afar,

I hope your stay in Septimont has been pleasant. Though we never met again after the Great Agon's Final, your deeds have already stirred fresh winds through our halls. Even from mere fragments of conversation, I know your arrival has breathed new life into our city.

While formalities were never Septimont's tradition, I must apologize for missing our appointed meeting. No excuse justifies such neglect toward a Champion of Septimont. Now, with preparations complete and sunrise approaching, I too await the dawn.

Should this invitation still find favor with you, I would be honored by your presence at Ephor's Palace. I await your coming with humble anticipation.

Augusta

71270011.Name: Lunarum Bracelet
71270011.Desc: A bracelet given to you by Iuno.
71270011.Bg: This bracelet has been with Iuno ever since she became a Priestess. Forged from lunarum and adorned with sprout motifs, it is not only a keepsake, but a quiet witness to her journey. Now, she entrusts it to you as a medium of Anchoring so you may draw upon her strength to reveal the Dark Tide creations.

71270012.Name: Old Anchor Stone
71270012.Desc: An Anchor Stone that looks a bit worn.
71270012.Bg:
A type of small device manufactured with Tacetite formed around the Earthrend Wedge. It provides energy to Anchor Obelisks, which in turn amplify its frequency to repel the Dark Tide and its creations.
During the hunts, Gladiators of Septimont strategically set up Anchor Obelisks carrying Anchor Stones at critical locations across Maroonwood, the main battlefield. These devices help them drive the Dark Tide and its creations toward the base of the Earthrend Wedge, where they are eliminated. The strategy has proven highly effective in preventing the Dark Tide's spread beyond the Earthrend Wedge's containment.

53005.Name: Downtown Repose
53005.Desc: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
53005.Bg:
She leans casually against the railing, her sweater soft against the light, appearing equally elegant as she is relaxed. Changing up the style every now and then isn't so bad.

Turning slightly, Zani looks down at the city stretching beneath her. The afternoon sunlight spills over the buildings, their outlines shimmering in the glow. She gazes quietly, letting the city's clamor become the backdrop to this moment of ease.

71270013.Name: Together in the Petal Rain
71270013.Desc: Bruno happened to capture this moment at the height of the celebration.
71270013.Bg: She has preserved many such memories in this way to guard against the fading blur brought on by her Anchoring ability. Those photos have blurred in the eyes of those who no longer recall her. But… this one marks a beginning. Moonlight pours down, filling the quiet void. For the first time, the present belongs to both of you.

71270014.Name: Together in the Petal Rain
71270014.Desc: Bruno happened to capture this moment at the height of the celebration.
71270014.Bg: She has preserved many such memories in this way to guard against the fading blur brought on by her Anchoring ability. Those photos have blurred in the eyes of those who no longer recall her. But… this one marks a beginning. Moonlight pours down, filling the quiet void. For the first time, the present belongs to both of you.

71270015.Name: Lunarum Bracelet
71270015.Desc: A bracelet given to you by Iuno, once again.
71270015.Bg: You tried to return it to her. Yet, in time, it found its way back to you. To wear it or keep it safe, the choice is yours, and in that choice lies her trust. But this time, it means something more. No longer merely a relic of her long and lonely journey, it has become proof that you reached out and drew the moon to your side. She Anchored the world, and you, with this, have Anchored her.

80600001.Name: Rice Dango
80600001.Desc: Used in Honami City to upgrade Cafe Decor, unlock Sticker slots, upgrade Namipon Badges, and make item purchases in the Supply Station.
80600001.Bg: A specialty snack from Homani City, widely praised for its soft, chewy texture and sweet, fragrant filling. Namipon's favorite. Deliver these to Namipon in exchange for items or use them to upgrade Cafe Decor.

71290001.Name: Lollo Logistics Delivery Box
71290001.Bg: A box with an "Items Insured" label affixed to the side. What valuables could be inside?

71500054.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500054.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500054.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500055.Name: Haven that Gleams Elegantly
71500055.Desc:
Grants 30% Fusion DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator casts Echo Skill or deals Echo Skill DMG, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 1600% of their ATK in total (considered Echo Skill DMG), triggered up to 1 time every 6s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500055.Bg: Its whisper repeated over and over, offering a tempting promise: Give up yourself. Give up your freedom. Give up your thoughts. Surrender everything, and live on like a bird in a cage. In return, it promises true happiness.

71500056.Name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
71500056.Desc:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500056.Bg: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

71500057.Name: A Question with Many Answers
71500057.Desc:
Ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies inflicted with Negative Statuses.
Resonators who inflict Negative Statuses on enemies recover additional Ember, triggered once every second.
While in the Burning Waves state, Resonators deal 50% more DMG, and the Negative Status on the target is raised to max stacks upon hit.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500057.Bg: "Used by poets to record dreams, by playwrights to create lives, by scholars to deduce truths. What is this item that I spoke of?"

80600003.Name: Coffee Point
80600003.Desc: Used to exchange limited-time extra rewards.
80600003.Bg: Shashou Cafe loyalty card. They say you can get a special prize by accumulating enough of it.

44010051.Name: Phantom: The False Sovereign
44010051.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

80000067.Name: Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction
80000067.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80000067.Bg: Food that was once a staple of Rinascitan home cooking, but which has since disappeared from the public eye as high demand led to a precipitous drop in the availability of the tasty shrimp used in its preparation. Today, only a few who purchase expensive shrimp from merchants affiliated with the Order are able to recreate this classical dish.

80001060.Name: Super Doubleshot Shaved Ice Milkshake Deluxe
80001060.Desc: Grants 28% Healing Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001060.Bg:
Galbrena's unique dessert recipe features large scoops of ice cream over a bowl of shaved ice, topped with colorful jams for that extra kick in flavor, along with a portion generous enough to eat to your heart's content. She even took extra care to adjust the Tacet Discord-shaped candies and cookies to be more appealing and cute.
Perhaps there's a deeper reason behind it all: When dealing with Tacet Discords, one needs a sharp, decisive "crunch." But when it comes to life, one should savor its flavors to the fullest. According to Galbrena, eating them separately or together comes down to personal preference. Her only advice is: Enjoy it before it melts. Many life's precious moments "melt in an instant," just like the sprinkles of ice. But don't worry, delightful flavors cling to the taste buds and never fade, always there to enjoy.

80001028.Name: Chongzhou Spicy Tofu
80001028.Desc: Defeating overworld enemies yields 55% more Shell Credits, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
80001028.Bg:
When Qiuyuan and his comrades were still in service, their missions often required them to travel fast and eat light, with little chance to enjoy a good meal. Even when they lodged at village inns, they still had to cook their own food out of an abundance of caution. Originally from Chongzhou, Qiuyuan had learned a few basic recipes at a young age. One of his dishes was fragrant, spicy, and mouthwatering, perfect for an empty stomach when paired with rice. Simple, yet satisfying. 
"Eat well, live well."

80010067.Name: Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction Recipe
80010067.Desc: Used to learn how to cook Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction.
80010067.Bg: A recipe that details how to make Laurel Shrimp in Nimbus Reduction.

42100042.Name: Abyssal Solvent
42100042.Desc: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42100042.Bg:
A solid solvent made using a special process that imparts healing effects.
Allegedly invented by someone after going to Rinascita. Apparently, they really wanted to become a Master Echo Trainer.

42200042.Name: Abyssal Solvent Recipe
42200042.Desc: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
42200042.Bg: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.

80600004.Name: Rice Dango
80600004.Desc: Used in Honami City to upgrade Cafe Decor, unlock Sticker slots, upgrade Namipon Badges, and make item purchases in the Supply Station.
80600004.Bg: A specialty snack from Homani City, widely praised for its soft, chewy texture and sweet, fragrant filling. Namipon's favorite. Deliver these to Namipon in exchange for items or use them to upgrade Cafe Decor.

42601310.Name: Summer Flower
42601310.Desc: A material used for Resonator Ascension.
42601310.Bg: This flower has always remained in bloom as the Lament sealed it and the City within the Sonoro Sphere. Just like an eternal summer, it never withers, never fades. In the past, during every blossom season, Honami City would hold a traditional Summer Flower viewing event.

71580001.Name: Cartethyia's Pendant
71580001.Desc: A pendant once worn close to Cartethyia's heart. It seems she left a message within. Since her frequency still lingers within you, resonating with the pendant may reveal her message.
71580001.Bg: {PlayerName}, trust her. And trust me... Everything we've done... is to... defeat... Leviathan...

44010054.Name: Phantom: Twin Nova - Nebulous Cannon
44010054.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010055.Name: Phantom: Twin Nova - Collapsar Blade
44010055.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

80130049.Name: Flame Undying
80130049.Desc:
I am ash, I am flame; I am darkness, yet I am salvation.
Though light falters and torments sear my flesh, still I remain true to my oath. My undying flame shall scour all evil.

80130050.Name: Blade Within Bamboo
80130050.Desc: A verdant edge cut from bamboo, concealed for the way, unsheathed for the cause.

61.Name: Modding EXP
61.Desc: Experience gained by riding the motorbike through varied and challenging terrain. Used to upgrade an expedition motorbike's Modding Level.
61.Bg: Measure the world with your wisdom.

72010040.Name: Token of Radiance: Lahai-Roi
72010040.Desc: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi. Can be used to redeem rewards.
72010040.Bg: A badge earned by completing the challenges of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi. Can be used to redeem rewards.

72010041.Name: Prestige Point: Lahai-Roi
72010041.Desc: Frequency data collected from fights in Peaks of Prestige. Used to unlock special Echoes exclusive to the event. Can only be used in Lahai-Roi.
72010041.Bg: Duelists use specialized Frequency data called Prestige Points to unlock their Echoes. As the Peaks of Prestige version in Lahai-Roi differs from the one in Septimont, Prestige Points earned in Septimont cannot be used in Lahai-Roi.

72010042.Name: Lahai-Roi Rank Point
72010042.Desc: Points earned from defeating opponents in the Peaks of Prestige Lahai-Roi Ranked Tornament. Used to increase your rank in Lahai-Roi.
72010042.Bg: So far, the success of Peaks of Prestige in Lahai-Roi has surpassed even Furius's wildest dreams. Many qualified duelists have gathered in Lahai-Roi, all competing for the coveted title of Division Champion, making Rank Points the most sought-after prize of all.

80110439.Name: Travails of a Steely Sword
80110439.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110439.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110440.Name: Till Dawn
80110440.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110440.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

80110441.Name: Firebound Angel
80110441.Desc: A crafted collection of recorded music, which, when given to the Aria Mummer, adds the tracks to their collection list.
80110441.Bg: A cherished item among the Rinascita people, it is said to hold music within, crafted by skilled artisans. However, due to internal damage, it no longer fulfills its original purpose.

10001508.Name: Chisa's Waveband
10001508.Desc: Can be used to activate Chisa's Resonance Chain.
10001508.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

10001307.Name: Buling's Waveband
10001307.Desc: Can be used to activate Buling's Resonance Chain.
10001307.Bg: A Resonator's Forte is composed of countless Wavebands. When these Wavebands form a complete Resonance Chain, the Resonator can unleash their full power.

80001018.Name: Lemon-Scented Sukiyaki
80001018.Desc: Increases Echo drop rate by 22%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode
80001018.Bg: Refreshing lemons meld their zesty notes into this rich stew. Tender and flavorful, it is one of Chisa's signature dishes. Every winter, she'd curl up under a heated futon to watch music shows while scents wafting from the pot filled the room. Those were the coziest days in her memories.

80001019.Name: Shredded Fish Soup
80001019.Bg: Stir fry the shredded fish with seasoning, place it on top of the simmered thick broth, and then pour hot oil over the dish, creating a sizzling sound that brings out sweet and savory flavors. This rich soup is by far Buling's favorite hometown dish.

80131002.Name: Honami Doom Walker
80131002.Desc: A special reward obtained from the "Stranger Things in Honami" event.
80131002.Bg: Even amidst the shattered mirage, you still manage to build a haven of peace.

80130051.Name: Where the Red Thread Binds
80130051.Desc: Through rain and night, tracing the threads that run through all things, she severs the endless loop, spreads her arms wide, and embraces a summer no longer trapped in stillness.

80130052.Name: Heeded by Divinities and Demons
80130052.Desc: I grant this Fu Talisman, purging every trace of malice, until my ears hear only clarity, where neither demon nor divinity remains.

44010056.Name: Phantom: Sigillum
44010056.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

44010057.Name: Phantom: Iceglint Dancer
44010057.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

71500058.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500058.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500058.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500059.Name: The Stigma that Signifies Vainglory
71500059.Desc:
When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500059.Bg: "Return, people, to ways of old, and cast aside the arrogant boasts of progress. For yesterday's light shall ever outshine today's pale imitation, as today dimly outglows tomorrow's coming darkness. Cling to the known, the tried, the true. Only then may we find shelter from the terrors and confusion of the unknown."

71500060.Name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
71500060.Desc:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500060.Bg: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.

71500061.Name: A Question with Many Answers
71500061.Desc:
Ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies inflicted with Negative Statuses.
Resonators who inflict Negative Statuses on enemies recover additional Ember, triggered once every second.
While in the Burning Waves state, Resonators deal 50% more DMG, and the Negative Status on the target is raised to max stacks upon hit.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500061.Bg: "Used by poets to record dreams, by playwrights to create lives, by scholars to deduce truths. What is this item that I spoke of?"

71500062.Name: Reveler Captain's Seal
71500062.Desc:
Amplifies all Attribute DMG by 25%.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500062.Bg: Evil sank their ship, trying to stifle their joy. Instead, they turned their last moments into a fiery celebration, singing and dancing atop the blazing sea.

71500063.Name: Haven that Gleams Elegantly
71500063.Desc:
Grants 30% Fusion DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator casts Echo Skill or deals Echo Skill DMG, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 1600% of their ATK in total (considered Echo Skill DMG), triggered up to 1 time every 6s.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500063.Bg: Its whisper repeated over and over, offering a tempting promise: Give up yourself. Give up your freedom. Give up your thoughts. Surrender everything, and live on like a bird in a cage. In return, it promises true happiness.

71500064.Name: A Question with Many Answers
71500064.Desc:
Ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies inflicted with Negative Statuses.
Resonators who inflict Negative Statuses on enemies recover additional Ember, triggered once every second.
While in the Burning Waves state, Resonators deal 50% more DMG, and the Negative Status on the target is raised to max stacks upon hit.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500064.Bg: "Used by poets to record dreams, by playwrights to create lives, by scholars to deduce truths. What is this item that I spoke of?"

71500065.Name: Gaze that Drowns in Dream
71500065.Desc:
Grants 20% Electro DMG Bonus and 20% Aero DMG Bonus.
When the active Resonator gains a Shield, they additionally recover Ember, triggered up to 1 time per second.
When the active Resonator deals damage while in the Burning Waves state, they unleash an AoE attack, dealing Electro DMG equal to 2400% of their ATK in total, triggered once every 6 seconds.

This Token can be used up to <color=#fee388>2</color> times in Whimpering Wastes.
71500065.Bg: The captain lowered his telescope, certain he had found the fabled land where treasures litter the ground like dust. He barked orders to charge through the last veil of fog that stood between them and their dream. But the fate waiting ahead was something he never anticipated.

80500004.Name: "The Real Me"
80500004.Desc: A stand-up card that conveys Chisa's special feelings, which she crafted herself while convalescing at the Black Shores. Zoom in for a closer look.
80500004.Bg:
Under the open city sky stands the Chisa in her high school days.
The joys and sorrows she once knew in her hometown have become indelible traces upon her heart, shaping the "Kuchiba Chisa" of today.
Now, she offers you those treasured memories of her past, her love, and all that she once called her own.

80500005.Name: Old Student ID
80500005.Desc: An old student ID from Startorch Academy, said to have been yours once.
80500005.Bg:
The student ID Chisa unintentionally took amid the Void Storm.
The ID is eroded, but you can still make out your face in the picture.
Twenty-odd years ago, you once roamed the halls of Startorch Academy.

80500006.Name: Old Student ID
80500006.Desc: An old student ID from Startorch Academy, said to have been yours once.
80500006.Bg:
The student ID Chisa unintentionally took amid the Void Storm.
The ID is eroded, but you can still make out your face in the picture.
Twenty-odd years ago, you once roamed the halls of Startorch Academy.

44010050.Name: Phantom: Chop Chop
44010050.Desc: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

62.Name: Adventure Log
62.Desc: A token earned by submitting exploration reports from various regions. Can be exchanged for "Adventure Packages" at the Lollo Logistics truck.
62.Bg: "If the Pioneer Association is the eyes of civilization, then Lollo Logistics aspires to be the feet that carry humanity forward," a Lollo Logistics member remarked during an interview.

80700001.Name: Mechanite
80700001.Desc: Material gathered from the environment, essential for constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
80700001.Bg: Once a native mineral widely distributed throughout Lahai-Roi, this ore developed crystalline formations etched with mechanical patterns under the influence of the Exostrider. Electronic devices crafted from this material exhibit modest increases in computational performance, making it a highly sought-after industrial resource.

80700002.Name: Compressed Bedrock
80700002.Desc: Material recovered from fallen enemies, used in constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
80700002.Bg: A high-density material processed from Lahai-Roi's native stone. Specially formulated for use with Route Constructors, it played a critical role during the early stages of the Spacetrek Collective's large-scale infrastructure development in Lahai-Roi. When paired with Route Constructors, Compressed Bedrock enabled rapid and stable route deployment across the region.

80700003.Name: Constructor Core
80700003.Desc: Material gained unintentionally during exploration, used in constructing the Spacetrek Observatory and routes.
80700003.Bg: A portable, rechargeable power unit developed by the Spacetrek Collective to support long-term field expeditions in Lahai-Roi. Within it stores the energy converted from the Reactor's glow by Solis Lens Arrays. Each Constructor Core can supply the basic power needs of a five-person expedition team for approximately 12 hours.

80700004.Name: Service Credit
80700004.Desc: Points earned by completing the reconstruction of the Spacetrek Observatory and the routes. Can be used to redeem rewards in the store.
80700004.Bg: Digital credits granted by the Spacetrek Collective to anyone who has contributed to the construction of Lahai-Roi's Route Network, which can be redeemed at the Spacetrek Collective for rewards.

80601002.Name: Resonator Type-I Sticker Blind Box
80601002.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ca6dff>Unique</color> Resonator Type-I Sticker at random.

80601003.Name: Universal Sticker Pack
80601003.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ed354d>Legendary</color> Universal Sticker at random.

80601004.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ffe65a>Collection</color> Universal Sticker at random.

80601005.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ca6dff>Unique</color> Resonator Type-II Sticker at random.

80601006.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ca6dff>Unique</color> Universal Sticker at random.

80601007.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ffe65a>Collection</color> Resonator Type-I Sticker at random.

80601010.Desc: Open to get 1 <color=#ed354d>Legendary</color> Resonator Type-I Sticker at random.
